Tertio loco is codex ponitur quem nos Ambrosianum appellauimus; sunt autem quatuor tantum pagelle codicis, forma minore, uersionem latinam euangeliorum continentis , sub qua scriptum est interpretationis gothice fragmentum euangelii Matthei, eiusque quidem partis, que in codice Argenteo maximam partem nunc desideratur; lucramur autem inde XXu, 38---XXuI, 3; XXuI, 65---70, pergitque, postquam hoc uersu cod. Argenteus incepit, cum hoc usque ad XXuII, 1. Scripture genus est grande et ad codicem Argenteum propius quam ceteri Ambrosiani accedit .

Supersunt deinde tria folia codicis , in quo scripta est commentatio in libros Regum latina; librarius in usum suum conuertit codices Plauti fabularum, Senece tragediarum et interpretationis Ulfilane librorum Nehemie et Esdre; seruata sunt in quatuor pagellis de Nehemia u, 13---18; uI, 14---uII, 3; duabus de Esdra II, 8---12. Litterarum specimen redditum est Tabul. II, I.

Quinto denique loco ponimus codicem, qui Skeireins continet, cuius una pars Rome in bibliotheca uaticana cum Frontino superscripto  seruatur, altera Mediolani , in qua super gothica concilium Chalcedonium scriptum est; uide de eo Massmannum docte atque copiose disputantem Skeir. p. 55 sqq. Eius autem mentionem eam  ob causam hic fecimus, quia inde duximus Ioan. I, 29; III, 3---5, 23---26, 29---32; u, 21---23, 35---38 et preterea alia ibi leguntur, que in cod. quoque Arg. exstant; eorum uarietatem in adnotatione indicauimus.

Antonium Morillonem primum uersionis Ulfilane memoriam redintegrauisse supra commemorauimus; post eum Derrerus quidam totum codicem Argenteum descripsit, que descriptio a comite de la Gardie simul cum codice Argenteo empta et Upsaliam deportata,  anno 1702 cum Olai Rudbeckii domo et libris conflagrauit. Primam autem Ulfile editionem e codice Argenteo et Derreri illa descriptione haustam Franciscus Iunius adornauit [1 1Kb] ; ea autem editio mendis scatet ita, ut nunc eius nulla fere utilitas sit; accedit, quod multa addidit, quorum uestigia in codice nulla apparent, itemque omisit, que uel hodie sine difficultate legi possunt. Multa autem laude digne sunt obseruationes Thome Mareshalli, Angli, uolumini priori inde a pagina 385 addite. Haud melior euasit editio Georgii Stiernhielmii, consiliarii militaris suecici et presidis collegii antiquitatum Holmiensis, que Iunianam editionem paucissimis locis emendatam, permultis etiam corruptiorem repetiit. [2 1Kb] . Multo maiore cum cura Ericus Benzelius, archiepiscopus Upsaliensis, et eo mortuo Eduardus  Lye, Anglus, Ulfilam ediderunt [3 1Kb] ; nam Benzelius non solum lectiones permultas Iunii et Stiernhielmii emendauit, sed etiam primus de nostre uersionis discrimine et consensu cum textu greco uerissime iudicauit; unum modo desideratum est: non omnia loca euanida atque lectu difficilia dare ualuit. Eum laborem suscepit Ioannes ab Ihre, regie cancellarie consiliarius et professor uniuersitatis Upsaliensis, qui totum opus ab aliquo e Stierhielmii editione describendum curauit in eamque descriptionem emendationes ex codice Arg. ipso haustas intulit [4 1Kb] ; eoque in negotio ea diligentia, prudentia, peritia uersatus est, quam is modo, qui codicem Argenteum suis oculis uidit, satis estimare potest. Que Ihre ad nouam Ulfile editionem curandam e codice duxerat  atque aliunde collegerat, cum ipsi opus perficere per fata non liceret, A. F. Buschingius, gymnasii Berolinensis director, edidit [5 1Kb] . Multis annis post quod Ihreo non contigerat, ut Ulfilam totum ederet, I. Chr. Zahnio, sacerdoti saxonico, contigit [6 1Kb] ; is autem textum non solum fragmentis epistole ad Romanos a Knittelio inuentis auxit [7 1Kb] , sed etiam adhibita multa cura et Ihrei emendationibus, supplementis, adnotationibus fidissime usus, quantum  potuit, emendatissimum atque integerrimum dedit, exceptis iis locis, ubi Ihre ipse codicem Argenteum diligentius inspicere neglexerat. Id cum compluribus locis factum esset, Zahnius aut in errorem perductus est, aut mendas ab Ihreo non animaduersas corrigere non potuit. Preterea optandum fuit, Zahnius maiorem sermonis gothici peritiam iudiciique subtilitatem habuisset; nam adnotationes, quas textui subiunxit, preter quas Mareshallo, Gordono, Ihreo debet, ieiune sunt atque inepte, maximam partem etiam false. Post Zahnium nemo fragmenta Ulfilana integra edidit; sed que de Matthei euangelio supersunt, bis sunt edita a S. Henshallo, magistro anglico, et I. A. Schmellero, lingue germanice in uniuersitate Monacensi doctore [1 1Kb] . Cum autem et propter  priorum editionum uitiositatem et quod in iis fragmenta nuper a Maio reperta et a Castillioneo in lucem edita [2 1Kb] non continerentur, noua Ulfile editione opus esse [3 1Kb] uideretur, ii deinde, quos eam adornaturos audissemus, aut diutius cunctarentur, aut consilium abiecissent, ipsi nos ad hoc opus suscipiendum accessimus, neque solum fragmenta uersionis Ulfilane omnia colligere, sed etiam emendatius, quam adhuc factum esset, edere constituimus. Nam legentibus nobis atque diligentius relegentibus cum alteram textus partem, a Zahnio ex Ihrei adnotationibus emendatam, tum reliqua a Knittelio et Castillioneo e codicibus hausta, permulta inuenta sunt, que trutina examinata probari non possent quibusque nulla nisi ex iterata codicum inspectione atque recognitione  medicina queri posse uideretur. Que cum ita essent, Upsaliam et Guelpherbytum profecti singulari humanitate et liberalitate bibliothecarum custodum summa cum laude predicanda impetrauimus, ut codicem Argenteum et Carolinum ab initio ad finem usque per otium legeremus ac perlustraremus et uitia animaduersa, utrum librariorum negligentie, an editorum incurie tribuenda essent, cognosceremus. Et in utroque codice conferendo exspectatio nostra nisi superata, certe non decepta est; quas enim lectiones olim dubias nunc suspicione liberauerimus,  quam multas corruptas emendauerimus; qui adnotationes nostras perlegerit, ipse uidebit. Sed multo magis, quam illi, codices Ambrosiani, quamquam a Massmanno ex parte iterum inspecti, ut denuo excuterentur necesse erat; quod cum ipsis nobis facere non liceret, Castillioneum precibus adiimus, ut coniecturas nostras, quas dubiis et aperte falsis lectionibus substitueramus, cum codicum scriptura comparare uellet: idque negotium non solum paratissimo animo atque rarissima gratificatione et beneuolentia suscepit, sed etiam tanta diligentia atque accuratione gessit, ut textus epistolarum, quantum superest, quem eius ipsius editione multo emendatiorem edidimus, summo iure Castillionei etiam studio debeatur.

 In adornanda autem nostra editione ita uersati sumus, ut lectiones codicum  ueras, non eas, quas exhibebant editiones, summa fide redderemus, exceptis iis solis, que aperte falso habebant, quas quidem ex legibus sermonis emendauimus, dubias autem et quarum emendatio non esset in promptu, relinqueremus intactas; in uerborum autem scriptura, cum gothicarum litterarum integritatem retinere cuperemus, hanc legem seruauimus, ut non th, ch, wh, qu scriberemus, sed simpliciter þ , x, w, q et pro w simplicem formam u; uerba denique interpunctionibus diremimus frequentioribus quidem, quam in codicibus apparent, sed que ad sensum  explicandum utiles esse uiderentur. Textui sic constituto uersionem latinam addidimus, non qualem Zahnius confecit, ut uerborum gothorum solorum ratione habita uel contra consuetudinem sermonis latini peccaret, sed que regulas latinitatis obseruans uerbum gothicum uerbo latino redderet; in quo negotio, quantum licebat, uulgatam secuti sumus. Denique adnotationem criticam adiecimus, qua primum editionum priorum errata enumerantur, que quia ad historiam textus gothici pertinebant et qua diligentia quaue negligentia codices a criticis adhibiti essent, cognosci  posset, nunc non omittenda esse uidebantur; deinde lectiones merito suspectas indicauimus, temere in dubitationem uocatas defendimus, rationes emendationum aut explicationum ab aliis initas sub iudicium uocauimus, neque ubi Gothus aut minus recte in interpretatione uersatus esset, aut contra sermonem suum peccauisset, aut greca falso legisset, id animaduertere omisimus; tum textus nostri et greci uulgati frequentem discrepantiam notauimus, grecus autem uulgatus textus nobis est, quem Griesbachii editio prebet, preterque uarietates ibi positas  Millium etiam et Mattheium consuluimus; denique uarietates uel in altero codice inuentas, uel in marginibus adscriptas ibi adiunximus, ita ut que in textu aliarum editionum sint, omnia, de adnotationibus, obseruationibus, aliorum explicandi conatibus, que utilia uiderentur, librorum gothicorum additamenta omnia, glosse, uarie lectiones, gothici et greci textus diuersitates indicate inueniantur. Ut breuiores esse possemus, notis usi sumus, quas a fronte horum prolegomenorum ex consulto apposuimus.





[uERSIO BIBLIORUM.]



EuANGELIA.



AIuAGGELIO þAIRH MATþAIU.

[III, 11. 1Kb] [III, 11. 36Kb] Aþþan ïk ïn uatin ïzuis daupia. ïþ sa afar mis gaggida suinþoza mis ïst. þizei ïk ni ïm uairþs ei [u, 8. 1Kb] [u, 8. 1Kb] anahneiuands andbindau skaudaraip skohis ïs. sah. þan ïzuis daupeiþ ïn ahmin ueihamma.---audagai. [15. 1Kb] [u, 15. 2Kb] þai hrainiahairtans. unte þai guþ gasaiwand.--- . . . ak ana lukarnastaþan. iah liuteiþ allaim [16. 1Kb] [u, 16. 1Kb] þaim ïn þamma razna. sua liuhtiai liuhaþ ïzuar ïn anduairþia manne. ei gasaiwaina ïzuara goda [17. 1Kb] [u, 17. 1Kb] uaurstua iah hauhiaina attan ïzuarana þana ïn himinam. ni hugiaiþ ei ïk qemiau gatairan uitoþ aiþþau [18. 1Kb] [u, 18. 1Kb] praufetuns. ni qam gatairan ak usfullian. amen auk qiþa ïzuis. und þatei usleiþiþ himins iah [19. 1Kb] [u, 19. 1Kb] airþa. iota ains aiþþau ains striks ni usleiþiþ af uitoda. unte allata uairþiþ. ïþ sei nu gatairiþ aina anabusne þizo minnistono iah laisiai sua mans. sah minnista haitada ïn þiudangardiai [20. 1Kb] [u, 20. 7Kb] himine. ïþ sei tauiiþ iah laisiai sua. sah mikils haitada ïn þiudangardiai himine. qipa auk ïzuis þatei nibai managizo uairþiþ ïzuaraizos garaihteins þau þize bokarie iah fareisaie. ni þau qimiþ  [21. 1Kb] ïn þiudangardiai himine. hausideduþ þatei qiþan ïst þaim airizam. ni maurþriais. ïth sei maurþreiþ. [22. 1Kb] [u, 22. 1Kb] skula uairþiþ stauai. aþþan ik qiþa ïzuis þatei wazuh modags broþr seinamma suare skula uairþiþ stauai. ïþ sei qiþiþ broþr seinamma raka. skula uairþiþ gaqumþai. aþþan sei qiþiþ duala. skula uairþiþ ïn [23. 1Kb] [u, 23. 1Kb] gaiainnan funins. iabai nu bairais aibr þein du hunslastada iah iainar gamuneis þatei broþar þeins habaiþ [24. 1Kb] [u, 24. 10Kb] wa bi þuk. aflet iainar þo giba þeina ïn anduairþia hunslastadis iah gagg faurþis gasibion broþr þeinamma [25. 1Kb] [u, 25. 1Kb] iah biþe atgaggands atbair þo giba þeina. siiais uaila hugiands andastauin þeinamma sprauto. und þatei ïs ïn uiga miþ ïmma. ïbai wan atgibai þuk sa andastaua stauïn iah sa staua þuk atgibai [26. 1Kb] [u, 26. 16Kb] andbahta. iah ïn karkara galagiaza. amen qiþa þus. ni usgaggis iainþro. unte usgibis þana minnistan [27. 1Kb] [28. 1Kb] kintu. hausideduþ þatei qiþan ïst. ni horinos. aþþan ïk qiþa ïzuis þatei wazuh sei saiwiþ qinon du [29. 1Kb] [u, 29. 18Kb] luston ïzos. iu gahorinoda ïzai ïn hairtin seinamma. ïþ iabai augo þein þata taihsuo marziai þuk. usstagg ïta iah uairp af þus. batizo ïst auk þus ei fraqistnai ains liþiue þeinaize iah ni allata leik þein [30. 1Kb] [u, 30. 1Kb] gadriusai ïn gaiainnan. iah iabai taihsuo þeina handus marziai þuk. afmait þo iah uairp af þus. batizo [31. 1Kb] [u, 31. 6Kb] ïst auk þus ei fraqistnai ains liþiue þeinaize iah ni allata leik þein gadriusai in gaiainnan. qiþanuh [32. 1Kb] [u, 32. 1Kb] þan ïst þatei wazuh sei afletai qen. gibai ïzai afstassais bokos. iþ ïk qiþa ïzuis þatei wazuh sei afletiþ qen seina inuh fairina kalkinassaus. tauiiþ þo horinon. iah sa ïze afsatida liugaiþ. horinoþ. [34. 1Kb] [u, 34. 1Kb] [35. 1Kb] [u, 35. 1Kb] aþþan ïk qiþa ïzuis ni suaran allis. ni bi himina. unte stols ïst guþs. nih bi airþai. unte fotubaurd ïst [36. 1Kb] [u, 36. 1Kb] fotiue ïs. nih bi ïairusaulimai. unte baurgs ïst þis mikilins þiudanis. nih bi haubida þeinamma suarais. [47. 1Kb] [u, 47. 18Kb] niu iah þai þiudo þata samo tauiand. iah iabai goleiþ þans friionds ïzuarans þatainei. we managizo [48. 1Kb] [u, 48. 1Kb] tauiip. niu iah motarios þata samo tauiand. siiaiþ nu ius fullatoiai suasue atra ïzuar sa ïn himinam [uI, 1. 1Kb] [uI, 1. 11Kb] fullatoiis ïst. atsaiwiþ armaion ïzuara ni tauian ïn anduairþia manne du saiwan ïm. aiþþau laun ni [2. 1Kb] [uI, 2. 1Kb] habaiþ fram attin ïzuaramma þamma ïn himinam. þan nu tauiais armaion. ni haurniais faura þus suasue þai liutans tauiand ïn gaqumþim iah ïn garunsim. ei hauhiaindau fram mannam. amen qiþa [3. 1Kb] ïzuis. andnemun mizdon seina. ïþ þuk tauiandan armaion ni uiti hleidumei þeina. wa tauiiþ taihsuo [4. 1Kb] [uI, 4. 6Kb] þeina. ei siiai so armahairtiþa þeina ïn fulhsnia iah atta þeins. sei saiwiþ ïn fulhsnia. usgibiþ þus ïn [5. 1Kb] [uI, 5. 22Kb] bairhtein. iah. þan bidiaiþ. ni siiaiþ suasue þai liutans. unte friiond ïn gaqumþim iah uaihstam plapio [6. 1Kb] [uI, 6. 1Kb] standandans bidian. ei gaumiaindau mannam. amen qiþa ïzuis þatei haband mizdon seina. ïþ þu þan bidiais. gagg ïn heþion þeina iah galukands haurdai þeinai bidei du attin þeinamma þamma ïn  [7. 1Kb] [uI, 7. 1Kb] fulhsnia iah atta þeins. sei saiwiþ in fulhsnia. usgibiþ þus ïn bairhtein. bidiandansuþ-þan ni filuuaurdiaiþ [8. 1Kb] [uI, 8. 1Kb] suasue þai þiudo. þugkeiþ ïm auk ei ïn filuuaurdein seinai andbausiaindau. ni galeikoþ nu maiþ. [9. 1Kb] [uI, 9-13 2Kb] uait auk atta ïzuar. þizei ius þaurbuþ. faurþizei ius bidiaiþ ïna. sua nu bidiaiþ ius. atta unsar þu in [10. 1Kb] himinam. ueihnai namo þein. qimai piudinassus þeins. uairþai uilia þeins sue ïn himina iah ana [11. 1Kb] [uI, 11. 11Kb] [12. 1Kb] airþai. hlaif unsarana þana sinteinan gif uns himma daga iah aflet uns þatei skulans siiaima suasue [13. 1Kb] [uI, 13. 1Kb] iah ueis afletam þaim skulam unsaraim. iah ni briggais uns ïn fraistubniai. ak lausei uns af þamma [14. 1Kb] ubilin. unte þeina ïst þiudangardi iah mahts iah uulþus in aiuins. amen. unte iabai afletiþ [15. 1Kb] [uI, 15. 1Kb] mannam missadedeins ïze. afletip iah ïzuis atta ïzuar sa ufar himinam. ïþ iabai ni afletip mannam [16. 1Kb] [uI, 16. 1Kb] missadedins ïze. ni þau atta ïzuar afletiþ missadedins ïsuaros. aþþan biþe faistaiþ. ni uairþaiþ suasue þai liutans gaurai. frauardiand auk anduairþia seina. ei gasaiwaindau mannam fastandans. [17. 1Kb] [uI, 17. 1Kb] amen qiþa ïzuis þatei andnemun mizdon seina. ïþ þu fastands salbo haubiþ þein iah [18. 1Kb] ludia þeina þuah. ei ni gasaiwaizau mannam fastands ak attin þeinamma þamma ïn fulhsnia. iah [19. 1Kb] atta þeins. sei saiwiþ ïn fulhsnia. usgibiþ þus. ni huzdiaiþ ïzuis huzda ana airþai. þarei malo iah [20. 1Kb] [uI, 20. 1Kb] nidua frauardeiþ iah þarei þiubos ufgraband iah hlifand. ïþ huzdiaiþ ïzuis huzda ïn himina. þarei [21. 1Kb] nih malo nih nidua frauardeiþ iah þarei þiubos ni ufgraband nih stiland. þarei auk ïst huzd ïzuar. [22. 1Kb] þaruh ïst iah hairto ïzuar. lukarn leikis ïst augo. iabai nu augo þein ainfalþ ïst. allata leik þein [23. 1Kb] liuhadein uairþiþ. ïþ iabai augo þein unsel ïst. allata leik þein riqizein uairþiþ. iabai nu liuhaþ þata [24. 1Kb] [uI, 24. 29Kb] ïn þus rigiz ïst þata riqiz wan filu. ni manna mag tuaim frauiam skalkinon. unte iabai fiiaiþ ainana. iah anþarana friioþ. aiþþau ainamma ufhauseiþ. ïþ anþaramma frakann, ni maguþ guþa skalkinon iah [25. 1Kb] [uI, 25. 1Kb] mammonin. duþþe qiþa ïzuis. ni maurnaiþ saiualai ïzuarnai. wa matiaiþ iah wa drigkaiþ. nih leika [26. 1Kb] [uI, 26. 8Kb] ïzuaramma. we uasiaiþ. niu saiuala mais ïst fodeinai iah leik uastiom. ïnsaiwiþ du fuglam himinis. þei ni saiand nih sneiþand nih lisand ïn banstins. iah atta ïzuar sa ufar himinam fodeiþ ïns. niu ius  [27. 1Kb] [uI, 27. 1Kb] maisue aþrizans siiuþ þaim. ïþ was ïzuara maurnands mag anaaukan ana uahstu seinana aleina [28. 1Kb] [uI, 28. 1Kb] aina. iah bi uastios wa saurgaiþ. gakunnaiþ blomans haiþios. waiua uahsiand. nih arbaidiand nih [29. 1Kb] [uI, 29. 1Kb] spinnand. qiþuh þan ïzuis þatei nih saulaumon ïn allamma uulþau seinamma gauasida sik sue ains [30. 1Kb] [uI, 30. 24Kb] þize. iah þande þata haui haiþios himma daga uisando iah gistradagis ïn auhn galagiþ guþ sua [31. 1Kb] [uI, 31. 1Kb] uasiiþ. waiua mais ïzuis leitil galaubiandans. ni maurnaiþ nu qiþandans. wa matiam aiþþau wa [32. 1Kb] [uI, 32. 1Kb] drigkam aiþþau we uasiaima. all auk þata þiudos sokiand. uaituh þan atta ïzuar sa ufar himinam [uII, 12. 1Kb] þatei þaurbuþ---. . . iaina ïzuis mans. suah iah ius tauiaiþ ïm. þata auk ïst uitoþ iah praufeteis. [13. 1Kb] [uII, 13. 1Kb] ïnngaggaiþ þairh agguu. daur. unte braid daur iah rums uigs sa brigganda ïn fralustai iah managai [14. 1Kb] sind þai ïnngaleiþandans þairh þata. wan agguu þata daur iah þraihans uigs sa brigganda ïn libainai [15. 1Kb] [uII, 15. 1Kb] iah fauai sind þai bigitandans þana. atsaiwiþ sueþauh faura liugnapraufetum þaim ïzei qimand [16. 1Kb] at ïzuis ïn uastiom lambe. iþ ïnnaþro sind uulfos uiluandans. bi akranam ïze ufkunnaiþ ïns. ïbai [17. 1Kb] [uII, 17. 1Kb] lisanda af þaurnum ueinabasia aiþþau af uigadeinom smakkans. sua all bagme godaize akrana [18. 1Kb] goda gatauiiþ. ïþ sa ubila bagms akrana ubila gatauiiþ. ni mag bagms þiuþeigs akrana ubila gatauian [19. 1Kb] nih bagms ubils akrana þiuþeiga gatauian. all bagme ni tauiandane akran god usmaitada iah [20. 1Kb] [21. 1Kb] ïn fon atlagiada. þannu bi akranam ïze ufkunnaiþ ïns. ni wazuh sei qiþiþ mis. frauia frauia. [22. 1Kb] ïnngaleiþiþ ïn þiudangardia himine ak sa tauiands uilian attins meinis þis ïn himinam. managai qiþand mis ïn iainamma daga. frauia frauia. niu þeinamma namin þraufetidedum iah þeinamma [23. 1Kb] [uII, 23. 1Kb] namin unhulþons usuaurpum iah þeinamma namin mahtins mikilos gatauidedum. iah þan andhaita [24. 1Kb] [uII, 24. 8Kb] ïm þatei ni wanhun kunþa ïzuis. afleiþiþ fairra mis ius uaurkiandans unsibiana. wazuh nu sei hauseiþ uaurda meina iah tauiiþ þo. galeiko ïna uaira frodamma. sei gatimrida razn sein ana [25. 1Kb] staina. iah atïddia dalaþ rign iah qemun awos iah uaiuoun uindos iah bistugqun bi þamma  [26. 1Kb] [uII, 26. 1Kb] razna iainamma iah ni gadraus. unte gasuliþ uas ana staina. iah wazuh sei hauseiþ uaurda meina [27. 1Kb] [uII, 27. 1Kb] iah ni tauiiþ þo. galeikoda mann dualamma. sei gatimrida razn sein ana malmin. iah atïddia dalaþ rign iah qemun awos iah uaiuoun uindos iah bistugqun bi iainamma razna iah gadraus iah uas drus [28. 1Kb] [uII, 28. 1Kb] [29. 1Kb] ïs mikils, iah uarþ þan ustauh ïesus þo uaurda. biabridedun manageins ana laiseinai ïs. uas auk [uIII, 1. 1Kb] [uIII, 1. 1Kb] laisiands ïns sue ualdufri habands iah ni suasue bokarios. dalaþ þan atgaggandin ïmma af fairgunia [2. 1Kb] [uIII, 2. 1Kb] laistidedun afar ïmma ïumions managos. iah sai. manna þrutsfill habands durinnands ïnuait ïna [3. 1Kb] [uIII, 3. 16Kb] qiþands. frauia. iabai uileis. magt mik gahrainian. iah ufrakiands handu attaitok ïmma qiþands. [4. 1Kb] [uIII, 4. 1Kb] uilian. uairþ hrains. iah suns hrain uarþ þata þrutsfill ïs. iah qaþ ïmma ïesus. saiw ei mann ni qiþais ak gagg. þuk silban ataugei gudiin iah atbair giba. þei anabauþ moses du ueituodiþai ïm. [5. 1Kb] [uIII, 5. 3Kb] [6. 1Kb] afaruh þan þata ïnnatgaggandin ïmma ïn kafarnaum duatïddia ïmma hundafaþs bidiands ïna. iah [7. 1Kb] qiþands. frauia. þiumagus meins ligiþ ïn garda usliþa harduba baluiþs. iah qaþ du ïmma ïesus. ïk [8. 1Kb] [uIII, 8. 1Kb] qimands gahailia ïna. iah andhafiands sa hundafaþs qaþ. frauia. ni ïm uairþs ei uf hrot mein ïnngaggais. [23. 1Kb] [XI, 23. 7Kb] tyrim iah seidonim sutizo uairþiþ ïn daga stauos þau ïzuis. iah þu kafarnaum. þu und himin ushauhida. dalaþ und halia galeiþis. unte iabai ïn saudaumiam uaurþeina mahteis þos [24. 1Kb] [XI, 24. 1Kb] uaurþanons ïn ïzuis. aiþþau eïs ueseina und hina dag. sueþauh qiþa ïzuis þatei airþai saudaumie [25. 1Kb] [XI, 25. 1Kb] [XXu, 38. 1Kb] [XXu, 38. 1Kb] sutizo uairþip ïn daga stauos þau þus. ïnuh iainamma mela andhaf..---wanuh þan þuk sewum [39. 1Kb] gast iah galaþodedum. aiþþau naqadana iah uasidedum. wanuh þan þuk sewum siukana aiþþau ïn [40. 1Kb] [XXu, 40. 8Kb] karkarai iah atïddiedum du þus. iah andhafiands sa þiudans qiþiþ du ïm. amen qiþa ïzuis. iah [41. 1Kb] þan ei tauideduþ ainamma þize minnistane broþre meinaize. mis tauideduþ. þanuh qiþiþ iah þaim af hleidumein ferai. gaggiþ fairra mis ius fraqiþanans ïn fon þata aiueino þata manuido unhulþin iah [42. 1Kb] [43. 1Kb] [XXu, 43. 5Kb] aggilum ïs. unte gredags uas ianni gebuþ mis matian. afþaursiþs uas ian-ni dragkideduþ mik. gasts ian-ni galaþodeduþ mik. naqaþs ian-ni uasideduþ mik. siuks iah ïn karkarai ian-ni gaueisodeduþ [44. 1Kb] meina. þanuh andhafiand iah þai qiþandans, frauia wan þuk sewum gredagana aiþþau afþaursidana [45. 1Kb] [XXu, 45. 9Kb] aiþþau gast aiþþau naqadana aiþþau siukana aiþþau ïn karkarai ian-ni andbahtidedeima þus. þanuh andhafiiþ [46. 1Kb] ïm qiþands. amen qiþa ïzuis. iah þan ei ni tauideduþ ainamma þize leitilane. mis ni tauideduþ. [XXuI, 1. 1Kb] iah galeiþand þai ïn baluein aiueinon ïþ þai garaihtans ïn libain aiueinon. iah uarþ. biþe ustauh ïesus [2. 1Kb] alla þo uaurda. qaþ siponiam seinaim. uituþ þatei afar tuans dagans paska uairþiþ ias-sa sunus [3. 1Kb] [65. 1Kb] [XXuI, 65-XXuII, 1 1Kb] [XXuI, 65. 1Kb] mans atgibada du ushramian. þanuh------þaurbum ueituode. sai. nu gahausideduþ þo uaiamerei  [67. 1Kb] ïs. wa ïzuis þugkeiþ. ïþ eis andhafiandans qeþun. skula dauþaus ïist. þanuh spiuum ana andauleizn [68. 1Kb] ïs iah kaupastedun ïna. sumaiþ-þan lofam slohun qiþandans. praufetei unsis xristu. was ïst sa [69. 1Kb] [XXuI, 69. 13Kb] slahands þuk. ïþ paitrus uta sat ana rohsnai iah duatïddia ïmma aina þiui qiþandei. iah þu uast [70. 1Kb] [XXuI, 70. 6Kb] [71. 1Kb] [XXuI, 71. 1Kb] miþ ïesua þamma galeilaiau. ïþ ïs laugnida faura þaim allaim qiþands. ni uait wa qiþis. usgaggandan þan ïna ïn daur gasaw ïna anþara iah qaþ du þaim iainar. iah sa uas miþ ïesua þamma nazoraiau. AIuAGGELIO þAIRH MARKU ANASTODEIþ. [1Kb]


[I, 1. 1Kb] [2. 1Kb] [I, 2. 1Kb] Anastodeins aiuanggelions ïesuis xristaus sunaus guþs. sue gameliþ ïst ïn esaï ïn praufetau. sai. [3. 1Kb] [I, 3. 6Kb] ik ïnsandia aggilu meinana faura þus. sei gamanueiþ uig þeinana faura þus. stibna uopiandins [4. 1Kb] [I, 4. 1Kb] ïn auþidai. manueiþ uig frauiins. raihtos uaurkeiþ staigos guþs unsaris. uas ïohannes daupiands [5. 1Kb] [I, 5. 12Kb] ïn auþidai iah meriands daupein ïdreigos du aflageinai frauaurhte. iah usïddiedun du ïmma all ïudaialand iah ïairusaulymeis iah daupidai uesun allai ïn ïaurdane awai fram ïmma andhaitandans [6. 1Kb] [I, 6. 1Kb] frauaurhtim seinaim. uasuþ-þan ïohannes gauasiþs taglam ulbandaus iah gairda filleina [7. 1Kb] [I, 7. 1Kb] bi hup seinana iah matida þramsteins iah miliþ haiþuisk iah merida qiþands. qimiþ suinþoza [8. 1Kb] [I, 8. 1Kb] mis. sa afar mis þizei ïk ni ïm uairþs anahneiuands andbindan skaudaraip skohe ïs. aþþan ïk  [9. 1Kb] [I, 9. 1Kb] daupia ïzuis ïn uatin. ïþ ïs daupeiþ ïzuis ïn ahmin ueihamma. iah uarþ ïn iainaim dagam. qam ïesus [10. 1Kb] [I, 10. 1Kb] fram nazaraiþ galeilaias iah daupiþs uas fram ïohanne ïn ïaurdane. iah suns usgaggands us þamma [11. 1Kb] [I, 11. 8Kb] uatin gasaw usluknans himinans iah ahman sue ahak atgaggandan ana ïna. iah stibna qam us himinam. [12. 1Kb] [I, 12. 16Kb] þu ïs sunus meins sa liuba. ïn þuzei uaila galeikaida. iah suns sai. ahma ïna ustauh ïn auþida [13. 1Kb] [I, 13. 1Kb] iah uas ïn þizai auþidai dage fiduoortiguns fraisans fram satanin iah uas miþ diuzam iah aggileis [14. 1Kb] [I, 14. 1Kb] andbahtidedun ïmma. ïþ afar þatei atgibans uarþ ïohannes. qam ïesus ïn galeilaia meriands aiuaggelion [15. 1Kb] [I, 15. 4Kb] þiudangardios guþs qiþands þatei usfullnoda þata mel iah atnewida sik piudangardi guþs. usqiþan þata uaurd. suasue ïs iuþan ni mahta andaugio ïn baurg galeiþan ak uta [II, 1. 1Kb] [II, 1. 15Kb] ana auþiaim stadim uas. iah ïddiedun du ïmma allaþro. iah galaiþ aftra ïn kafarnaum afar dagans. iah [2. 1Kb] [II, 2. 3Kb] gafrehun þatei ïn garda ïst. iah suns gaqemun managai. suasue iuþan ni gamostedun nih at daura.  [3. 1Kb] [II, 3. 1Kb] [4. 1Kb] [II, 4. 7Kb] iah rodida ïm uaurd. iah qemun at ïmma usliþan bairandans hafanana fram fiduorim iah ni magandans newa qiman ïmma faura manageim andhulidedun hrot. þarei uas ïesus. iah usgrabandans [5. 1Kb] [II, 5. 10Kb] ïnsailidedun þata badi iah fralailotun. ana þammei lag sa usliþa. gasaiwands þan ïesus galaubein [6. 1Kb] ïze qaþ du þamma usliþin. barnilo. afletanda þus frauaurhteis þeinos. uesunuh þan sumai [7. 1Kb] þize bokarie iainar sitandans iah þagkiandans sis ïn hairtam seinaim. wa sa sua rodeiþ naiteinins. [8. 1Kb] [II, 8. 1Kb] was mag afletan frauaurhtins niba ains guþ. iah suns ufkunnands ïesus ahmin seinamma þatei sua [9. 1Kb] [II, 9. 1Kb] þai mitodedun sis qaþ du ïm. duwe mitoþ þata ïn hairtam ïzuaraim. waþar ïst azetizo du qiþan þamma usliþin. afletanda þus frauaurhteis þeinos. þau qiþan. urreis iah nim þata badi þeinata iah [10. 1Kb] gagg. aþþan ei uiteiþ þatei ualdufni habaiþ sunus mans ana airþai afletan frauaurhtins. qaþ du [11. 1Kb] [II, 11. 11Kb] [12. 1Kb] [II, 12. 1Kb] þamma usliþin. þus qiþa. urreis nimuh þata badi þein iah gagg du garda þeinamma. iah urrais suns iah ushafiands badi usïddia faura anduairþia allaize. suasue usgeisnodedun allai iah hauhidedun [13. 1Kb] [II, 13. 1Kb] mikiliandans guþ qiþandans þatei aiu sua ni gasewum. iah galaiþ aftra faur marein. iah all [14. 1Kb] [II, 14. 1Kb] manageins ïddiedun du ïmma iah laisida ïns. iah warbonds gasaw laiuui þana alfaiaus sitandan at [15. 1Kb] [II, 15. 1Kb] motai iah qaþ du ïmma. gagg afar mis. iah usstandands ïddia afar ïmma. iah uarþ. biþe ïs anakumbida ïn garda ïs. iah managai motarios iah frauaurhtai miþanakumbidedun ïesua iah siponiam ïs. [16. 1Kb] [II, 16. 1Kb] uesun auk managai iah ïddiedun afar ïmma. iah þai bokarios iah fareisaieis gasaiwandans ïna matiandan miþ þaim motariam iah frauaurhtaim qeþun du þaim siponiam ïs. wa ïst þatei miþ motariam [17. 1Kb] [II, 17. 12Kb] iah frauaurhtaim matiiþ iah driggkiþ. iah gahausiands ïesus qaþ du ïm. ni þaurbun suinþai [18. 1Kb] [II, 18. 14Kb] lekeis ak þai ubilaba habandans. ni qam laþon usuaurhtans ak frauaurhtans. iah uesun siponios ïohannis iah fareisaieis fastandans. iah atïddiedun iah qeþun du ïmma. duwe siponios ïohannis iah [19. 1Kb] [II, 19. 1Kb] fareisaieis fastand ïþ þai þeinai siponios ni fastand. iah qaþ ïm ïesus. ïbai magun sunius bruþfadis. und þatei miþ ïm ïst bruþfaþs. fastan. sua lagga weila sue miþ sis haband bruþfad. ni magun fastan. [40. 1Kb] [Iu, 40. 16Kb] iah anasilaida sa uinds iah uarþ uis mikil. iah qaþ du ïm. duwe faurhtai siiuþ sua. waiua ni [41. 1Kb] [Iu, 41. 1Kb] nauh habaiþ galaubein. iah ohtedun sis agis mikil iah qeþun du sis misso. was þannu sa siiai. unte [u, 1. 1Kb] [2. 1Kb] [u, 2. 1Kb] iah uinds iah marei ufhausiand ïmma. iah qemun hindar marein ïn landa gaddarene. iah usgaggandin [3. 1Kb] ïmma us skipa suns gamotida ïmma manna us aurahiom ïn ahmin unhrainiamma. sei bauain [4. 1Kb] [u, 4. 1Kb] habaida ïn aurahiom. iah ni naudibandiom eisarneinaim manna mahta ïna gabindan. unte ïs ufta eisarnam bi fotuns gabuganaim iah naudibandiom eisarneinaim gabundans uas iah galausida af sis þos [5. 1Kb] [u, 5. 1Kb] naudibandios iah þo ana fotum eisarna gabrak. iah. manna ni mahta ïna gatamian iah sinteino nahtam  [6. 1Kb] [u, 6. 10Kb] iah dagam ïn aurahiom iah in fairguniam uas hropiands iah bligguands sik stainam . . . saiwands [7. 1Kb] [u, 7. 1Kb] þan ïesu fairraþro rann iah ïnuait ïna. iah hropiands stibnai mikilai qaþ. wa mis iah þus. ïesu sunau [8. 1Kb] guþs þis hauhistins. bisuara þuk bi gupa. ni baluiais mis. unte qaþ ïmma. usgagg ahma unhrainia us [9. 1Kb] [u, 9. 21Kb] pamma mann. iah frah ïna. wa namo þein. iah qaþ du ïmma. namo mein laigaion. unte managai [10. 1Kb] [u, 10. 1Kb] [11. 1Kb] [u, 11. 7Kb] siium. iah baþ ïna filu ei ni usdrebi ïm us landa. uasuh þan iainar hairda sueine haldana at þamma [12. 1Kb] [u, 12. 1Kb] fairgunia. iah bedun ïna allos þos unhulþons qiþandeins. ïnsandei unsis ïn þo sueina. ei ïn þo galeiþaima. [13. 1Kb] [u, 13. 10Kb] iah. uslaubida ïm ïesus suns. iah usgaggandans ahmans þai unhrainians galiþun ïn po sueina. iah rann so hairda and driuson ïn marein. uesunuþ-þan sue tuos þusundios iah afwapnodedun [14. 1Kb] [u, 14. 17Kb] ïn marein. iah. þai haldandans þo sueina gaþlauhun iah gataihun ïn baurg iah ïn haimom. iah qemun [15. 1Kb] [u, 15. 1Kb] saiwan. wa uesi þata uaurþano. iah atïddiedun du ïesua iah gasaiwand þana uodan sitandan [16. 1Kb] iah gauasidana iah fraþiandan þana sei habaida laigaion iah ohtedun. iah sþillodedun ïm þaiei gasewun. [17. 1Kb] waiua uarþ bi þana uodan iah bi þo sueina. iah dugunnun bidian ïna galeiþan hindar markos [18. 1Kb] [u, 18. 1Kb] [19. 1Kb] seinos. iah ïnngaggandan ïna ïn skip baþ ïna sei uas uods ei miþ ïmma uesi. iah ni lailot ïna ak qaþ du ïmma. gagg du garda þeinamma du þeinaim iah gateih ïm. wan filu þus frauia gatauida iah [20. 1Kb] gaarmaida þuk. iah galaiþ iah dugann merian ïn daikapaulein. wan filu gatauida ïmma ïesus. iah [21. 1Kb] [u, 21. 1Kb] allai sildaleikidedun. iah usleiþandin ïesua ïn skipa aftra hindar marein gaqemun sik manageins filu [22. 1Kb] [u, 22. 1Kb] du ïmma. iah uas faura marein. iah sai. qimiþ ains þize synagogafade namin ieirus iah saiwands [23. 1Kb] ïna gadraus du fotum ïesuis. iah baþ ïna filu qiþands þatei dauhtar meina aftumist habaiþ. ei qimands [24. 1Kb] lagiais ana þo handuns. ei ganisai iah libai. iah galaiþ miþ ïmma iah ïddiedun afar ïmma manageins [25. 1Kb] [26. 1Kb] [u, 26. 16Kb] filu iah þraihun ïna. iah qinono suma uisandei ïn runa bloþis iera tualif iah manag gaþulandei fram  managaim Iekiam iah fraqimandei allamma seinamma iah ni uaihtai botida ak mais uairs habaida. [27. 1Kb] [28. 1Kb] gahausiandei bi ïesu atgaggandei ïn managein aftana attaitok uastiai ïs. unte qaþ þatei iabai uastiom [29. 1Kb] [u, 29. 1Kb] ïs atteka. ganisa. iah sunsaiu gaþaursnoda sa brunna blopis ïzos iah ufkunþa ana leika þatei gahailnoda [30. 1Kb] af þamma slaha. iah sunsaiu ïesus ufkunþa ïn sis silbin þo us sis maht usgaggandein. gauandiands [31. 1Kb] [u, 31. 1Kb] sik ïn managein qaþ. was mis taitok uastiom. iah qeþun du ïmma siponios ïs. saiwis þo managein [32. 1Kb] [33. 1Kb] þreihandein þuk iah qiþis. was mis taitok. iah ulaitoda saiwan þo þata tauiandein. iþ so qino ogandei iah reirandei. uitandei þatei uarþ bi ïia qam iah draus du ïmma iah qaþ ïmma alla þo [34. 1Kb] [u, 34. 1Kb] sunia. ïþ ïs qaþ du ïzaï. dauhtar. galaubeins þeina ganasida þuk. gagg ïn gauairþi iah siiais haila af [35. 1Kb] [u, 35. 1Kb] þamma slaha þeinamma. nauhþanuh ïmma rodiandin qemun fram þamma synagogafada qiþandans [36. 1Kb] þatei dauhtar þeina gasualt. wa þanamais draibeis þana laisari. ïþ ïesus sunsaiu gahausiands þata [37. 1Kb] [u, 37. 10Kb] uaurd rodiþ qaþ du þamma synagogafada. ni faurhtei. þatainei galaubei. iah ni fralailot ainohun ïze [38. 1Kb] [u, 38. 1Kb] miþ sis afargaggan nibai paitru iah ïakobu iah ïohannen broþar ïakobis. iah galaiþ ïn gard þis synagogafadis [39. 1Kb] [u, 39. 1Kb] iah gasaw auhiodu iah gretandans iah uaifairwiandans filu. iah ïnnatgaggands qaþ du ïm. [40. 1Kb] [u, 40. 1Kb] wa auhioþ iah gretiþ. þata barn ni gadauþnoda ak slepiþ. iah bihlohun ïna. ïþ ïs usuairpands allaim [41. 1Kb] ganimiþ attan þis barnis iah aiþein iah þans miþ sis iah galaiþ ïnn. þarei uas þata barn ligando. iah fairgraip bi handau þata barn qaþuh du ïzai. taleiþa kumei. þatei ïst gaskeiriþ. mauilo. du þus qiþa. [42. 1Kb] [u, 42. 1Kb] urreis. iah suns urrais so maui iah ïddia. uas auk iere tualibe. iah usgeisnodedun faurhtein mikilai. [43. 1Kb] [u, 43. 1Kb] [uI, 1. 1Kb] iah anabauþ ïm filu ei manna ni funþi þata iah haihait ïzai giban matian. iah usstoþ iainþro iah qam [2. 1Kb] [uI, 2. 4Kb] ïn landa seinamma. iah laistidedun afar ïmma siponios ïs. iah biþe uarþ sabbato. dugann ïn synagoge laisian. iah managai hausiandans sildaleikidedun qipandans. waþro þamma þata iah wo so handugeino [3. 1Kb] [uI, 3. 6Kb] so gibano ïmma ei [10. 1Kb] ak gaskohai suliom. iah ni uasiaiþ tuaim paidom. iah qaþ du ïm. þiswaduh þei gaggaiþ [11. 1Kb] [uI, 11. 1Kb] ïn gard. þar saliaiþ. unte usgaggaiþ iainþro. iah sua managai sue ni andnimaina þiudans herodes. suikunþ allis uarþ namo ïs. iah [15. 1Kb] [uI, 15. 1Kb] qaþ þatei ïohannis sa daupiands us dauþaim urrais. duþþe uaurkiand þos mahteis ïn ïmma. anþarai [16. 1Kb] [uI, 16. 6Kb] þan qeþun þatei helias ïst. anþarai þan qeþun þatei praufetes ïst sue ains þize praufete. gahausiands [17. 1Kb] [uI, 17. 1Kb] þan herodes qaþ þatei þammei ik haubiþ afmaimait ïohanne. sa ïst. sah urrais [23. 1Kb] [uI, 23. 1Kb] [24. 1Kb] [uI, 24. 1Kb] iah suor ïzai þatei þiswah þei bidiais mik. giba þus und halba þiudangardia meina. ïþ si usgaggandei [25. 1Kb] [uI, 25. 8Kb] qaþ du aiþein seinai. wis bidiau. ïþ si qaþ. haubidis ïohannis þis daupiandins. iah atgaggandei sunsaiu sniumundo du þamma þiudana baþ qiþandei. uiliau ei mis gibais ana mesa haubiþ ïohannis  [26. 1Kb] [uI, 26. 1Kb] þis daupiandins. iah gaurs uaurþans sa þiudans ïn þize aiþe iah ïn þize miþanakumbiandane ni [27. 1Kb] [uI, 27. 1Kb] [28. 1Kb] [uI, 28. 1Kb] uilda ïzai ufbrikan. iah suns ïnsandiands sa þiudans spaikulatur anabauþ briggan haubiþ ïs. ïþ ïs galeiþands afmaimait ïmma haubiþ ïn karkarai iah atbar þata haubiþ ïs ana mesa iah atgaf ïta þizai mauiai [29. 1Kb] iah so maui atgaf ïta aiþein seinai. iah gahausiandans siponios ïs qemun iah usnemun leik ïs iah [30. 1Kb] [uI, 30. 1Kb] galagidedun ïta ïn hlaiua. iah gaïddiedun apaustauleis du ïesua iah gataihun ïmma allata iah sua filu [53. 1Kb] [54. 1Kb] sue gatauidedun------iah duatsniuun. iah usgaggandam ïm us skipa sunsaiu ufkunnandans ïna. [55. 1Kb] [uI, 55. 16Kb] birinnandans all þata gaui dugunnun ana badiam þans ubil habandans bairan. þadei hausidedun ei ïs [56. 1Kb] [uI, 56. 23Kb] uesi. iah þiswaduh þadei ïddia ïn haimos aiþþau baurgs aiþþau ïn ueihsa. ana gagga lagidedun siukans [uII, 1. 1Kb] iah bedun ïna ei þau skauta uastios ïs attaitokeina. iah sua managai sue attaitokun ïmma. ganesun. iah [2. 1Kb] [uII, 2. 1Kb] gaqemun sik du ïmma fareisaieis iah sumai þize bokarie qimandans us ïairusaulymim. iah gasaiwandans sumans þize siponie ïs gamainiaim handum. þat-ïst unþuahanaim. matiandans hlaibans. [3. 1Kb] [uII, 3. 9Kb] ïþ fareisaieis iah allai ïudaieis niba ufta þuahand handuns ni matiand. habandans anafilh þize sinistane. [4. 1Kb] [uII, 4. 1Kb] iah af maþla niba daupiand ni matiand. iah anþar ïst manag. þatei andnemun du haban. daupeinins [5. 1Kb] [uII, 5. 8Kb] stikle iah aurkie iah katile iah ligre. þaþroh þan frehun ïna þai fareisaieis iah þai bokarios. duwe þai siponios þeinai ni gaggand bi þammei anafulhun þai sinistans ak unþuahanaim handum matiand [6. 1Kb] [uII, 6. 1Kb] hlaif. ïp ïs andhafiands qaþ du ïm þatei uaila praufetida esaïas bi ïzuis þans liutans. sue gameliþ [7. 1Kb] [uII, 7. 1Kb] ïst. so managei uairilom mik sueraiþ. ïþ hairto ïze fairra habaiþ sik mis. ïp suare mik blotand laisiandans [8. 1Kb] [uII, 8. 4Kb] laiseinins. anabusnins manne. afletandans raihtis anabusn guþs habaiþ þatei anafulhun mannans. [9. 1Kb] [uII, 9. 1Kb] daupeinins aurkie iah stikle iah anþar galeik sualeikata manag tauiiþ. iah qaþ du ïm. uaila ïnuidiþ [10. 1Kb] [uII, 10. 1Kb] anabusn guþs. ei þata anafulhano ïzuar fastaiþ. moses auk raihtis qaþ. suerai attan þeinana iah [11. 1Kb] [uII, 11. 1Kb] aiþein þeina. iah sei ubil qiþai attin seinamma aiþþau aiþein seinai. dauþau afdauþiaidau. ïþ ius qiþiþ. iabai qiþai manna attin seinamma aiþþau aiþein. kaurban. þatei ïst maiþms þiswah þatei us [12. 1Kb] [uII, 12. 7Kb] [13. 1Kb] [uII, 13. 23Kb] mis gabatnis. iah ni fraletiþ ïna ni uaiht tauian attin seinamma aiþþau aiþein seinai. blauþiandans uaurd guþs þizai anabusnai ïzuarai. þei anafulhuþ. iah galeik sualeikata manag tauiiþ.  [14. 1Kb] [15. 1Kb] [uII, 15. 9Kb] Iah athaitands alla þo managein qaþ ïm. hauseiþ mis allai iah fraþiaiþ. ni uaihts ïst utaþro mans ïnngaggando ïn ïna. þatei magi ïna gamainian. ak þata utgaggando us mann þata ïst þata gamainiando mannan. [16. 1Kb] [uII, 16. 1Kb] [17. 1Kb] [uII, 17. 1Kb] iabai was habai ausona hausiandona. gahausiai. iah þan galaiþ ïn gard us þizai managein. frehun [18. 1Kb] [uII, 18. 1Kb] ïna siponios ïs bi þo gaiukon. iah qaþ du ïm. sua iah ius unuitans siiuþ. ni fraþiiþ þammei all [19. 1Kb] [uII, 19. 17Kb] þata utapro ïnngaggando ïn mannan ni mag ïna gamainian. unte ni galeiþiþ ïmma ïn hairto ak ïn [20. 1Kb] uamba iah ïn urrunsa usgaggiþ. gahreineiþ allans matins. qaþuþ-þan þatei þata us mann usgaggando [21. 1Kb] þata gamaineiþ mannan. ïnnaþro auk us hairtin manne mitoneis ubilos usgaggand. kalkinassius [22. 1Kb] [uII, 22. 18Kb] horinassius maurþra þiubia faihufrikeins unseleins liutei aglaitei augo unsel uaiamereins hauhhairtei [23. 1Kb] [uII, 23. 1Kb] unuiti. þo alla ubilona ïnnaþro usgaggand iah gagamainiand mannan. iah iainþro usstandands [24. 1Kb] [uII, 24. 1Kb] galaiþ ïn markos tyre iah seidone, iah galeiþands ïn gard ni uilda uitan mannan [25. 1Kb] [uII, 25. 24Kb] iah ni mahta galaugnian. gahausiandei raihtis qino bi ïna. þizozei habaida dauhtar ahman unhrainiana. [26. 1Kb] [uII, 26. 1Kb] qimandei draus du fotum ïs. uasuþ þan so qino haiþno. saurinifynikiska gabaurþai. iah baþ ïna [27. 1Kb] ei þo unhulþon usuaurpi us dauhtr ïzos. ïþ ïesus qaþ du ïzai. let faurþis sada uairþan barna. unte ni [28. 1Kb] [uII, 28. 1Kb] goþ ïst niman hlaib barne iah uairpan hundam. ïþ si andhof ïmma iah qaþ du ïmma. iai frauia. iah [29. 1Kb] auk hundos undaro biuda matiand af drauhsnom barne. iah qaþ du ïzai. ïn þis uaurdis gagg. usïddia [30. 1Kb] unhulþo us dauhtr þeinai. iah galeiþandei du garda seinamma bigat unhulþon usgaggana iah þo [31. 1Kb] [uII, 31. 1Kb] dauhtar ligandein ana ligra. iah aftra galeipands af markom tyre iah seidone qam at marein galeilaie [32. 1Kb] [uII, 32. 1Kb] miþ tueihnaim markom daikapaulaios. iah berun du ïmma baudana stammana iah bedun ïna ei  [33. 1Kb] [uII, 33. 1Kb] lagidedi ïmma handau. iah afnimands ïna af managein sundro lagida figgrans seinans ïn ausona ïmma [34. 1Kb] iah speuands attaitok tuggon ïs. iah ussaiwands du himina gasuogida iah qaþ du ïmma. aiffaþa. þatei [35. 1Kb] ïst uslukn. iah sunsaiu usluknodedun ïmma hliumans iah andbundnoda bandi tuggons ïs iah rodida [36. 1Kb] [uII, 36. 19Kb] raihtaba. iah anabauþ ïm ei mann ni qeþeina. wan filu ïs ïm anabauþ. mais þamma eis meridedun. [37. 1Kb] iah ufarassau sildaleikidedun qiþandans. uaila allata gatauida. iah baudans gatauiiþ gahausian iah [uIII, 1. 1Kb] [uIII, 1. 19Kb] unrodiandans rodian. ïn iainaim þan dagam aftra at filu managai managein uisandein iah ni habandam [2. 1Kb] [uIII, 2. 7Kb] wa matidedeina. athaitands siponians qaþuh du ïm. ïnfeinoda du þizai managein. unte iu dagans [3. 1Kb] þrins miþ mis uesun iah ni haband wa matiaina. iah iabai fraleta ïns lausqiþrans du garda ïze. ufligand [4. 1Kb] [uIII, 4. 4Kb] ana uiga. sumai raihtis ïze fairraþro qemun. iah andhofun ïmma siponios ïs. waþro þans mag [5. 1Kb] was gasoþian hlaibam ana auþidai. iah frah ïns. wan managans habaiþ hlaibans. ïþ eis qeþun. sibun. [6. 1Kb] [uIII, 6. 1Kb] iah anabauþ þizai managein anakumbian ana airþai iah nimands þans sibun hlaibans iah auiliudonds [7. 1Kb] [uIII, 7. 1Kb] gabrak iah atgaf siponiam seinaim. ei atlagidedeina faur. iah atlagidedun faur þo managein. iah [8. 1Kb] habaidedun fiskans fauans. iah þans gaþiuþiands qaþ ei atlagidedeina iah þans. gamatidedun þan iah [9. 1Kb] [uIII, 9. 1Kb] sadai uaurþun iah usnemun laibos gabruko sibun spyreidans. uesunuþ-þan þai matiandans sue fiduor [10. 1Kb] [uIII, 10. 10Kb] þusundios. iah fralailot ïns. iah galaiþ sunsaiu ïn skip miþ siponiam seinaim iah qam ana fera magdalan. [11. 1Kb] iah urrunnun fareisaieis iah dugunnun miþsokian ïmma sokiandans du ïmma taikn us himina [12. 1Kb] [uIII, 12. 1Kb] fraisandans ïna. iah ufsuogiands ahmin seinamma qaþ. wa þafa kuni taikn sokeip. amen qiþa ïzuis. [13. 1Kb] iabai gibaidau kunia þamma taikne. iah afletands ïns galeipands aftra ïn skip uslaiþ hindar marein. [14. 1Kb] [15. 1Kb] [uIII, 15. 1Kb] iah ufarmunnodedun niman hlaibans iah niba ainana hlaif ni habaidedun miþ sis ïn skipa. iah anabauþ [16. 1Kb] ïm qiþands. saiwiþ ei atsaiwiþ ïzuis þis beistis fareisaie iah beistis herodis. iah þahtedun miþ [17. 1Kb] [uIII, 17. 7Kb] sis misso qiþandans. unte hlaibans ni habam. iah fraþiands ïesus qaþ du ïm. wa þaggkeiþ. unte hlaibans [18. 1Kb] ni habaiþ. ni nauh fraþiiþ nih uituþ. unte daubata habaiþ hairto ïzuar. augona habandans ni gasaiwiþ [19. 1Kb] iah ausona habandans ni gahauseiþ. iah ni gamunuþ. þan þans fimf hlaibans gabrak fimf þusundiom. [20. 1Kb] [uIII, 20. 1Kb] wan manaios tainions fullos gabruko usnemuþ. qeþun du ïmma. tualif. aþþan þan þans sibun hlaibans fiduor þusundiom. wan managans spyreidans fullans gabruko usnemuþ. ïþ eis qeþun sibun. [21. 1Kb] [uIII, 21. 3Kb] [22. 1Kb] [uIII, 22. 16Kb] iah qaþ du ïm. waiua ni nauh fraþiiþ. iah qemun ïn beþanïin   [23. 1Kb] [uIII, 23. 10Kb] iah berun du ïmma blindan iah bedun ïna ei ïmma attaitoki. iah fairgreipands handu þis [24. 1Kb] [uIII, 24. 1Kb] blindins ustauh ïna utana ueihsis iah speiuands ïn augona ïs atlagiands ana handuns [25. 1Kb] [uIII, 25. 35Kb] seinos frah ïna. gau wa sewi. iah ussaiwands qaþ. gasaiwa mans þatei sue bagmans gasaiwa [26. 1Kb] [uIII, 26. 1Kb] gaggandans. þaþroh aftra galagida handuns ana þo augona ïs iah gatauida ïna ussaiwan. [27. 1Kb] [uIII, 27. 1Kb] iah aftra gasatiþs uarþ iah gasaw bairhtaba allans. iah ïnsandida ïna du garda ïs qiþands. ni in þata ueihs gaggais. ni mannhun qiþais ïn þamma uehsa. iah usïddia ïesus iah siponios ïs ïn uehsa kaisarias þizos filippaus iah ana uiga frah siponians seinans qiþands du ïm. wana mik qiþand [28. 1Kb] [uIII, 28. 1Kb] mans uisan. ïþ eis andhofun. ïohannen þana daupiand. iah anþarai helian. sumaih þan ainana praufete. [29. 1Kb] iah ïs qaþ du ïm. aþþan ius wana mik qiþiþ uisan. andhafiands þan paitrus qaþ du ïmma þu ïs [30. 1Kb] [31. 1Kb] [uIII, 31. 34Kb] xristus. iah faurbauþ ïm ei mannhun ni qeþeina bi ïna. iah dugann laisian ïns. þatei skal sunus mans filu uinnan iah uskiusan skulds ïst fram þaim sinistam iah þaim auhumistam gudiam iah bokariam [32. 1Kb] iah usqiman iah afar þrins dagans usstandan. iah suikunþaba þata uaurd rodida. iah aftiuhands ïna [33. 1Kb] [uIII, 33. 1Kb] paitrus dugann andbeitan ïna. ïþ ïs gauandiands sik iah gasaiwands þans siponians seinans andbait [34. 1Kb] paitrau qiþands. gagg hindar mik satana. unte ni fraþiis þaim guþs ak þaim manne. iah athaitands þo managein miþ siponiam seinaim qaþ du ïm. sei uili afar mis laistian ïnuidai sik silban iah nimai galgan [35. 1Kb] [uIII, 35. 1Kb] seinana iah laistiai mik. sei allis uili saiuala seina ganasian. fraqisteiþ ïzai. ïþ sei fraqisteiþ [36. 1Kb] [uIII, 36. 1Kb] saiualai seinai ïn meina iah ïn þizos aiuaggelions. ganasiiþ þo. wa auk boteiþ mannan. iabai gageigaiþ [37. 1Kb] þana fairwu allana iah gasleiþeiþ sik saiualai seinai. aiþþau wa gibiþ manna ïnmaidein saiualos [38. 1Kb] [uIII, 38. 1Kb] seinaizos. unte sei skamaiþ sik meina iah uaurde meinaize ïn gabaurþai þizai horinondein iah frauaurhton. iah sunus mans skamaiþ sik ïs. þan qimiþ ïn uulþau attins seinis miþ aggilum þaim ueiham. [IX, 1. 1Kb] [IX, 1. 1Kb] iah qaþ du ïm. amen qiþa ïzuis þatei sind sumai þize her standandane. þai ïze ni kausiand dauþaus. [2. 1Kb] unte gasaiwand þiudinassu guþs qumanana ïn mahtai. iah afar dagans saihs ganam ïesus paitru iah ïakobu iah ïohannen iah ustauh ïns ana fairguni hauh sundro ainans iah ïnmaidida sik ïn anduairþia [3. 1Kb] [IX, 3. 5Kb] ïze. iah uastios ïs uaurþun glitmuniandeins weitos sue snaius. sualeikos sue uullareis ana airþai ni [4. 1Kb] [IX, 4. 1Kb] [5. 1Kb] [IX, 5. 1Kb] mag gaweitian. iah ataugiþs uarþ ïm helias miþ mose. iah uesun rodiandans miþ ïesua. iah andhafiands paitrus qaþ du ïesua. rabbei goþ ist unsis her uisan. iah gauaurkiam hliians þrins. þus ainana  [6. 1Kb] [7. 1Kb] iah mose ainana iah ainana heliiin. ni auk uissa wa rodidedi. uesun auk usagidai. iah uarþ milhma ufarskaduiands ïm. iah qam stibna us þamma milhmin. sa ïst sunus meins sa liuba. þamma hausiaip. [8. 1Kb] [IX, 8. 1Kb] [9. 1Kb] [IX, 9. 1Kb] iah anaks ïnsaiwandans ni þanaseiþs ainohun gasewun alia ïesu ainana miþ sis. dalaþ þan atgaggandam ïm af þamma fairgunia anabauþ ïm ei mannhun ni spillodedeina. þatei gasewun. niba biþe sunus [10. 1Kb] mans us dauþaim usstoþi. iah þata uaurd habaidedun du sis misso sokiandans. wa ïst þata us dauþaim [11. 1Kb] [IX, 11. 1Kb] [12. 1Kb] [IX, 12. 9Kb] usstandan. iah frehun ïna qiþandans. unte qiþand þai bokarios þatei helias skuli qiman faurþis. ïþ ïs andhafiands qaþ du ïm. helias sueþauh qimands faurþis aftra gaboteiþalla. iah waiuagameliþ ïst bisunu mans [13. 1Kb] [IX, 13. 4Kb] eimanag uinnai iah frakunþs uairþai. akei qiþa ïzuis. þatei iu helias qam iah gatauidedun ïmma sua filu sue [14. 1Kb] [IX, 14. 1Kb] uildedun. suasue gameliþ ïst bi ïna. iah qimands at siponiam gasaw filu manageins bi ïns iah bokarians [15. 1Kb] [IX, 15. 8Kb] sokiandans miþ ïm. iah sunsaiu alla managei gasaiwandans ïna usgeisnodedun iah durinnandans ïnuitun [16. 1Kb] [IX, 16. 7Kb] [17. 1Kb] ïna. iah frah þans bokarians. wa sokeiþ miþ þaim. iah andhafiands ains us þizai managein qaþ. [18. 1Kb] [IX, 18. 7Kb] laisari brahta sunu meinana du þus habandan ahman unrodiandan. iah þiswaruh þei ïna gafahiþ. gauairpiþ ïna iah waþiiþ iah kriustiþ tunþuns seinans iah gastaurkniþ. iah qaþ siponiam þeinaim ei [19. 1Kb] [IX, 19. 1Kb] usdreibeina ïna. iah ni mahtedun. ïþ ïs andhafiands ïm. qaþ. o kuni ungalaubiando. und wa at [20. 1Kb] [IX, 20. 1Kb] ïzuis siiau. und wa þulau ïzuis. bairiþ ïna du mis. iah brahtedun ïna at ïmma. iah gasaiwands ïna [21. 1Kb] sunsaiu sa ahma tahida ïna iah driusands ana airþa ualunoda waþiands. iah frah þana attan is. wan lagg [22. 1Kb] [IX, 22. 3Kb] mel ïst ei þata uarþ ïmma. ïþ ïs qaþ. us barniskia. iah ufta ïna iah ïn fon atuarþ iah ïn uato. ei [23. 1Kb] usqistidedi ïmma. akei iabai mageis. hilp unsara gableiþiands unsis. ïþ ïesus qaþ du ïmma þata [24. 1Kb] iabai mageis galaubian. allata mahteig þamma galaubiandin. iah sunsaiu ufhropiands sa atta þis barnis [25. 1Kb] [IX, 25. 1Kb] miþ tagram qaþ. galaubia. hilþ meinaizos ungalaubeinais. gasaiwands þan ïesus þatei samaþ rann managei. gawotida ahmin þamma undhrainiin qiþands du ïmma. þu ahma þu unrodiands iah bauþs. [20. 1Kb] [21. 1Kb] [X, 21. 8Kb] þaruh andhafiands qaþ du ïmma. laisari. þo alla gafastaida us iundai meinai. ïþ ïesus ïnsaiwands du ïmma friioda ïna iah qaþ du ïmma. ainis þus uan ïst. gagg. sua filu sue habais frabugei [22. 1Kb] [X, 22. 14Kb] iah gif þarbam iah habais huzd ïn himinam. iah hiri laistian mik nimands galgan. ïþ ïs ganipnands [23. 1Kb] [X, 23. 1Kb] ïn þis uaurdis galaiþ gaurs. uas auk habands faihu manag. iah bisaiwands ïesus qaþ siponiam seinaim. [31. 1Kb] [32. 1Kb] [X, 32. 3Kb] aþþan managai uairþand frumans aftumans iah aftumans frumans. uesunuþ-þan ana uiga gaggandans du ïairusaulymai iah faurbigaggands ïns ïesus. iah sildaleikidedun iah afarlaistiandans faurhtai uaurþun. [33. 1Kb] [X, 33. 28Kb] iah andnimands aftra þans tualif dugann ïm qiþan. þei habaidedun ïna gadaban. þatei sai. usgaggam ïn [34. 1Kb] [X, 34. 1Kb] ïairusaulyma iah sunus mans atgibada þaim ufargudiam iah bokariam. iah gauargiand ïna dauþau iah [35. 1Kb] [X, 35. 1Kb] bilaikand ïna iah bligguand ïna iah speiuand ana ïna iah usqimand ïmma iah þridiin daga usstandiþ. iah  athabaidedun sik du ïmma ïakobus iah ïohannes sunius zaibaidaiaus qiþandans. laisari. uileima ei þatei [36. 1Kb] [37. 1Kb] [X, 37. 1Kb] þuk bidios. tauiais uggkis. ïþ ïs qaþ ïm. wa uileits tauian mik igqis. ïþ eis qeþun du ïmma. fragif ugkis ei [38. 1Kb] [X, 38. 1Kb] ains af taihsuon þeinai iah ains af hleidumein þeinai sitaiua ïn uulþau þeinamma. ïþ ïesus qaþuh du ïm. ni uituts. wis bidiats. magutsu driggkan stikl. þanei ïk driggka. iah daupeinai. þizaiei ïk daupiada. ei [39. 1Kb] [X, 39. 13Kb] daupiaindau. ïþ eis qeþun du ïmma. magu. ïþ ïesus qaþuh du ïm. sueþauh þana stikl. þanei ïk driggka. [40. 1Kb] [X, 40. 4Kb] driggkats iah þizai daupeinai. þizaiei ïk daupiada. ïþ þata du sitan af taihsuon meinai aiþþau af hleidumein [41. 1Kb] nist mein du giban alia þaimei manuiþ uas. iah gahausiandans þai taihun dugunnun unuerian bi [42. 1Kb] [X, 42. 4Kb] ïakobu iah ïohannen. ïþ ïesus aþaitands ïns qaþ du ïm. uituþ þatei þuggkiand reikinon þiudom. gafrauiinond [43. 1Kb] ïm. ïþ þai mikilans ïze gaualdand ïm. ïþ ni sua siiai ïn ïzuis. ak sawazuh sei uili uairþan mikils ïn [44. 1Kb] [X, 44. 1Kb] [45. 1Kb] [X, 45. 1Kb] ïzuis. siiai ïzuar andbahts. iah sei uili ïzuara uairþan frumists. siiai allaim skalks. iah auk sunus [46. 1Kb] [X, 46. 12Kb] mans ni qam at andbahtiam ak andbahtian iah giban saiuala seina faur managans saun. iah qemun ïn ïairikon. iah usgaggandin ïmma iainþro miþ siponiam seinaim iah managein ganohai sunus teimaiaus [47. 1Kb] barteimaiaus blinda sat faur uig du aihtron. iah gahausiands þatei ïesus sa nazoraius ïst dugann [48. 1Kb] hropian iah qiþan. sunau daueidis ïesu. armai mik. iah wotidedun ïmma managai ei gaþahaidedi. ïþ [49. 1Kb] [X, 49. 1Kb] ïs filu mais hropida. sunau daueidis. armai mik. iah gastandands ïesus haihait atuopian ïna. iah uopidedun [50. 1Kb] [X, 50. 16Kb] þana blindan qiþandans du ïmma þrafstei þuk. urreis. uopeiþ þuk. ïþ ïs afuairpands uastiai [51. 1Kb] seinai ushlaupands qam at ïesu. iah andhafiands qaþ du ïmma ïesus. wa uileis ei tauiau þus. ïþ sa [52. 1Kb] [X, 52. 6Kb] blinda qaþ du ïmma. rabbaunei. ei ussaiwau. ïþ ïesus qaþ du ïmma. gagg. galaubeins þeina ganasida [XI, 1. 1Kb] [XI, 1. 8Kb] þuk. iah sunsaiu ussaw iah laistida ïn uiga ïesu. iah biþe newa uesun ïairusalem ïn beþsfagein  [2. 1Kb] [XI, 2. 9Kb] iah biþaniïn at fairgunia aleuiin. ïnsandida tuans siponie seinaize iah qaþ du ïm. gaggats ïn haim þo uiþrauairþon ïggqis iah sunsaiu ïnngaggandans ïn þo baurg bigitats fulan gabundanana. ana þammei [3. 1Kb] [XI, 3. 1Kb] nauh ainshun manne ni sat. andbindandans ïna attiuhits. iah iabai was ïggqis qiþai. duwe þata tauiats. [4. 1Kb] qiþaits þatei frauia þis gairneiþ. iah sunsaiu ïna ïnsandeiþ hidre. galiþun þan iah bigetun fulan gabundanana [5. 1Kb] at daura uta ana gagga iah andbundun ïna. iah sumai þize iainar standandane qeþun [6. 1Kb] [XI, 6. 1Kb] du ïm. wa tauiats andbindandans þana fulan. ïþ eis qeþun du ïm. suasue anabauþ ïm ïesus. iah [7. 1Kb] [XI, 7. 6Kb] lailotun ïns. iah brahtedun þana fulan at ïesua iah galagidedun ana uastios seinos. iah gasat ana [8. 1Kb] [XI, 8. 3Kb] ïna. managai þan uastiom seinaim strauidedun ana uiga. sumai astans maimaitun us bagmam iah [9. 1Kb] [XI, 9. 17Kb] strauidedun ana uiga. iah þai fauragaggandans hropidedun qiþandans. osanna þiuþida sa qimanda [10. 1Kb] [XI, 10. 1Kb] ïn namin frauiins. þiuþido so qimandei þiudangardi ïn namin attins unsaris daueidis. osanna in [11. 1Kb] [XI, 11. 1Kb] hauhistiam. iah galaiþ ïn ïairusaulyma ïesus iah ïn alh iah bisaiwands alla at andanahtia iuþan uisandin [12. 1Kb] [XI, 12. 1Kb] weilai usïddia ïn beþanian miþ þaim tualibim. iah ïftumin daga usstandandam ïm us beþaniïn [13. 1Kb] [XI, 13. 1Kb] gredags uas. iah gasaiwands smakkabagm fairraþro habandan lauf atïddia. ei aufto bigeti wa [14. 1Kb] ana ïmma. iah qimands at ïmma ni uaiht bigat ana ïmma niba lauf. ni auk uas mel smakkane. iah usbairands qaþ du ïmma. ni þanaseiþs us þus aiu manna akran matiai. iah gahausidedun þai siponios [15. 1Kb] [XI, 15. 1Kb] ïs. iah ïddiedun du ïairusaulymai. iah atgaggands ïesus ïn alh dugann usuairpan þans frabugiandans [16. 1Kb] [XI, 16. 1Kb] iah bugiandans ïn alh iah mesa skattiane iah sitlans þize frabugiandane ahakim usualtida. iah [17. 1Kb] [XI, 17. 1Kb] ni lailot ei was þairhberi kas þairh þo alh. iah laisida qiþands du ïm. niu gameliþ ïst þatei razn mein [18. 1Kb] razn bido haitada allaim þiudom. ïþ ius gatauideduþ ïta du filigria uaidediane. iah gahausidedun þai bokarios iah gudiane auhumistans iah sokidedun. waiua ïmma usqistidedeina. ohtedun auk ïna. [19. 1Kb] unte alla managei sildaleikidedun ïn laiseinais ïs. iah biþe andanahti uarþ. usïddia ut us þizai [20. 1Kb] [XI, 20. 1Kb] [21. 1Kb] baurg. iah ïn maurgin laurgaggandans gasewun þana smakkabagm þaursiana us uaurtim. iah gamunands [22. 1Kb] paitrus qaþ du ïmma. rabbei sai. smakkabagms þanei fraqast. gaþaursnoda. iah andhafiands [23. 1Kb] [XI, 23. 4Kb] ïesus qaþ du ïm. habaiþ galaubein guþs. amen auk qiþa ïzuis. þiswazuh ei qiþai du þamma fairgunia. ushafei þuk iah uairp þus ïn marein. iah ni tuzueriai ïn hairtin seinamma ak galaupiai þata.  [24. 1Kb] ei þatei qiþiþ. gagaggiþ. uairþiþ ïmma þiswah þei qiþiþ. duþþe qiþa ïzuis. allata þiswah þei [25. 1Kb] bidiandans sokeiþ. galaubeiþ þatei nimiþ. iah uairþiþ ïzuis. iah þan standaiþ bidiandans. afletaiþ. [26. 1Kb] [XI, 26. 1Kb] iabai wa habaiþ uiþra wana. ei iah atta ïzuar sa ïn himinam afletai ïzuis missadedins ïzuaros. ïþ [27. 1Kb] iabai ius ni afletiþ. ni þau atta ïzuar sa ïn himinam afletiþ ïzuis missadedins ïzuaros. iah ïddiedun aftra du ïairusaulymai, iah ïn alh warbondin ïmma atiddiedun du ïmma þai auhumistans gudians iah bokarios [28. 1Kb] [XI, 28. 1Kb] iah sinistans iah qeþun du ïmma. ïn wamma ualdufnie þata tauiis. iah was þus þata ualdufni [29. 1Kb] [XI, 29. 1Kb] atgaf ei þata tauiis. ïþ ïesus andhafiands qaþ du ïm. frahna iah ïk ïzuis ainis uaurdis iah andhafiiþ [30. 1Kb] [XI, 30. 1Kb] mis. iah qiþa ïzuis ïn wamma ualdufnie taþa tauia. daupeins ïohannis uzuh himina uas þau [31. 1Kb] [XI, 31. 4Kb] uzuh mannam. andhafeiþ mis. iah þahtedun du sis misso qiþandans. iabai qiþam. us himina. qiþiþ. [32. 1Kb] [XI, 32. 4Kb] aþþan duwe ni galaubideduþ ïmma. ak qiþam. us mannam. uhtedun þo managein. allai auk alakio [33. 1Kb] [XI, 33. 1Kb] habaidedun ïohannen þatei bi suniai praufetes uas. iah andhafiandans qeþun du ïesua. ni uitum. iah [XII, 1. 1Kb] [XII, 1. 2Kb] andhafiands ïesus qaþ du ïm. nih ïk ïzuis qiþa. ïn wamma ualdufnie þata tauia. iah dugann ïm ïn gaiukom qiþan. ueinagard ussatida manna iah bisatida ïna faþom iah usgrof dal uf mesa iah gatimrida [2. 1Kb] [XII, 2. 1Kb] kelikn iah anafalh ïna uaurstuiam iah aflaiþ aliaþ. iah ïnsandida du þaim uaurstuiam at mel skalk [3. 1Kb] [XII, 3. 1Kb] ei at þaim uaurstuiam nemi akranis þis ueinagardis. ïþ eis nimandans ïna usblugguun iah ïnsandidedun [4. 1Kb] [XII, 4. 1Kb] laushandian. iah aftra ïnsandida du ïm anþarana skalk. iah þana stainam uairpandans gaaiuiskodedun [5. 1Kb] [XII, 5. 1Kb] iah haubiþ uundan brahtedun iah ïnsandidedun ganaitidana. iah aftra ïnsandida anþarana. iah [6. 1Kb] [XII, 6. 1Kb] iainana afslohun iah managans anþarans. sumans usbligguandans. sumansuh þan usqimandans. þanuh nauhþanuh ainana sunu aigands liubana sis ïnsandida iah þana du ïm spedistana qiþands þatei gaaistand [7. 1Kb] sunu meinana. ïþ iainai þai uaurtsuians qeþun du sis misso. þatei sa ïst sa arbinumia. hiriiþ. [20. 1Kb] [21. 1Kb] sibun broþrahans uesun iah sa frumista nam qen iah gasuiltands ni bilaiþ fraiua. iah anþar nam þo [22. 1Kb] [XII, 22. 1Kb] iah gadauþnoda iah ni sa bilaiþ fraiua. iah þridia samaleiko. iah nemun þo samaleiko þai sibun iah [23. 1Kb] [XII, 23. 4Kb] ni biliþun fraiua. spedumista allaize gasualt iah so qens. ïn þizai usstassai. þan usstandand. wariamma [24. 1Kb] [XII, 24. 1Kb] ïze uairþiþ qens. þai auk sibun aihtedun þo du qenai. iah andhafiands ïesus qaþ du ïm. niu [25. 1Kb] [XII, 25. 1Kb] duþe airziai siiuþ. ni kunnandans mela nih maht guþs. allis þan usstandand us dauþaim. ni liugand. [26. 1Kb] [XII, 26. 6Kb] ni liuganda. ak sind sue aggilius þai ïn himinam. aþþan bi dauþans þatei urreisand. niu gakunnaideduþ ana bokom mosezis ana aiwatundiai. waiua ïmma qaþ guþ qiþands. ïk ïm guþ abrahamis iah [27. 1Kb] [28. 1Kb] [XII, 28. 1Kb] guþ ïsakis iah ïakobis. nist guþ dauþaize ak qiuaize. aþþan ius filu airziai siiuþ. iah duatgaggands ains þize bokarie gahausiands ïns samana sokiandans. gasaiwands þatei uaila ïm andhof frah [29. 1Kb] ïna. waria ïst allaizo anabusne frumista. ïþ ïesus andhof ïmma þatei frumista allaizo anabusns [30. 1Kb] [XII, 30. 1Kb] hausei ïsrel. frauia guþ unsar frauia ains ïst. iah friios frauian guþ þeinana us allamma hairtin þeinamma iah us allai saiualai þeinai iah us allai gahugdai þeinai iah us allai mahtai  [31. 1Kb] [XII, 31. 5Kb] þeinai. so frumista anabusns. iah anþara galeika þizai. friios newundian þeinana sue þuk silban. maizei [32. 1Kb] þaim anþara anabusns nist. iah qaþ du ïmma sa bokareis. uaila laisari. bi suniai qast þatei ains ïst iah [33. 1Kb] nist anþar alia ïmma. iah þata du friion ïna us allamma hairtin iah us allamma frapia iah us allai saiualai iah us allai mahtai. iah þata du friion newundian sue sik silban managizo ïst allaim þaim [34. 1Kb] allbrunstim iah saudim. iah ïesus gasaiwands ïna þatei frodaba andhof qaþ du ïmma. ni fairra ïs [35. 1Kb] þiudangardiai guþs. iah ainshun þanaseiþs ni gadaursta ïna fraihnan. iah andhafiands ïesus qaþ [36. 1Kb] [XII, 36. 1Kb] laisiands ïn alh. waiua qiþand þai bokarios þatei xristus sunus ïst daueidis. silba auk daueid qaþ ïn ahmin ueihamma. qiþiþ frauia du frauiin meinamma. sit af taihsuon meinai. unte ïk galagia fiiands [37. 1Kb] [XII, 37. 11Kb] [38. 1Kb] [XII, 38. 1Kb] þeinans fotubaurd fotiue þeinaize. silba raihtis daueid qiþiþ ïna frauian. iah waþro ïmma sunus ïst. [XIII, 16. 1Kb] iah alla so managei hausidedun ïmma gabauriaba. iah qaþ du ïm ïn laiseinai seinai. saiwiþ faura------uastia [17. 1Kb] [XIII, 17. 1Kb] [18. 1Kb] seina. aþþan uai þaim qiþuhaftom iah daddiandeim ïn iainaim dagam. aþþan bidiaiþ ei ni [19. 1Kb] uairþai sa þlauhs ïzuar uintrau. uairþand auk þai dagos iainai aglo sualeika sue ni uas sualeika fram [20. 1Kb] [XIII, 20. 5Kb] anastodeinai gaskaftais. þei gaskoþ guþ. und hita iah ni uairþiþ. iah ni frauia gamaurgidedi þans dagans. ni þauh ganesi ainhun leike. akei ïn þize gaualidane. þanzei gaualida. gamaurgida þans dagans. [21. 1Kb] [22. 1Kb] [XIII, 22. 1Kb] iah þan iabai was ïzuis qiþai. sai her xristus aiþþau sai iainar. ni galaubiaiþ. unte urreisand galiugaxristieis iah galiugapraufeteis iah giband taiknins iah fauratania du afairzian. iabai mahteig [23. 1Kb] [24. 1Kb] [XIII, 24. 1Kb] siiai. iah þans gaualidans. ïþ ius saiwiþ. sai. fauragataih ïzuis allata, akei ïn iainans dagans afar þo [25. 1Kb] [XIII, 25. 12Kb] aglon iaina sauïl riqizeiþ iah mena ni gibiþ liuhaþ sein iah stairnons himinis uairþand diursandeins [26. 1Kb] iah mahteis þos ïn himinam gauagianda. iah þan gasaiwand sunu mans qimandan ïn milhmam miþ [27. 1Kb] mahtai managai iah uulþau. iah þan ïnsandeiþ aggiluns seinans iah galisiþ þans gaualidans seinans [28. 1Kb] [XIII, 28. 1Kb] af fiduor uindam fram andiam airþos und andi himinis. aþþan af smakkabagma ganimiþ þo gaiukon. [29. 1Kb] [XIII, 29. 1Kb] þan þis iuþan asts þlaqus uairþiþ iah uskeinand laubos. kunnuþ þatei newa ïst asans. suah iah [XIu, 4. 1Kb] [XIu, 4. 8Kb] ius. þan gasaiwiþ þata uairþan. kunneiþ þatei newa siiu þan------..teins þis balsanis uarþ.  [5. 1Kb] maht uesi auk þata balsan frabugian ïn managizo þau þriiahunda skatte iah giban unledaim. iah andstaurraidedun [6. 1Kb] [XIu, 6. 13Kb] [7. 1Kb] þo. ïþ ïesus qaþ. letiþ þo. duwe ïzai usþriutiþ. þannu goþ uaurstu uaurhta bi mis. sinteino auk þans unledans habaiþ miþ ïzuis iah þan uileiþ. maguþ ïm uaila tauian. ïþ mik ni sinteino habaiþ. [8. 1Kb] [9. 1Kb] [XIu, 9. 1Kb] patei habaida so. gatauida. faursnau salbon mein leik du usfilha. amen qiþa ïzuis. þiswaruh þei meriada [10. 1Kb] so aiuaggelio and alla manaseþ. iah þatei gatauida so. rodiada du gamundai ïzos. iah ïudas [11. 1Kb] ïskarioteis ains þize tualibe galaiþ du þaim gudiam. ei galeuidedi ïna ïm. ïþ eis gahausiandans faginodedun [12. 1Kb] [XIu, 12. 1Kb] iah gahaihaitun ïmma faihu giban. iah sokida. waiua gatilaba ïna galeuidedi. iah þamma frumistin daga azyme. þan paska salidedun. qeþun du ïmma þai siponios ïs. war uileis ei galeipandans [13. 1Kb] [XIu, 13. 1Kb] manuiaima. ei matiais paska. iah ïnsandida tuans siponie seinaize qaþuh du ïm. gaggats ïn þo baurg. AIuAGGELIO þAIRH LUKAN ANASTODEIþ. [1Kb]


[I, 1. 1Kb] [I, 1. 1Kb] [2. 1Kb] Unte raihtis managai dugunnun melian ïnsaht bi þos gafullaueisidons ïn uns uaihtins. suasue [3. 1Kb] [I, 3. 1Kb] anafulhun unsis. þaiei fram frumistin silbasiunios iah andbahtos uesun þis uaurdis. galeikaida iah mis iah ahmin ueihamma fram anastodeinai allaim glagguuba afarlaistiandin gahahio þus melian. batista [4. 1Kb] [5. 1Kb] [I, 5. 18Kb] þaiaufeilu ei gakunnais þize bi þei galaisiþs ïs uaurde astaþ. uas ïn dagam herodes þiudanis ïudaias gudia namin zakarias us afar abiiins iah qeins ïs us dauhtrum aharons iah namo ïzos aileisabaiþ. [6. 1Kb] uesunuh þan garaihta ba ïn anduairþia guþs gaggandona ïn allaim anabusnim iah garaihteim frauiins [7. 1Kb] [I, 7. 1Kb] unuaha. iah ni uas ïm barne. unte uas aileisabaiþ stairo iah ba framaldra dage seinaize uesun. [8. 1Kb] [I, 8. 1Kb] [9. 1Kb] [I, 9. 1Kb] uarþ þan miþþanei gudiinoda ïs ïn uikon kuniis seinis ïn anduairþia guþs bi biuhtia gudiinassaus [10. 1Kb] [I, 10. 24Kb] hlauts ïmma urrann du salian atgaggands ïn alh frauiins. iah alls hiuhma uas manageins beidandans [11. 1Kb] [I, 11. 1Kb] uta weilai þimiamins. uarþ þan ïmma ïn siunai aggilus frauiins standands af tailhsuon hunslatadis [12. 1Kb] [13. 1Kb] pymiamins. iah gadrobnoda zakarias gasaiwands iah agis disdraus ïna. qaþ þan du ïmma sa aggilus. ni ogs þus zakaria. duþe ei andhausida ïst bida þeina. iah qens þeina aileisabaiþ gabairid sunu þus [14. 1Kb] [I, 14. 1Kb] iah haitais namo ïs ïohannem. iah uairþiþ þus faheds iah suegniþa iah managai ïn gabaurþai ïs [15. 1Kb] [I, 15. 3Kb] faginond. uairþiþ auk mikils ïn anduairþia frauiins iah uein iah leiþu ni drigkid iah ahmins ueihis [16. 1Kb] gafulliada nauhþan ïn uambai aiþeins seinaizos. iah managans suniue ïsrelis gauandeiþ du frauiin [17. 1Kb] [I, 17. 1Kb] guþa ïze. iah silba fauraqimid ïn anduairþia ïs ïn ahmin iah mathai haileiïns gauandian hairtona attane [18. 1Kb] [I, 18. 9Kb] du barnam iah untalans ïn frodein garaihtaize manuian frauiin managein gafahrida. iah qaþ zakarias du þamma aggilau. bi we kunnum þata. ïk raihtis ïm sineigs iah qens meina framaldrozei ïn dagam [19. 1Kb] seinaim. iah andhafiands sa aggilus qaþ du ïmma. ïk ïm gabriel sa standands ïn anduairþia guþs iah [20. 1Kb] [I, 20. 5Kb] ïnsandiþs ïm rodian du þus iah uailamerian þus þata. iah siiais þahands iah ni magands rodian und þana dag ei uairþai   þata. duþe ei ni galaubides uaurdam meinaim. þei usfulliamda ïn mein seinamma. iah uas [21. 1Kb] [22. 1Kb] managei beidandans zakariïns. iah sildaleikidedun. wa latidedi ïna ïn þizai alh, usgaggands þan ni mahta du ïm rodian. iah froþun þammei siun gasaw ïn alh. iah silba uas banduiands ïm iah [23. 1Kb] [I, 23. 1Kb] [24. 1Kb] [I, 24. 1Kb] uas dumbs. iah uarþ biþe usfullnodedun dagos andbahteis ïs. galaiþ du garda seinamma. afaruh þan [25. 1Kb] [I, 25. 1Kb] þans dagans ïnkilpo uarþ aileisabaiþ qens ïs iah galaugnida sik menoþs fimf qiþandei. þatei sua mis [26. 1Kb] gatauida frauia ïn dagam þaimei ïnsaw afniman ïdueit mein ïn mannam. þanuh þan ïn menoþ saihstin [27. 1Kb] ïnsandiþs uas aggilus gabriel fram guþa ïn baurg galeilaias. sei haitada nazaraiþ. du magaþai ïn [28. 1Kb] [I, 28. 1Kb] fragibtim abin. þizei namo ïosef [Iu, 1. 1Kb] [Iu, 1. 12Kb] sunaus sedis. sunaus adamis. sunaus guþs. ïþ ïesus ahmins ueihis fulls gauandida sik fram ïaurdanau [2. 1Kb] [Iu, 2. 6Kb] iah tauhans uas ïn ahmin ïn auþidai dage fiduortiguns fraisans fram diabulau. iah ni matida uaiht ïn  [3. 1Kb] [Iu, 3. 1Kb] dagam iainaim iah at ustauhanaim þaim dagam biþe gredags uarþ. iah qaþ du ïmma diabulus. iabai [4. 1Kb] sunaus siiais guþs. qiþ þamma staina ei uairþai hlaibs. iah andhof ïesus uiþra ïna qiþands. gamelid [5. 1Kb] [Iu, 5. 1Kb] ïst þatei ni bi hlaib ainana libaid manna ak bi all uaurde guþs. iah ustiuhands ïna diabulaus ana [6. 1Kb] [Iu, 6. 7Kb] fairguni hauhata ataugida ïmma allans þiudinassuns þis midiungardis ïn stika melis. iah qaþ du ïmma sa diabulus. þus giba þata ualdulfni þize allata iah uulþu ïze. unte mis atgiban ïst iah þiswammeh [7. 1Kb] [Iu, 7. 10Kb] þei uiliau giba þata. þu nu iabai ïnueitis mik ïn anduairþia meinamma. uairþiþ þein all. [8. 1Kb] [Iu, 8. 1Kb] iah andhafiands ïmma ïesus qaþ. gamelid ïst. frauian guþ þeinana ïnueitais iah ïmma ainamma fullafahiais. [9. 1Kb] [Iu, 9. 1Kb] þaþroh gatauh ïna ïn ïairusalem iah gasatida ïna ana giblin alhs iah qaþ du ïmma. iabai [10. 1Kb] sunus siiais gups. uairp þuk þaþro dalaþ. gamelid ïst auk þatei aggilum seinaim anabiudiþ bi þuk [11. 1Kb] [Iu, 11. 1Kb] du gafastan þuk. iah þatei ana handum þuk ufhaband. ei wan ni gastagqiais bi staina fotu peinana. [12. 1Kb] [13. 1Kb] [Iu, 13. 1Kb] iah andhafiands qaþ ïmma ïesus. þatei qiþan ïst. ni fraisais frauian guþ þeinana. iah ustiuhands all [14. 1Kb] fraistobnio diabulus afstoþ fairra ïmma und mel. iah gauandida sik ïesus ïn mathai ahmins ïn galeilaian. [15. 1Kb] iah meriþa urrann and all gaui bisitande bi ïna. iah ïs laisida ïn gaqumþim ïze mikilids fram [16. 1Kb] [Iu, 16. 1Kb] allaim. iam qam ïn nazaraiþ. þarei uas fodiþs. iah galaiþ ïnn bi biuhtia seinamma ïn daga sabbato [17. 1Kb] [Iu, 17. 1Kb] ïn synagogein iah usstoþ sigguan bokos. iah atgibanos uesun ïmma bokos eiseiïns praufetus iah [18. 1Kb] [Iu, 18. 1Kb] uslukands þos bokos bigat stad. þarei uas gamelid. ahma frauiins ana mis. ïn þizei gasalboda mik [19. 1Kb] [Iu, 19. 7Kb] du uailamerian unledaim. ïnsandida mik du ganasian þans gamaluidans hairtin. merian frahunþanaim [20. 1Kb] [Iu, 20. 1Kb] fralet iah blindaim siun. fraletan gamaidans ïn gaþrafstein. merian ier frauiins andanem. iah faifalþ þos bokos iah usgibands andbahta gasat. iah allaim ïn þizai synagogein uesun augona fairueitiandona [21. 1Kb] [Iu, 21. 1Kb] du ïmma. dugann þan rodian du ïm þatei himma daga usfullnodedun mela þo ïn ausam [22. 1Kb] [Iu, 22. 1Kb] ïzuaraim. iah allai alakio ueituodidedun ïmma iah sildaleilkidedun bi þo uaurda anstais þo usgaggandona  [23. 1Kb] [Iu, 23. 7Kb] us munþa ïs iah qeþun. niu sa ïst sunus ïosefis. iah qaþ du ïm. aufto qiþiþ mis þo gaiukon. þu leiki hailei þuk silban. wan filu hausidedum uaurþan ïn kafarnaum. tauei iah her ïn gabaurþai. [24. 1Kb] [Iu, 24. 1Kb] [25. 1Kb] [Iu, 25. 1Kb] þeinai. qaþ þan. amen ïzuis qiþa þatei ni ainshun praufete andanems ïst ïn gabaurþai seinai. aþþan bi suniai qiþa ïzuis þatei managos uiduuons uesun ïn dagam heleiïns ïn ïsrela. þan galuknoda himins du [26. 1Kb] ieram þrim iah menoþs saihs. sue uarþ huhrus mikils and alla airþa. iah ni du ainaihun þizo ïnsandiþs [27. 1Kb] [Iu, 27. 41Kb] uas helias alia ïn saraipta seidonais du qinon uiduuon. iah managai þrutsfillai uesun uf haileisaiu [28. 1Kb] praufetau ïn ïsrela. iah ni ainshun ïze gahrainids uas alia naiman sa saur. iah fullai uaurþun [29. 1Kb] [Iu, 29. 1Kb] allai modis ïn þizai synagogein hausiandans þata. iah usstandandans uskusun ïmma ut us baurg iah brahtedun ïna und auhmisto þis fairguniis. ana þammei so baurgs ïze gatimrida uas. du afdrausian [30. 1Kb] [31. 1Kb] ïna þaþro. ïþ ïs þairhleiþands þairh midians ïns ïddia. iah galaiþ ïn kafarnaum baurg galeilaias iah [32. 1Kb] [33. 1Kb] [Iu, 33. 41Kb] uas laisiands ïns ïn sabbatim. iah sildaleikidedun bi þo laisein ïs. unte ïn ualdufnia uas uaurd ïs. iah [34. 1Kb] [Iu, 34. 1Kb] ïn þizai synagogein uas manna habands ahman unhulþons unhrainiana iah ufhropida qiþands. let. wa [35. 1Kb] uns iah þus ïesu nazorenu. qamt fraqistian unsis. kann þuk was ïs. sa ueiha guþs. iah gawotida ïmma ïesus qiþands. afdobn iah usgagg us þamma. iah gauairpands ïna sa unhulþa ïn midiaim urrann af [36. 1Kb] ïmma ni uaihtai gaskaþiands ïmma. iah uarþ afslauþnan allans iah rodidedun du sis misso qiþandans. wa uaurde þata. þatei miþ ualdufnia iah mahtai anabiudiþ þaim unhrainiam ahmam iah usgaggand. [42. 1Kb] [Iu, 42. 1Kb] iah gasakands ïm ni lailot þos rodian. unte uissedun silban xristu ïna uisan. biþeh þan uarþ dags. usgaggands galaiþ ana auþiana stad. iah manageins sokidedun ïna iah qemun und ïna iah gahabaidedun [43. 1Kb] [Iu, 43. 1Kb] ïna. ei ni afliþi fairra ïm. þaruh ïs qaþ du ïm. þatei iah þaim anþaraim baurgim uailamerian ïk skal  [44. 1Kb] [u, 1. 1Kb] bi þiudangardia guþs. unte duþe mik ïnsandida. iah uas meriands ïn synagogim galeilaias. iah uarþ miþþanei managei anatramp ïna du hausian uaurd guþs. iah ïs silba uas standands newa saiua [2. 1Kb] gainnesaraiþ iah gasaw tua skipa standandona at þamma saiua. ïþ fiskians afgaggandans af ïm usþuohun [3. 1Kb] [u, 3. 6Kb] natia. galaiþ þan ïn ain þize skipe. þatei uas seimonis. haihait ïna aftiuhan fairra staþa leitil [4. 1Kb] [u, 4. 9Kb] iah gasitands laisida us þamma skipa manageins. biþeh þan gananþida rodiands qaþ du seimonau. [9. 1Kb] qaþ þan ïesus du ïm. fraihna ïzuis. wa skuld ïst sabbato dagam. þiuþ tauian þau unþiuþ tauian. saiuala [10. 1Kb] [uI, 10. 9Kb] ganasian þau usqistian. iah ussaiwands allans ïns qaþ du ïmma. ufrakei þo handu þeina. þaruh [11. 1Kb] [uI, 11. 1Kb] ïs ufrakida. iah gastoþ so handus ïs suasue so anþara. ïþ eis fullai uaurþun unfrodeins iah rodidedun [12. 1Kb] [uI, 12. 19Kb] du sis misso. wa tauidideina þamma ïesua. iah uarþ ïn dagam þaim ei usïddia ïesus ïn fairguni bidian [13. 1Kb] [uI, 13. 1Kb] iah uas naht þairhuakands ïn bidai guþs. iah biþe uarþ dags atuopida siponians seinans iah gaualiands [14. 1Kb] us ïm tualib. þanzei iah apaustuluns namnida. seimon. þanei iah namnida paitru. iah andraian [15. 1Kb] [uI, 15. 1Kb] broþar ïs. ïakobu iah ïohannen. filippu iah barþulomaiu. maþþaiu iah þoman. ïakobu þana alfaius [16. 1Kb] [uI, 16. 1Kb] iah seimon þana haitanan zeloten. ïudan ïakobaus iah ïudan ïskarioten. sei iah uarþ galeuiands [17. 1Kb] [uI, 17. 27Kb] ïna. iah atgaggands dalaþ miþ ïm gastoþ ana stada ïbnamma iah hiuma siponie ïs iah hansa mikila manageins af allamma ïudaias iah ïairusalem. iah þize faur marein tyre iah seidone iah anþaraizo  [18. 1Kb] baurge. þaiei qemun hausian ïmma iah hailian sik sauhte seinaizo. iah þai anahabaidans fram ahmam [19. 1Kb] unhrainiaim iah gahailidai uaurþun. iah alla managei sokidedun attekan ïmma. unte mahts af ïmma [20. 1Kb] [uI, 20. 7Kb] usïddia iah ganasida allans. iah ïs ushafiands augona seina du siponiam seinaim qaþ. audagai ius [21. 1Kb] [uI, 21. 1Kb] unledans ahmin. unte ïzuara ïst þiudangardi himine. audagai ius gredagans nu. unte sadai uairþiþ. [3. 1Kb] [uII, 3. 1Kb] sei uas ïmma suers. gahausiands þan bi ïesu ïnsandida du ïmma sinistans ïudaie bidiands [4. 1Kb] [uII, 4. 1Kb] ïna. ei qimi iah ganasidedi þana skalk ïs. ïþ eis qimandans at ïesua bedun ïna usdaudo [5. 1Kb] [uII, 5. 1Kb] qiþandans. þatei uairþs ïst þammei fragibis þata. unte friioþ þiuda unsara iah synagogein ïs gatimrida [6. 1Kb] [uII, 6. 1Kb] unsis ïþ ïesus ïddiuh miþ ïm iah iuþan ni fairra uisandin ïmma þamma garda ïnsandida du ïmma. sa hundafads friionds qiþands du ïmma. frauia. ni draibei þuk. unte ni ïm uairþs ei uf hrot mein [7. 1Kb] ïnngaggais. duþei ni mik silban uairþana rahnida at þus qiman. ak qiþ uaurda iah gahailnid sa [8. 1Kb] [uII, 8. 1Kb] þiumagus meins. iah þan auk ïk manna ïm uf ualdufnia gasatids. habands uf mis silbin gadrauhtins. iah qiþa du þamma. gagg. iah gaggid. iah anþaramma. qim her. iah qimid. iah du skalka meinamma. [32. 1Kb] [uIII, 32. 1Kb] ei ni anabudi ïm ïn afgrundiþa galeiþan. uasuþ-þan iainar hairda sueine managaize haldanaize ïn [33. 1Kb] [uIII, 33. 1Kb] þamma fairgunia. iah bedun ïna ei uslaubidedi ïm ïn þo galeiþan. iah uslaubida ïm. usgaggandans þan suns þai unhulþans af þamma mann galiþun ïn þo sueina iah rann so uriþus and driuson ïn þana [34. 1Kb] [uIII, 34. 1Kb] marisaiu iah afwapnodedun. [19. 1Kb] [X, 19. 7Kb] gasaw satanan sue lauhmunia driusandan us himina. sai. atgaf ïzuis ualdufni trudan ufaro uaurme iah [20. 1Kb] [X, 20. 1Kb] skaurpiono iah ana allai mahtai fiiandis iah uaihte ainohun ïzuis ni gaskaþiiþ. sueþauh þamma ni faginoþ ei þai ahmans ïzuis ufhausiand. ïþ faginod ïn þammei namna ïzuara gamelida sind ïn himinam. [21. 1Kb] [X, 21. 5Kb] ïnuh þizai weilai suegnida ahmin ïesus iah qaþ. andhaita þus atta. frauia himinis iah airþos. unte affalht þo faura snutraim iah frodaim iah andhulides þo niuklahaim. iai atta. unte sua uarþ galeikaiþ [22. 1Kb] ïn anduairþia þeinamma. iah gauandiþs du siponiam seinaim qaþ. all mis atgiban ïst fram attin meinamma. iah ni washun kann. was ïst sunus. alia atta. iah was ïst atta. alia sunus iah þammei [23. 1Kb] [X, 23. 1Kb] uili sunus andhulian. iah gauandiþs du siponiam seinaim sundro qaþ. audaga augona. þei saiwand. [43. 1Kb] [XIX, 43. 1Kb] þatei qimand dagos ana þus iah bigraband fiiands þeinai grabai þuk iah bistandand þuk iah biuaibiand [44. 1Kb] þuk allaþro iah airþai þuk gaïbniand iah barna þeina ïn þus iah ni letand ïn þus [45. 1Kb] [XIX, 45. 8Kb] stain ana staina. ïn þizei ni ufkunþes þata mel niuhseinais þeinaizos. iah galeiþands ïn alh [46. 1Kb] [XIX, 46. 9Kb] dugann usuairpan þans frabugiandans ïn ïzai iah bugiandans qiþands du ïm. gameliþ ïst þatei [47. 1Kb] [XIX, 47. 1Kb] gards meins gards bido ïst. ïþ ius ïna gatauideduþ du filegria þiube. iah uas laisiands daga wammeh ïn þizai alh. ïþ þai auhmistans gudians iah bokarios sokidedun ïna usqistian iah þai frumistans [48. 1Kb] ; [XIX, 48. 3Kb] [XX, 1. 1Kb] [XX, 1. 1Kb] manageins. iah ni bigetun wa gatauidedeina. managei auk alakio habaida du hausian ïmma. iah uarþ ïn sumamma dage iainaize at laisiandin ïmma þo managein ïn alh iah uailameriandin atstoþun [2. 1Kb] þai gudians iah bokarios miþ þaim sinistam iah qeþun du ïmma qiþandans. qiþ unsis ïn wamma ualdufnie [3. 1Kb] [XX, 3. 1Kb] þata tauiis aiþþau was ïst sei gaf þus þata ualdufni. andhafiands þan qaþ du ïm. fraihna [4. 1Kb] [XX, 4. 1Kb] [5. 1Kb] [XX, 5. 1Kb] ïzuis iah ïk ainis uaurdis iah qiþiþ mis. daupeins ïohannis uzuh himina uas þau uzuh mannam. ïþ eis þahtedun miþ sis misso qiþandans. þatei iabai qiþam. us himina. qiþiþ. aþþan duwe ni galaubideduþ [6. 1Kb] [XX, 6. 1Kb] ïmma. ïþ iabai qiþam. us mannam. alla so managei stainam afuairpiþ unsis. trigguaba galaubiand [7. 1Kb] [XX, 7. 1Kb] [8. 1Kb] [XX, 8. 1Kb] auk allai ïohannen praufetu uisan. iah andhofun ei ni uissedeina waþro. iah ïesus qaþ ïm. ni [9. 1Kb] [XX, 9. 8Kb] ïk ïzuis qiþa ïn wamma ualdufnie þata tauia. dugann þan du managein qiþan þo gaiukon. manna ussatida [10. 1Kb] [XX, 10. 1Kb] ueinagard iah anafalh ïna uaurstuiam iah aflaiþ iera ganoha. iah ïn mela ïnsandida du þaim aurtiam skalk. ei akranis þis ueinagardis gebeina ïmma. ïþ þai aurtians usbligguandans ïna ïnsandidedun  [11. 1Kb] [XX, 11. 1Kb] lausana. iah anaaiauk sandian anþarana skalk. ïþ eis iah iainana bligguandans iah unsuerandans [12. 1Kb] [XX, 12. 1Kb] ïnsandidedun lausana. iah anaaiauk sandian pridian. ïþ eis iah þana gauondondans usuaurpun. [13. 1Kb] [XX, 13. 1Kb] qaþ þan sa frauia þis ueinagardis. wa tauiau. sandia sunu meinana þana liuban. aufto þana [14. 1Kb] [XX, 14. 6Kb] gasaiwandans aistand. gasaiwandans þan ïna þai aurtians þahtedun miþ sis misso qiþandans. sa ïst [15. 1Kb] sa arbinumia. afslaham ïna. ei uns uairþai þata arbi. iah usuairpandans ïna ut us þamma ueinagarda [16. 1Kb] [XX, 16. 1Kb] usqemun. wa nu tauiai ïm frauia þis ueinagardis. qimiþ iah usqisteiþ aurtiam þaim iah gibiþ þana [17. 1Kb] [XX, 17. 6Kb] ueinagard anþaraim. gahausiandans qeþun þan. nis-siiai. ïþ ïs ïnsaiwands du ïm qaþ. aþþan wa ïst [18. 1Kb] [XX, 18. 1Kb] þata gamelido. stains þammei uskusun timrians. sah uarþ du haubida uaihstins. wazuh sei driusiþ [19. 1Kb] [XX, 19. 1Kb] ana þana stain. gakrotuda. ïþ ana þanei driusiþ disuinþeiþ ïna. iah sokidedun þai bokarios iah auhumistans gudians uslagian ana ïna handuns ïn þizai weilai iah ohtedun þo managein. froþun auk þatei [20. 1Kb] [XX, 20. 42Kb] du ïm þo gaiukon qaþ. iah afleiþandans ïnsandidedun ferians þans us liutein taikniandans sik garaihtans [21. 1Kb] uisan. ei gafaifaheina ïs uaurde iah atgebeina ïna reikia iah ualdufnia kindinis. iah frehun ïna qiþandans. laisari. uitum þatei raihtaba rodeis iah laiseis iah ni andsaiwis anduairþi ak bi suniai [22. 1Kb] [XX, 22. 12Kb] [23. 1Kb] [XX, 23. 17Kb] uig guþs laiseis. skuldu ïst unsis kaisara gild giban þau niu. bisaiwands þan ïze unselein ïesus qaþ [24. 1Kb] [XX, 24. 1Kb] du ïm. wa mik fraisiþ. ataugeiþ mis skatt. wis habaiþ manleikan iah ufarmeli. andhafiandans þan [25. 1Kb] [XX, 25. 1Kb] [26. 1Kb] [XX, 26. 9Kb] qeþun. kaisaris. ïþ ïs qaþuh du ïm. us nu gibiþ þo kaisaris kaisara iah þo guþs guþa. iah ni mahtedun [27. 1Kb] [XX, 27. 19Kb] gafahan ïs uaurde ïn anduairþia manageins iah sildaleikiandans andauaurde ïs gaþahaidedun. AIuAGGELIO þAIRH ÏOHANNEN. [1Kb]

[4. 1Kb] [III, 4. 1Kb] niba sei gabairada ïupaþro. ni mag gasaiwan þiudangardia guþs.---waiua mahts ïst manna gabairan [5. 1Kb] [III, 5. 1Kb] alþeis uisands. ibai mag ïn uamba aiþeins seinaizos aftra galeiþan iag-gabairaidau.---amen amen [23. 1Kb] [III, 23. 16Kb] qiþa þus. niba gabairada us uatin iah ahmin. ni mag ïnngaleiþan ïn þiudangardia guþs.---..naga [24. 1Kb] [III, 24. 4Kb] [25. 1Kb] [III, 25. 9Kb] uesun iainar. þaruh qemun iah daupidai uesun. ni nauhþanuh galagiþs uas ïn karkarai ïohannes. þaþroh [26. 1Kb] [III, 26. 1Kb] þan uarþ sokeins us siponiam ïohannes miþ ïudaium bi suiknein------rabbei. sei uas miþ  [29. 1Kb] [III, 29. 1Kb] þus hindar iaurdanau. þammei þu ueituodides. sai. sa daupeiþ iah allai gaggand du ïmma.---so nu [30. 1Kb] [III, 30. 1Kb] [31. 1Kb] [III, 31. 6Kb] faheþs meina usfullnoda. iains skal uahsian. ïþ ïk minznan. sa ïupaþro qimands ufaro allaim ïst---sa [32. 1Kb] [III, 32. 1Kb] us himina qumana ufaro allaim ïst. iah þatei gasaw iag-gahausida. þata ueituodeiþ. iah þo ueituodida [u, 21. 1Kb] [u, 21. 1Kb] ïs ni ainshun nimiþ.---suasue auk atta urraiseiþ dauþans iah liban gatauiiþ. sua iah sunus [22. 1Kb] [u, 22. 1Kb] [23. 1Kb] [u, 23. 1Kb] þanzei uili liban gatauiiþ. nih þan atta ni stoiiþ ainohun ak staua alla atgaf sunau. ei allai sueraina [35. 1Kb] [u, 35. 1Kb] sunu suasue suerand attan.---iains uas lukarn brinnando iah liuhtiando. ïþ ius uildeduþ suignian du [36. 1Kb] [u, 36. 1Kb] weilai ïn liuhada ïs. aþþan ïk haba ueituodiþa maizein þamma ïohanne. þo auk uaurstua. þei atgaf [37. 1Kb] [u, 37. 1Kb] mis atta ei ïk tauiau þo. þo uaurstua. þei ïk tauia. ueituodiand bi mik þatei atta mik sandida. iah sei sandida mik atta. sah ueituodeiþ bi mik. nih stibna ïs wanhun gahausideduþ nih siun ïs gasewuþ. [46. 1Kb] [u, 46. 1Kb] [47. 1Kb] [u, 47. 10Kb] iabai allis mose galaubidedeiþ ga-þau-laubidedeiþ mis. bi mik auk iains gamelida. þande nu iainis [uI, 1. 1Kb] [uI, 1. 1Kb] melam ni galaubeiþ. waiua meinaim uaurdam galaubiaiþ. afar þata galaiþ ïesus ufar marein þo galeilaie [2. 1Kb] iah tibairiade. iah laistida ïna manageins filu. unte gasewun taiknins þozei gatauida bi siukaim.
