[2. 1Kb] [XIII, 2. 1Kb] fauraqaþ iah aftra fauragateiha suasue anduairþs anþaramma sinþa iah aliaþro nu melia þaim faura [3. 1Kb] [XIII, 3. 1Kb] frauaurkiandam iah anþaraim allaim þatei iabai qima. aftra ni freidia. unte kustu sokeiþ þis ïn mis [4. 1Kb] [XIII, 4. 1Kb] rodiandins xristaus. sei ni siukeiþ ïn ïzuis ak mahteigs ïst ïn ïzuis. aþþan iabai ushramiþs uas us siukein akei libaiþ us mahtai guþs. iah auk siukam ïn ïmma akei libam miþ ïmma us mahtai guþs ïn [5. 1Kb] [XIII, 5. 1Kb] ïzuis. ïzuis silbans fraisiþ. siiaidu ïn galaubeinai. silbans ïzuis kauseiþ. þauh niu kunnuþ ïzuis patei [6. 1Kb] [XIII, 6. 1Kb] ïesus xristus ïn ïzuis ïst. ïbai aufto ungakusanai siiuþ. appan uenia ei kunneiþ þateï ueis ni siium [7. 1Kb] [XIII, 7. 13Kb] ungakusanai. aþþan bidia du guþa ei ni uaiht ubilis tauiaiþ ni ei ueis gakusanai þugkiaima ak ei ius [8. 1Kb] [XIII, 8. 1Kb] [9. 1Kb] [XIII, 9. 1Kb] pata godo tauiaiþ ei ueis ungakusanai þugkiaima. ni auk magum wa uiþra sunia ak faur sunia. aþþan [10. 1Kb] [XIII, 10. 1Kb] faginom þan ueis siukam ïþ ius suinþai siiuþ. þizuh auk iah bidiam ïzuaraizos ustauhtais. duþþe þata aliaþro melia ei anduairþs harduba ni tauiau bi ualdufnia. þammei frauia fragaf mis du gatimreinai [11. 1Kb] [XIII, 11. 9Kb] iah ni du gataurþai. þata anþar. broþrius. faginoþ ustauhanai siiaiþ gaþrafstidai siiaiþ samo fraþiaiþ  [12. 1Kb] [XIII, 12. 1Kb] gauairþi tauiandans siiaiþ iah guþ gauairþeis iah friaþuos uairþiþ miþ ïzuis. goliaiþ ïzuis misso ïn [13. 1Kb] [XIII, 13. 16Kb] friionai ueihai. goliand ïzuis þai ueihans allai. ansts frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus iah friaþua guþs iah gaman ahmins ueihis miþ allaïm ïzuis. amen.


du kaurinþaium anþara ustauh. du kaurinþium ·b· meliþ ïst us filippai makidonais.



DU GALATIM. [1Kb]


[I, 1. 1Kb] [I, 1-II, 17 1Kb] Paulus apaustaulus ni af mannam nih þairh mannan ak þairh ïesu xristu iah guþ attan. ïze urraisida [2. 1Kb] , [3. 1Kb] ïna us dauþaim. iah þai miþ mis allai broþrius aikklesiom galatiais. ansts ïzuis iah gauairþi fram [4. 1Kb] [I, 4. 8Kb] guþa attin iah frauiin unsaramma ïesu xristau. ïzei gaf sik silban faur frauaurhtins unsaros ei uslausidedi [5. 1Kb] [I, 5. 9Kb] uns us þamma anduairþin aiua ubilin bi uiliin guþs iah attins unsaris. þammei uulþus du [6. 1Kb] [I, 6. 5Kb] aiuam amen. sildaleikia ei suasue sprauto afuandianda af þamma laþondin ïzuis ïn anstai xristaus du [7. 1Kb] anþaramma aiuaggelia. þatei nist anþar. alia sumai sind þai drobiandans ïzuis iah uiliandans ïnuandian [20. 1Kb] , [21. 1Kb] aiuaggeli xristaus.------aþþan þatei melia ïzuis. sai ïn anduairþia guþs ei ni liuga. þapro qam [22. 1Kb] [I, 22. 1Kb] [23. 1Kb] [I, 23. 3Kb] ana fera saurais iah kileikiais. uasuþ-þan unkunþs ulita aikklesiom ïudaias þaim ïn xristau. þatainei [24. 1Kb] [I, 24. 1Kb] hausiandans uesun þatei sei urak uns simle. nu mereiþ galaubein. þei suman brak. iah ïn mis mikilidedun [II, 1. 1Kb] [II, 1. 1Kb] guþ. þaþro bi fiduortaihun iera usïddia aftra ïn ïairusaulyma miþ barnabin ganimands miþ [2. 1Kb] [II, 2. 1Kb] mis iah teitu. uzuþ-þan ïddia bi andhuleinai iah ussok ïm aiuaggeli. þatei meria ïn þiudom ïþ sundro. [3. 1Kb] þaimei þuhta ïbai suare rinnau aiþþau runniau. akei nih teitus sa miþ mis kreks uisands baidiþs [4. 1Kb] [II, 4. 1Kb] uas bimaitan. aþþan ïn þize ufsliupandane galiugabroþre. þaiei ïnnufslupun biniuhsian freihals  [5. 1Kb] [II, 5. 1Kb] unsarana. þanei aihum ïn xristau ïesu. ei unsis gaþiuaidedeina. þaimei ni weilohun gakunþedum [6. 1Kb] [II, 6. 1Kb] ufhnaiuein ei sunia aiuaggelions gastandai at ïzuis. aþþan af þaim þugkiandam uisan wa. wileikai simle uesun. ni uaiht mis uulþris ïst. guþ mans anduairþi ni andsitiþ. aþþan mis þai þugkiandans [7. 1Kb] [II, 7. 1Kb] ni uaiht anaïnsokun. ak þata uiþrauairþo gasaiwandans þatei gatrauaida uas mis aiuaggelio faurafilliis [8. 1Kb] [II, 8. 1Kb] suasue paitrau bimaitis. unte sei uaurstueig gatauida paitrau du apaustaulein bimaitis. uaurstueig [9. 1Kb] [II, 9. 16Kb] gatauida iah mis ïn þiudos. iah ufkunnandans anst þo gibanon mis paitrus iah ïakobus iah ïohannes. þaiei þuhtedun sauleis uisan. taihsuons atgebun mis iah barnabin gamaineins. suei ueis du þiudom [10. 1Kb] [II, 10. 4Kb] [11. 1Kb] [II, 11. 1Kb] ïþ eis du bimaita. þatainei þizei unledane ei gamuneima. þatei usdaudida. þata silbo tauian. aþþan [12. 1Kb] [II, 12. 1Kb] þan qam paitrus ïn antiokiai ïn anduairþi ïmma andstoþ. unte gatarhiþs uas. unte faurþizei qemeina sumai fram ïakobau. miþ þiudom matida. ïþ biþe qemun. ufslaup iah afskaiskaid sik ogands þans [13. 1Kb] [II, 13. 7Kb] us bimaita. iah miþlitidedun ïmma þai anþarai ïudaieis suei barnabas miþgatauhans uarþ þizai litai [14. 1Kb] [II, 14. 1Kb] ïze. ake biþe usgasaw þatei ni raihtaba gaggand du suniai aiuaggelions. qaþ du paitrau faura allaim. [15. 1Kb] [II, 15. 13Kb] iabai pu ïudaius uisands þiudisko libais iah ni ïudaiuisko. waiua þiudos baideis ïudaiuiskon. ueis raihtis [16. 1Kb] [II, 16. 1Kb] ïudaieis uisandans iah ni us þiudom xristaus ïesuis iah ni us uaurstuam uitodis. unte ni uairþiþ garaihts [17. 1Kb] [II, 17. 9Kb] us uaurstuam uitodis ainhun leike. aþþan iabai sokiandans ei garaihtai domiaindau ïn xristau bigitanai [18. 1Kb] [II, 18. 1Kb] siium ias-silbans frauaurhtai. þannu xristus frauaurhtais andbahts. nis siiai. unte iabai þatei [19. 1Kb] gatar. þata aftra timria. missatauiandan mik silban ustaiknia. unte ïk þairh uitoþ uitoda gasualt [20. 1Kb] [II, 20. 1Kb] ei guþa libau. xristau miþushramiþs uarþ ïþ liba. nu ni þanaseiþs ïk. ïþ libaiþ ïn mis xristus. aþþan þatei nu liba ïn leika. ïn galaubeinai liba sunus guþs þis friiondins mik iah atgibandins sik [21. 1Kb] [II, 21. 9Kb] silban faur mik. ni faurqiþa anstai guþs. unte iabai þairh uitoþ garaihtei. aiþþau iah xristus suare  [III, 1. 1Kb] [III, 1. 1Kb] gasualt. o unfrodans galateis. was ïzuis afhugida suniai ni ufhausian. ïzuizei faura augam ïesus [2. 1Kb] xristus faurameliþs uas ïn ïzuis ushramiþs. þat-ain uiliau uitan fram ïzuis. uzu [29. 1Kb] [III, 29. 10Kb] ain siiuþ ïn xristau ïesu. aþþan þande ius xristaus. þannu abrahamis fraiu siiuþ iab-bi gahaitam [Iu, 1. 1Kb] arbians. aþþan qiþa sualaud melis sue arbinumia niuklahs ïst. ni und uaiht ïusiza ïst skalka frauia [2. 1Kb] [3. 1Kb] [Iu, 3. 1Kb] allaize uisands. akei uf raginiam ïst iah fauragaggam und garehsn attins. sua iah ueis þan uesum [4. 1Kb] barniskai. uf stabim þis fairwaus uesum skalkinondans. ïþ biþe qam usfulleins melis. ïnsandida [5. 1Kb] [Iu, 5. 1Kb] guþ sunu seinana uaurþanana us qinon uaurþanana uf uitoda ei þans uf uitoda usbauhtedi ei suniue [6. 1Kb] [Iu, 6. 5Kb] sibia andnimaina. aþþan þatei siiuþ ius sunius guþs. ïnsandida guþ ahman sunaus seinis ïn hairtona [7. 1Kb] [Iu, 7. 16Kb] ïzuara hropiandan. abba fadar. suei ni þanaseiþs ïs skalks. þande sunus iah arbia guþs [8. 1Kb] [Iu, 8. 1Kb] þairh xristu. akei þan sueþauh ni kunnandans guþ þaim þei uistai ni sind guþa skalkinodeduþ. [9. 1Kb] [Iu, 9. 1Kb] ïþ nu sai ufkunnandans guþ maizuþ-þan gakunnaidai fram guþa waiua gauandideduþ ïzuis aftra [10. 1Kb] [Iu, 10. 8Kb] du þaim unmahteigam iah halkam stabim. þaimei aftra ïupana skalkinon uileiþ. dagam uitaiþ iah [11. 1Kb] [Iu, 11. 1Kb] [12. 1Kb] [Iu, 12. 1Kb] menoþum iah melam iah aþnam. og ïzuis ïbai suare arbaididediau ïn ïzuis. aþþan uairþaiþ sue ïk. [13. 1Kb] [Iu, 13. 3Kb] unte iah ïk sue ius. broþrius. bidia ïzuis. ni uaiht mis gaskoþuþ. uituþ þatei þairh siukein leikis [14. 1Kb] [Iu, 14. 4Kb] aiuaggelida ïzuis þata frumo iah fraistubniai ana leika meinamma ni frakunþeduþ ni andspiuuþ ak [15. 1Kb] [Iu, 15. 1Kb] sue aggelu guþs andnemuþ mik sue xristu ïesu. wileika uas nu audagei ïzuara. ueituodia auk ïzuis [16. 1Kb] [Iu, 16. 5Kb] þatei iabai mahteig uesi augona ïzuara usgrabandans atgebeiþ mis. ïþ nu sue fiiands ïzuis uarþ  [17. 1Kb] [18. 1Kb] [Iu, 18. 1Kb] sunia gateihands ïzuis. alianond ïzuis ni uaila ak usletan ïzuis uileina ei ïm alianoþ. aþþan goþ ïst [19. 1Kb] [Iu, 19. 66Kb] alianon ïn godamma sinteino ian-ni þatainei ïn þammei ïk siiau anduairþs at ïzuis. barnilona meina. [20. 1Kb] þanzei aftra fita. unte gabairhtiaidau xristaus ïn ïzuis. aþþan uilda qiman at ïzuis nu iah ïnmaidian [21. 1Kb] [Iu, 21. 16Kb] stibna meina. unte afslauþiþs ïm ïn ïzuis. qiþiþ mis ius uf uitoda uiliandans uisan þata uitoþ niu [22. 1Kb] [Iu, 22. 1Kb] hauseiþ. gameliþïst auk þatei abraham tuans aihta sununs. ainana us þiuiai iah ainana us friiai. [23. 1Kb] [Iu, 23. 1Kb] [24. 1Kb] [Iu, 24. 1Kb] akei þan sa us þiuiai bi leika gabaurans uas. ïþ sa us friiai bi gahaita. þatei sind alialeikaidos. þos [25. 1Kb] [Iu, 25. 22Kb] auk sind tuos trigguos. aina raihtis af fairgunia seinai ïn þiuadu bairandei. sei ïst agar. seina [26. 1Kb] fairguni ïst ïn arabia gamarko þizai nu ïairusalem ïþ skalkinoþ miþ seinaim barnam. ïþ so ïupa [27. 1Kb] [Iu, 27. 1Kb] ïairusalem friia ïst. sei ïst aiþei unsara. gameliþ ïst auk. sifai stairo so unbairandei. tarmei iah [28. 1Kb] [Iu, 28. 23Kb] hropei so ni fitandei. unte managa barna þizos auþions mais þau þizos aigandeins aban. aþþan [29. 1Kb] [Iu, 29. 1Kb] ueis broþrius bi ïsakis gahaita barna sium. akei þan suasue sa bi leika gabaurana urak þana. bi [30. 1Kb] ahmin. suah iah nu. akei wa qiþiþ þata gamelido. usuairþ þizai þiuiai iah þamma sunau ïzos. unte [31. 1Kb] ni nimiþ arbi sunus þiuios miþ sunau friiaizos. þannu nu broþrius ni siium þiuios barna ak friiaizos. [u, 1. 1Kb] [u, 1. 17Kb] þammei freihalsa uns xristus friians brahta. standaiþ nu. ni aftra skalkinassaus iukuzia [2. 1Kb] [u, 2. 1Kb] [3. 1Kb] [u, 3. 6Kb] usþulaiþ. sai ïk paulus qiþa ïzuis þatei iabai bimaitiþ. xristus ïzuis nist du botai. aþþan ueituodia [4. 1Kb] [u, 4. 17Kb] wammeh manne bimaitanaize þatei skula ïst all uitoþ tauian. lausai siiuþ af xristau. iuzei ïn uitoda  [5. 1Kb] garaihtans qiþiþ ïzuis. us anstai usdrusuþ. aþþan ueis ahmin us galaubeinai uenais garaihteins [6. 1Kb] [u, 6. 1Kb] beidam. unte ïn xristu ïesu nih bimait uaiht gamag ni faurafilli ak galaubeins þairh friaþua uaurstueiga. [7. 1Kb] [8. 1Kb] [u, 8. 1Kb] runnuþ uaila. was ïzuis galatida suniai ni ufhausian. so gakunds ni us þamma laþondin [9. 1Kb] [u, 9. 15Kb] [10. 1Kb] [u, 10. 1Kb] ïzuis ïst. leitil beistis allana daig distairiþ. ïk gatraua ïn ïzuis ïn frauiin þatei ni uaiht aliis hugiiþ [11. 1Kb] [u, 11. 4Kb] aþþan sa drobiands ïzuis sa bairaiþ uargiþa. sawazuh sei siiai. aþþan ïk broþrius iabai bimait [12. 1Kb] meriau. duwe þanamais urikada. þannu gatauran ïst marzeins galgins. uainei iah usmaitaindau [13. 1Kb] [u, 13. 9Kb] þai drobiandans ïzuis. ius auk du freihalsa laþodai siiuþ. broþrius. þatainei ïbai þana freihals du [14. 1Kb] [u, 14. 1Kb] leua leikis tauiaiþ ak ïn friaþuos ahmins skalkinoþ ïzuis misso. unte all uitoþ ïn ïzuis ïn ainamma [15. 1Kb] [u, 15. 10Kb] uaurda usfulliada ïn þamma. friios newundian þeinana sue þuk silban. ïþ iabai ïzuis misso beitiþ [16. 1Kb] [u, 16. 1Kb] iah fairrinoþ. saiwiþ ïbai fram ïzuis misso fraqimaindau. aþþan qiþa ei ahmin gaggaiþ iah lustu [17. 1Kb] [u, 17. 1Kb] leikis ni ustiuhaiþ. unte leik gairneiþ uiþra ahman ïþ ahma uiþra leik. þo nu sis misso andstandand [18. 1Kb] [19. 1Kb] [u, 19. 1Kb] ei ni þiswah þatei uileiþ. þata tauiaiþ. aþþan iabai ahmin tiuhanda. ni siiuþ uf uitoda. aþþan [20. 1Kb] [u, 20. 6Kb] suikunþa sind uaurstua leikis. þatei ïst horinassus kalkinassus unhrainiþa aglaitei galiugagude [21. 1Kb] [u, 21. 4Kb] skalkinassus lubialeisei fiaþuos haifsteis alian hatiza iiukos tuisstasseis birodeinos hairaiseis neiþa maurþra drugkaneins gabauros iah þata galeiko þaim. þatei faurqiþa ïzuis sue iu fauraqaþ þatei [22. 1Kb] [u, 22. 1Kb] þai þata sualeik tauiandans þiudangardios guþs arbians ni uairþand. ïþ akran ahmins ïst friaþua faheþs [23. 1Kb] gauairþi usbeisnei selei bleiþei galaubeins qairrei gahobains suiknei. uiþra þo sualeika nist [24. 1Kb] [u, 24. 1Kb] [25. 1Kb] uitoþ. ïþ þaiei sind xristaus. leik sein ushramidedun miþ uinnom iah lustum. iabai libam ahmin. [26. 1Kb] ahmin iah gaggam. ni uairþaima flautandans misso ushaitandans. misso ïn neiþa uisandans.  [uI, 1. 1Kb] [uI, 1. 4Kb] broþrius. iabai gafahaidau manna ïn wizai missadede. ius þai ahmeinans gaþuastiaiþ þana sualeikana [2. 1Kb] ïn ahmin qairreins. atsaiwands þuk silban ïbai iah þu fraisaizau. ïzuaros misso kauriþos [3. 1Kb] [uI, 3. 10Kb] bairaiþ iah sua usfulleiþ uitoþ xristaus. ïþ iabai þugkeiþ was wa uisan. ni uaiht uisands. sis silbin [4. 1Kb] [uI, 4. 6Kb] fraþiamarzeins ïst. ïþ uaurstu sein silbins kiusai wariizuh iah þan ïn sis silbin woftulia habai iah [5. 1Kb] [uI, 5. 1Kb] [6. 1Kb] [uI, 6. 1Kb] ni ïn anþaramma. wariizuh auk suesa baurþein bairiþ. aþþan gamainiai sa laisida uaurda þamma [7. 1Kb] [uI, 7. 1Kb] laisiandin ïn allaim godaim. ni uairþaiþ airziai. guþ ni bilaikada. manna auk þatei saiïþ. þatuh iah [8. 1Kb] [uI, 8. 1Kb] sneiþiþ. unte sei saiïþ ïn leika seinamma. us þamma leika iah sneiþiþ riurein. ïþ sei saiïþ in [9. 1Kb] [uI, 9. 1Kb] ahmin. us ahmin iah sneiþiþ libain aiueinon. aþþan þata godo tauiandans ni uairþaima usgrudians. [10. 1Kb] unte at mel suesata sneiþam ni afmaindai. þannu nu þandei mel habam. uaurkiam þiuþ uiþra [11. 1Kb] [uI, 11. 1Kb] [12. 1Kb] [uI, 12. 1Kb] allans þishun uiþra suesans galaubeinai. sai wileikaim bokom ïzuis gamelida meinai handau. sua managai sue uileina samian sis ïn leika. þai nauþiand ïzuis bimaitan. ei weh urakia galgins xristaus [13. 1Kb] [uI, 13. 6Kb] ni uinnaina. nih þan sueþauh þai ïzei bimaitanai sind uitoþ fastand ak uileina ïzuis bimaitan [14. 1Kb] [uI, 14. 1Kb] ei ïn ïzuaramma leika wopaina. ïþ mis ni siiai wopan ïn ni uaihtai niba ïn galgin frauiins unsaris [15. 1Kb] [uI, 15. 14Kb] ïesuis xristaus. þairh þanei mis fairwaus ushramiþs ïst iah ïk fairwau. unte nih bimait uaiht ïst [16. 1Kb] ni faurafilli ak niuia gaskafts. iah sua managai sue þizai garaideinai galaistans sind. gauairþi ana [17. 1Kb] [uI, 17. 1Kb] ïm iah armaio iah ana ïsrela guþs. þanamais arbaide ni ainshun mis gansiai. unte ïk stakins frauiins [18. 1Kb] unsaris ïesuis xristaus ana leika meinamma baira. ansts frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus miþ ahmin ïzuaramma broþrius. amen.


du galatim ustauh



AIPISTAULE PAuLAUS DU AIFAISIUM anastodiþ. [1Kb]


[I, 1. 1Kb] [I, 1. 1Kb] Paulus apaustaulus xristaus ïesuis þairh uilian guþs þaim ueiham þaim uisandam ïn aifaison iah [2. 1Kb] trigguaim ïn xristau ïesu. ansts ïzuis iah gauairþi fram guþa attin unsaramma iah frauiin ïesu [3. 1Kb] xristau. þiuþiþs guþ iah atta frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus. ïzei gaþiuþida uns ïn allai þiuþeinai [4. 1Kb] [I, 4. 1Kb] ahmeinai ïn himinakundaim ïn xristau. suasue gaualida unsis ïn ïmma faur gasatein fairwaus ei [5. 1Kb] [I, 5. 1Kb] siiaima ueis ueihai iah unuammai ïn anduairþia ïs ïn friaþuai. fauragarairoþ uns du suniue gadedai [6. 1Kb] [I, 6. 1Kb] þairh ïesu xristu ïn ïmma bi leikainai uiliins seinis. du hazeinai uulþaus anstais seinaizos. ïn þizaiei [7. 1Kb] [I, 7. 1Kb] ansteigs uas uns ïn þamma liubin sunau seinamma. ïn þammei habam faurbauht fralet frauaurhte [8. 1Kb] þairh bloþ ïs bi gabein uulþaus anstais ïs. þei ufarassau ganohida ïn uns ïn allai handugein iah [9. 1Kb] [I, 9. 13Kb] [10. 1Kb] [I, 10. 1Kb] frodein kannian unsis runa uiliins seinis bi uiliin. sei fauragaleikaida ïmma du fauragaggia usfulleinais [11. 1Kb] [I, 11. 4Kb] mele aftra usfullian alla ïn xristau þo ana himinam iah ana airþai ïn ïmma. ïn þammei hlauts gasatidai uesum fauragaredanai bi uiliin guþs þis alla ïn allaim uaurkiandins bi muna uiliins seinis. [12. 1Kb] [13. 1Kb] [I, 13. 4Kb] ei siiaima ueis du hazeinai uulþaus ïs þai fauraueniandans ïn xristau. ïn þammei iah ius gahausiandans uaurd sunios aiuaggeli ganistais ïzuaraizos þammei galaubiandans gasiglidai uaurþuþ ahmin [14. 1Kb] [I, 14. 1Kb] gahaitis þamma ueihin. ïzei ïst uadi arbiis unsaris du faurbauhtai gafreideinais du hazeinai uulþaus [15. 1Kb] [I, 15. 11Kb] ïs. duþþe iah ïk gahausiands ïzuara galaubein ïn frauiin ïesu xristau iah friaþua ïn allans þans ueihans [16. 1Kb] [I, 16. 22Kb] [17. 1Kb] unsueibands auiliudo ïn ïzuara gamund uaurkiands ïn bidom meinaim ei guþ frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus atta uulþaus gibai ïzuis ahman handugeins iah andhuleinais ïn ufkunþia seinamma. [18. 1Kb] [I, 18. 9Kb] ïnliuhtida augona hairtins ïzuaris ei uiteiþ ius wa ïst uens laþonais ïs. wileiku gabei uulþaus arbiis [19. 1Kb] [I, 19. 1Kb] ïs ïn ueihaim. iah wa ufarassus mikileins mahtais ïs ïn uns þaim galaubiandam bi uaurstua mahtais  [20. 1Kb] [I, 20. 11Kb] suinþeins ïs. þatei gauaurhta ïn xristau urraisiands ïna us dauþaim iah gasatida ïn taihsuon seinai ïn [21. 1Kb] himinam ufaro allaize reikie iah ualdufnie iah mahte iah frauiinassiue iah allaize namne namnidaize [22. 1Kb] [I, 22. 1Kb] ni þatainei ïn pamma aiua ak iah ïn þamma anauairþin. iah all ufhnaiuida uf fotuns ïmma iah ïna [23. 1Kb] ; [II, 1. 1Kb] [II, 1. 1Kb] atgaf haubiþ ufar alla aikklesion. sei ïst leik ïs fullo þis alla ïn allaim usfulliandins. iah ïzuis uisandans [2. 1Kb] [II, 2. 1Kb] dauþans missadedim iah frauaurhtim ïzuaraim. ïn þaimei simle ïddieduþ bi þizai aldai þis aiuis [3. 1Kb] [II, 3. 2Kb] bi reik ualdufniis luftaus ahmins þis nu uaurkiandins ïn sunum ungalaubeinais. ïn þaimei iah ueis allai usmetum suman ïn lustum leikis unsaris tauiandans uilians leikis iah gamitone iah uesum [4. 1Kb] [II, 4. 6Kb] uistai barna hatizis suasue iah þai anþarai. ïþ guþ gabeigs uisands ïn armahairtein ïn þizos managons [5. 1Kb] [II, 5. 1Kb] friiaþuos ïn þizaiei friioda uns iah uisandans uns dauþans frauaurhtim miþgaqiuida uns xristau. [6. 1Kb] [II, 6. 1Kb] anstai siium ganasidai iah miþurraisidai iah miþgasatidai ïn himinakundaim ïn xristau ïesu. [7. 1Kb] [II, 7. 1Kb] ei ataugiai ïn aldim þaim anagaggandeim ufarassu gabeins anstais seinaizos ïn selein bi uns ïn [8. 1Kb] [II, 8. 1Kb] [9. 1Kb] xristau ïesu. unte anstai siiuþ ganasidai þairh galaubein iah þata ni us ïzuis ak guþs giba ïst. ni us [10. 1Kb] [II, 10. 4Kb] uaurstuam ei was ni wopai ak ïs siium tauï gaskapanai ïn xristau ïesu du uaurstuam godaim. þei [11. 1Kb] [II, 11. 1Kb] fauragamanuida guþ ei ïn þaim gaggaima. duþþe gamuneiþ þatei ius þiudos simle ïn leika uesuþ [12. 1Kb] [II, 12. 23Kb] namnidans unbimaitanai fram þizai namnidon bimait ïn leika handuuaurht. unte uesuþ þan ïn iainamma mela ïnuh xristau framaþiai usmetis ïsrelis iah gasteis gahaite trausteis uen ni habandans [13. 1Kb] [II, 13. 1Kb] iah gudalausai ïn manasedai. ïp nu sai ïn xristau ïesu ius iuzei simle uesuþ fairra. uaurþuþ newa ïn [14. 1Kb] bloþa xristaus. sa auk ïst gauairþi unsar. sei gatauida þo ba du samin iah miþgardauaddiu faþos [15. 1Kb] [II, 15. 3Kb] gatairands. fiiaþua. ana leika seinamma uitoþ anabusne garaideinim gatairands ei þans tuans gaskopi ïn [16. 1Kb] [II, 16. 5Kb] sis silbin du ainamma niuiamma manu uaurkiiands gauairþi iah gafriþodedi þans bans ïn ainamma  [17. 1Kb] [II, 17. 1Kb] leika guþa þairh galgan afslahands fiiaþua ïn sis silbin. iah qimands uailamerida gauairþi, ïzuis [18. 1Kb] iuzei fairra iah gauairþi þaim ïzei newa. unte þairh ïna habam atgagg baioþs ïn ainamma ahmin [19. 1Kb] [II, 19. 1Kb] du attin. sai nu iu ni siiuþ gasteis iah aliakoniai ak sïiuþ gabaurgians þaim ueiham iah ïngardians [20. 1Kb] [II, 20. 1Kb] guþs anatimridai ana grunduuaddiau apaustaule iah praufete at uisandin auhumistin uaihstastaina [21. 1Kb] [22. 1Kb] silbin xristau ïesu. ïn þammei alla gatimrio gagatiloda uahseiþ du alh ueihai ïn frauiin. ïn þammei [III, 1. 1Kb] [III, 1. 31Kb] iah ius miþgatimridai siiuþ du bauainai guþs ïn ahmin. ïn þizozei uaihtais ïk paulus bandia xristaus [2. 1Kb] [III, 2. 1Kb] ïesuis ïn ïzuara þiudo. iabai sueþauh hausideduþ fauragaggi guþs anstais. sei gibana ïst mis ïn ïzuis. [3. 1Kb] [4. 1Kb] [III, 4. 1Kb] unte bi andhuleinai gakannida uas mis so runa sue fauragamelida ïn leitilamma. duþþe ei sigguandans [5. 1Kb] [III, 5. 1Kb] mageiþ fraþian frodein meinai ïn runai xristaus. þatei anþaraim aldim ni kunþ uas sunum [6. 1Kb] [III, 6. 1Kb] manne suasue nu andhuliþ ïst þaim ueih am ïs apaustaulum iah praufetum ïn ahmin. uisan þiudos [7. 1Kb] [III, 7. 1Kb] gaarbians iah galeikans iah gadailans gahaitis ïs ïn xristau ïesu þairh aiuaggelion. þizozei uarþ [8. 1Kb] [III, 8. 9Kb] andbahts ïk bi gihai anstais guþs þizai gibanon mis bi toia mahtais ïs. mis þamma undarleiiin allaize þize ueihane atgibana uarþ ansts so ïn þiudom uailamerian þo unfairlaistidon gabein xristaus [9. 1Kb] [III, 9. 1Kb] iah ïnliuhtian allans. wileik þata fauragaggi runos þizos gafulginons fram aiuam ïn guþa [10. 1Kb] [III, 10. 2Kb] þamma alla gaskapiandin. ei kanniþ uesi nu reikiam iah ualdufniam ïn þaim himinakundam þairh [11. 1Kb] aikklesion so managfalþo handugei guþs bi muna aiue. þanei gatauida ïn xristau ïesu frauiin unsaramma. [12. 1Kb] [III, 12. 20Kb] [13. 1Kb] [III, 13. 9Kb] ïn þammei habam balþein freihals atgagg ïn trauainai þairh galaubein ïs. ïn þize bidia. ni [14. 1Kb] uairþaiþ usgrudians ïn aglom meinaim faur ïzuis. þatei ïst uulþus ïzuar. ïn þis biuga kniua meina  [15. 1Kb] [III, 15. 9Kb] du attin frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus. us þammei all fadreinis ïn himina iah ana airþai namniada. [16. 1Kb] [III, 16. 1Kb] ei gibai ïzuis bi gabein uulþaus seinis mahtai gasuinþnan þairh ahman seinana ïn ïnnuman mannan. [17. 1Kb] [18. 1Kb] [III, 18. 11Kb] bauan xristu þairh galaubein ïn hairtam ïzuaraim. ei ïn friaþuai gauaurhtai iah gasulidai mageiþ [19. 1Kb] [III, 19. 3Kb] gafahan miþ allaim þaim ueiham. wa siiai bra idei iah laggei iah hauhei iah diupei. kunnan þo [20. 1Kb] [III, 20. 1Kb] ufarassau mikilon þis kunþiis friaþua xristaus ei fullnaiþ du allai fullon guþs. aþþan þamma mahteigin [21. 1Kb] [III, 21. 9Kb] ufar all tauian maizo þau bidiam aiþþau raþiam bi mahtai þizai uaurkiandein ïn uns. ïmma [Iu, 1. 1Kb] [Iu, 1. 1Kb] uulþus ïn aikklesion ïn xristau ïesu ïn allos aldins aiue amen. bidia nu ïzuis ïk bandia ïn frauiin [2. 1Kb] [Iu, 2. 1Kb] uairþaba gaggan þizos laþonais. þizaiei laþodai siiuþ. miþ allai hauneinai iah qairrein miþ usbeisnai [3. 1Kb] usþulandans ïzuis misso ïn friaþuai. usdauiandans fastan ainamundiþa ahmins ïn gabundiai gauairþeis. [4. 1Kb] [Iu, 4. 4Kb] [5. 1Kb] ain leik iah ains ahma suasue atlaþodai siiuþ ïn aina uen laþonais ïzuaraizos. ains frauia [6. 1Kb] [Iu, 6. 1Kb] aina galaubeins aina daupeins ains guþ iah atta allaize. sei ufar allaim iah and allans iah ïn allaim [7. 1Kb] [8. 1Kb] [Iu, 8. 1Kb] uns. ïþ ainwariammeh unsara atgibana ïst ansts bi mitaþ gibos xristaus. ïn þizei qiþiþ. ussteigands [9. 1Kb] [Iu, 9. 5Kb] ïn hauhiþa ushanþ hunþ iah atuhgaf gibos mannam. þatuþ - þan usstaig wa ïst niba þatei [10. 1Kb] iah atstaig faurþis ïn undaraisto airþos. sei atstaig. sa ïst iah sei usstaig ufar allans himinans ei [11. 1Kb] [Iu, 11. 1Kb] usfullidedi allata. iah silba gaf sumans apaustauluns sumanzuþ - þan praufetuns sumansuþ - þan [12. 1Kb] aiuaggelistans sumansuþ - þan hairdians iah laisarians du ustauhein ueihaize du uaurstua andbahtiis [13. 1Kb] [Iu, 13. 1Kb] du timreinai leikis xristaus. unte garinnaima allai ïn ainamundiþa galaubeinais iah ufkunþiis sunus [14. 1Kb] [Iu, 14. 40Kb] guþs du uaira fullamma du mitaþ uahstaus fullons xristaus. ei þanaseiþs ni siiaima niuklahai usuagidai iah usualugidai ïn wammeh laiseinais liuteis manne ïn filudeisein du listeigon usuandiai airzeins.  [15. 1Kb] [16. 1Kb] [Iu, 16. 4Kb] ïþ sunia tauiandans ïn friiaþuai uahsiaima ïn ina þo alla. ïze ïst haubiþ xristus. us þammei all leik gagatiloþ gagahaftiþ þairh allos gauissins andstaldis bi uaurstua ïn mitaþ ainis warioh fero [17. 1Kb] [Iu, 17. 1Kb] usuahst leikis tauiiþ du timreinai seinai ïn friiaþuai. þata nu qiþa iah ueituodia in frauiin ei þanaseiþs [18. 1Kb] ni gaggaiþ suasue iah anþaros þiudos gaggand ïn usuissia hugis seinis. riqizeinai gahugdai uisandans [19. 1Kb] [Iu, 19. 11Kb] framaþiai libainais guþs ïn unuitiis þis uisandins ïn ïm ïn daubiþos hairtane seinaize. þaiei usuenans uaurþanai sik silbans atgebun aglaitein ïn uaurstuein unhrainiþos allaizos ïn faihufrikein. [20. 1Kb] [21. 1Kb] ïþ ius ni sua ganemuþ xristu. iabai sueþauh ïna hausideduþ iah in ïmmai uslaisidai siiuþ. suasue [22. 1Kb] ïst sunia ïn ïesu. ei aflagiaiþ ius bi frumin usmeta þana fairnian mannan þana riurian bi lustum [23. 1Kb] [Iu, 23. 1Kb] [24. 1Kb] [Iu, 24. 1Kb] afmarzeinais. anuþ-þan niuiaiþ ahmin fraþiis ïzuaris iah gahamoþ þamma niuiin mann þamma bi [25. 1Kb] [Iu, 25. 1Kb] guþa gaskapanin ïn garaihtein iah ueihiþai sunios. ïn þizei aflagiandans liugn rodiaiþ sunia wariizuh [26. 1Kb] [Iu, 26. 1Kb] miþ newundiin seinamma. unte siiuþ anþar anþaris liþus. þuairhaiþ-þan siiaiþ iah ni frauaurkiaiþ. [27. 1Kb] [Iu, 27. 1Kb] [28. 1Kb] [Iu, 28. 1Kb] sunno ni disiggqai ana þuairhein ïzuara. ni gibiþ staþ unhulþin. sei hlefi. þanaseiþs ni hlifai [29. 1Kb] [Iu, 29. 7Kb] ak mais arbaidiai uaurkiands suesaim handum þiuþ ei habai dailian þaurbandin. ainhun uaurde ubilaize us munþa ïzuaramma ni usgaggai ak þatei goþ siiai du timreinai galaubeinais ei gibai anst [30. 1Kb] [Iu, 30. 1Kb] hausiandam. iah ni gauriaiþ þana ueihan ahman guþs. þammei gasiglidai siiuþ in daga uslauseinais. du aifaisium ustauh.



DU FILIPPISIUM. [12Kb]


[I, 14. 1Kb] [I, 14. 1Kb] --- . . . tans broþre ïn frauiin gatrauandans bandiom meinaim mais gadaursan unagandans uaurd [15. 1Kb] [I, 15. 4Kb] guþs rodian. sumai raihtis iah ïn neiþis iah haifstais. sumai þan ïn godis uiliins xristu meriand. [16. 1Kb] [I, 16. 3Kb] [17. 1Kb] [I, 17. 18Kb] sumai þan ïn friaþuai uitandans þatei du sunionai aiuaggelions gasatiþs ïm. ïþ þaiei us haifstai [18. 1Kb] [I, 18. 5Kb] xristu meriand. ni suiknaba munandans sik aglons urraisian bandiom meinaim. wa auk. þandei allaim haidum iaþþe ïnilon iaþþe suniai xristus meriada. iah ïn þamma fagino akei iah faginon duginna. [19. 1Kb] [I, 19. 1Kb] unte uait ei þata mis gagaggiþ du ganistai þairh ïzuara bida iah andstald ahmins xristaus [20. 1Kb] ïesuis bi usbeisnai iah uenai meinaim. unte ni ïn uaihtai gaaiuiskoþs uairþa ak ïn allai trauainai sue [21. 1Kb] [I, 21. 1Kb] sinteino iah nu mikiliada xristus ïn leika meinamma iaþþe þairh libain iaþþe þairh dauþu. aþþan [22. 1Kb] [I, 22. 1Kb] mis liban xristus ïst iah gasuiltan gauaurki. ïþ iabai liban ïn leika þata mis akran uaurstuis ïst iah [23. 1Kb] [I, 23. 15Kb] wa þau ualiau. ni kann. aþþan dishabaiþs us þaim tuaim þanuh lustu habands andletnan iah miþ [24. 1Kb] [I, 24. 1Kb] [25. 1Kb] [I, 25. 11Kb] xristau uisan. und filu mais batizo ïst. aþþan du uisan ïn leika þaurftizo ïn ïzuara. iah þata trigguaba uait þatei uisa iah þairhuisa at allaim ïzuis du ïzuarai framgahtai iah fahedai galaubeinais ïzuaraizos [26. 1Kb] [27. 1Kb] [I, 27. 12Kb] ei woftuli ïzuara biauknai ïn xristau ïesu ïn mis þairh meinana qum aftra du ïzuis. weh þatainei uairþaba aiuaggelions xristaus usmitaiþ ei iaþþe qimau iah gasaiwau ïzuis iaþþe aliaþro gahausiau bi ïzuis þatei standiþ ïn ainamma ahmin ainai saiualai samana arbaidiandans galaubeinai aiuaggelions. [28. 1Kb] [I, 28. 1Kb] iah ni ïn uaihtai afagidai fram þaim andastaþiam. þatei ïst ïm ustaikneins fralustais ïþ ïzuis ganistais [29. 1Kb] [I, 29. 4Kb] iah þata fram guþa. ïzuis fragiban ïst faur xristu ni þatainei du ïmma galaubian ak iah þatei faur ïna [30. 1Kb] [II, 1. 1Kb] uinnan. þo samon haifst habandans. þei gasaiwiþ ïn mis iah nu hauseiþ ïn mis. iabai wo nu gaþrafsteino ïn xristau iabai wo gaþlaihte friaþuos iabai wo gamainduþe ahmins iabai wo mildiþo iah gableiþeino. [2. 1Kb] usfulleiþ meina fahed ei þata samo hugiaiþ þo samon friaþua habandans samasaiualai  [3. 1Kb] [II, 3. 1Kb] samafraþiai. ni uaiht bi haifstai aiþþau lausai hauheinai ak ïn allai hauneinai gahugdais anþar anþarana [4. 1Kb] [II, 4. 8Kb] [5. 1Kb] [II, 5. 1Kb] munands sis auhuman. ni þo seina wariizuh mitondans ak iah þo anþaraize wariizuh. þata auk [6. 1Kb] [II, 6. 14Kb] fraþiaidau ïn ïzuis. þatei iah ïn xristau ïesu. sei in guþaskaunein uisands ni uulua rahnida uisan sik [7. 1Kb] [8. 1Kb] [II, 8. 1Kb] galeiko guþa. ak sik silban uslausida ulit skalkis nimands ïn galeikia manne uaurþans iah manaulia [22. 1Kb] [II, 22. 14Kb] bigitans sue manna. gahaunida sik silban uaurþans ufhausiands attin und------þatei sue attin barn [23. 1Kb] [II, 23. 4Kb] [24. 1Kb] [II, 24. 23Kb] miþskalkinoda mis ïn aiuaggelion. þanuh nu uenia sandian. biþe gasaiwa. wa bi mik ïst suns. aþþan [25. 1Kb] [II, 25. 1Kb] gatraua ïn frauiin þammei iah silba sprauto qima. aþþan þarb munda aipafraudeitu broþar iah gauaurstuan iah gahlaiban meinana ïþ ïzuarana apaustulu iah andbaht þaurftais meinaizos sandian du [26. 1Kb] [II, 26. 11Kb] [27. 1Kb] [II, 27. 1Kb] ïzuis. unte gairniands uas allaize ïzuara iah unuunands ïn þizei hausideduþ ïna siukan. iah auk siuks uas newa dauþau akei guþ ïna gaarmaida. aþþan ni þatainei ïna ak iah mik ei gaurein ana gaurein [28. 1Kb] [II, 28. 1Kb] ni habau. sniumundos nu ïnsandida ïna ei gasaiwandans ïna aftra faginoþ iah ïk hlasoza siiau ufmunnands [29. 1Kb] [II, 29. 1Kb] wa bi ïzuis ïst. andnimaiþ nu ïna ïn frauiin miþ allai fahedai iah þans sualeikans suerans habaiþ. [II, 30. 22Kb] unte ïn uaurstuis xristaus und daupu atnewida ufarmunnonds saiualai seinai ei usfullidedi ïzuar [III, 1. 1Kb] [III, 1. 1Kb] gaidu bi mein andbahti. þata anþar broþrius meinai faginoþ ïn frauiin þo samona ïzuis melian mis [2. 1Kb] [III, 2. 9Kb] sueþauh ni latei ïþ ïzuis þuastiþa. saiwiþ þans hundans saiwiþ þans ubilans uaurstuians saiwiþ þo [3. 1Kb] [III, 3. 12Kb] gamaitanon. aþþan ueis siium bimait ueis ahmin guþa skalkinondans iah woþandans ïn xristau ïesu  [4. 1Kb] iah ni ïn leika gatrauam. iah þan ïk habands trauain iah ïn leika. iabai was anþar þugkeiþ trauan in [5. 1Kb] [III, 5. 16Kb] [III, 5. 1Kb] leika. ïk mais. bimait ahtaudogs us knodai ïsrelis kuniis baineiameinis haibraius us haibraium bi [6. 1Kb] [III, 6. 1Kb] uitoda fareisaius. bi aliana urakiands aikklesion. bi garaihtein þizai sei ïn uitoda ïst. uisands usfairina. [7. 1Kb] [III, 7. 6Kb] [8. 1Kb] [III, 8. 7Kb] akei þatei uas mis gauaurki. þatuh rahnida ïn xristaus sleiþa uisan. aþþan sueþauh all domia sleiþa uisan ïn ufarassaus kunþiis ïesuis xristaus frauiins meinis. ïn þizei allamma gasleiþiþs ïm iah domia [9. 1Kb] [III, 9. 1Kb] smarnos uisan allata ei xristau du gauaurkia habau iah bigitaidau ïn ïmma ni habands meina garaihtein [10. 1Kb] [III, 10. 14Kb] þo us uitoda ak þairh galaubein ïesuis xristaus. sei us guþa ïst garaihtei ana galaubeinai du [11. 1Kb] [III, 11. 1Kb] kunnan ïna iah maht usstassais ïs iah gamainduþ þulaine ïs. miþkauriþs uas dauþau ïs. ei waiua gaqimau [12. 1Kb] [III, 12. 16Kb] ïn usstassai us dauþaim. ni þatei iu andnemiau aiþþau iu garaihts gadomiþs siiau. aþþan ïk [13. 1Kb] [III, 13. 5Kb] afargagga ei gafahau. ïn þammei gafahans uarþ fram xristau. broþrius ik mik silban ni þau man [14. 1Kb] [III, 14. 1Kb] gafahan. aþþan ain sueþauh þaim afta ufarmunnonds ïþ du þaim þei faura sind mik ufþandians bi [15. 1Kb] [III, 15. 10Kb] mundrein afargagga afar sigislauna þizos ïupa laþonais guþs ïn xristau ïesu. sua managai nu sue [16. 1Kb] [III, 16. 1Kb] siiaima fullauitans. þata hugiaima iah iabai wa alialeikos hugiiþ. iah þata ïzuis guþ andhuliiþ. aþþan sueþauh du þammei gasneuum ei samo hugiaima iah samo fraþiaima. samon gaggan garaideinai. [17. 1Kb] [III, 17. 1Kb] miþgaleikondans meinai uairþaiþ broþrius iah mundoþ ïzuis þans sua gaggandans suasue habaiþ [18. 1Kb] frisaht unsis. unte managai gaggand. þanzei ufta qaþ ïzuis ïþ nu iah gretands qiþa þans [19. 1Kb] [III, 19. 1Kb] fiiands galgins xristaus. þizeei andeis uairþiþ fralusts. þize guþ uamba ïst iah uulþus ïn skandai [20. 1Kb] ïze. þaiei airþeinaim frapiand. ïþ unsara bauains ïn himinam ïst. þaþrei iah nasiand usbeidam [21. 1Kb] [III, 21. 12Kb] frauian ïesu xristu. sei ïnmaideiþ leika hauneinais unsaraizos du ïbnaskauniamma leika uulþaus  [Iu, 1. 1Kb] [Iu, 1. 9Kb] seinis bi uaurstua. unte mag iah ufhnaiuian sis alla. suei nu broþrius meinai liubans iah [2. 1Kb] [Iu, 2. 15Kb] lustusamans. faheþs iah uaiþs meins sua standiþ ïn frauiin. aiodian bidia iah syntykein [3. 1Kb] [Iu, 3. 5Kb] bidia þata samo fraþian ïn frauiin. iai iah þuk ualiso bidia gaiuko niþais þos þozei miþarbaididedun mis ïn aiuaggelion miþ klemaintau iah anþaraim gauaurstuam meinaim. þizeei namna sind ïn bokom [4. 1Kb] [Iu, 4. 1Kb] [5. 1Kb] [Iu, 5. 1Kb] libainais. nunu nu faginoþ ïn frauiin sinteino. aftra qiþa faginoþ. anauilie ïzuara kunþa siai [6. 1Kb] [Iu, 6. 22Kb] allaim mannam. frauia newa ïst. ni uaihtai maurnaiþ ak ïn allai bidai iah aihtronai miþ auiliudam [7. 1Kb] [Iu, 7. 11Kb] bidos ïzuaros kunþos siiaina at guþa. iah gauairþi guþs. þatei ufarïst all ahane. fastaiþ hairtona iah [8. 1Kb] [Iu, 8. 11Kb] leika ïzuara ïn xristau ïesu. þata anþar broþrius þiswah þatei ïst suniein þiswah þatei gariud þiswah þatei garaiht þiswah þatei ueih þiswah þatei liubaleik þiswah þatei uailameri. iabai wo godeino. [9. 1Kb] [Iu, 9. 1Kb] iabai wo hazeino. þata mitoþ. þatei iah galaisideduþ ïzuis iah ganemuþ iah gahausideduþ [10. 1Kb] [Iu, 10. 1Kb] iah gasewuþ ïn mis. þata tauiaiþ iah guþ gauairþeis siiai miþ ïzuis. aþþan faginoda ïn frauiin mikilaba. unte iu wan gaþaihuþ du faur mik fraþian. ana þammei iah froþuþ aþþan analatidai uaurþuþ. [11. 1Kb] [12. 1Kb] [Iu, 12. 1Kb] ni þatei bi þarbai qiþau. unte ïk galaisida mik. ïn þaimei ïm ganohiþs uisan. lais iah haunian mik lais iah ufarassu haban. ïn allamma iah ïn allaim usþroþiþs ïm iah sads uairþan iah gredags [13. 1Kb] [Iu, 13. 1Kb] [14. 1Kb] [Iu, 14. 1Kb] iah ufarassau haban iah þarbos þulan. all mag ïn þamma ïnsuinþiandin mik xristau. aþþan sueþauh [15. 1Kb] [Iu, 15. 1Kb] uaila gatauideduþ gamainia briggandans meina aglon. aþþan uituþ iah ius filippisius þatei ïn anastodeinai aiuaggelions þan usïddia af makidonai. ni ainnohun aikklesiono mis gamainida ïn [16. 1Kb] [Iu, 16. 4Kb] raþion gibos iah andanemis alia ius ainai. unte iah ïn þaissalauneikai iah ainamma sinþa iah tuaim [17. 1Kb] [Iu, 17. 1Kb] andauizn mis ïnsandideduþ. ni þatei gasokiau giba ak gasokia ak . . . ---



DU KAULAUSSAIM.


[I, 6. 1Kb] [I, 6. 1Kb] [7. 1Kb] [I, 7. 4Kb] ---ïn suniai. suasue ganemuþ af aipafrin þamma liubin gaskalkia unsaramma. sei ïst triggua faur [8. 1Kb] [9. 1Kb] [I, 9. 9Kb] ïzuis andbahts xristaus ïesuis. sei iah gakannida uns ïzuara friaþua ïn ahmin. duþþe iah ueis fram þamma daga ei hausidedum ni weilaidedum faur ïzuis bidiandans iah aihtrondans ei fullnaiþ [10. 1Kb] [I, 10. 27Kb] kunþiis uiliins ïs ïn allai handugein iah frodein ahmeinai. ei gaggaiþ uairþaba frauiins ïn allamma [11. 1Kb] þatei galeikai. ïn allamma uaurstue godaize akran bairandans ïn ufkunþia guþs ïn allai mahtai [12. 1Kb] [I, 12. 14Kb] gasuinþidai bi mahtai uulþaus ïs ïn allai usþulainai iah usbeisnai miþ fahedai auiliudondans attin [13. 1Kb] [I, 13. 5Kb] sei laþoda ïzuis du dailai hlautis ueihaize ïn liuhada. sei galausida ïzuis us ualdufnia riqizis iah [14. 1Kb] [I, 14. 1Kb] atnam ïn þiudangardia sunaus friaþuos seinaizos. ïn þammei habam faurbauht fralet frauaurhte. [15. 1Kb] [I, 15. 1Kb] [16. 1Kb] [I, 16. 3Kb] sei ïst frisahts guþs ungasaiwanis frumabaur allaizos gaskaftais. unte ïn ïmma gaskapana uaurþun alla ïn himina iah ana airþai þo gasaiwanona iah þo ungasaiwanona iaþþe sitlos iaþþe frauiinassius [17. 1Kb] iaþþe reikia iaþþe ualdufnia. alla þairh ïna iah ïn ïmma gaskapana sind. iah ïs ïst faura allaim [18. 1Kb] iah alla ïn ïmma ussatida sind. iah ïs ïst haubiþ leikis aikklesions. sei ïst anastodeins frumabaur [19. 1Kb] [20. 1Kb] [I, 20. 13Kb] us dauþaim ei siiai ïn allaim ïs frumadein habands. unte ïn ïmma galeikaida alla fullon bauan iah þairh ïna gafriþon alla ïn ïmma gauairþi tauiands þairh bloþ galgins ïs þairh ïna iaþþe þo ana airþai [21. 1Kb] [I, 21. 13Kb] iaþþe þo ana himinam. iah ïzuis simle uisandans framapidans iah fiiands gahugdai ïn uaurstuam ubilaim. [22. 1Kb] [I, 22. 6Kb] ïþ nu gafriþodai ïn leika mammons ïs þairh dauþu du atsatian ïzuis ueihans iah unuammans iah unfairinans [23. 1Kb] [I, 23. 1Kb] faura ïmma. iabai sueþauh þairhuisiþ ïn galaubeinai gaþuastidai iah gatulgidai iah ni afuagidai af uenai aiuaggelions þei hausideduþ sei merida ïst ïn alla gaskaft þo uf himina. þizozei uarþ ïk paulus [24. 1Kb] [I, 24. 18Kb] andbahts. nu fagino ïn þaimei uinna faur ïzuis iah usfullia gaidua aglono xristaus ïn leika meinamma  [25. 1Kb] faur leik ïs. þatei ïst aikklesio. þizozei uarþ ïk andbahts bi ragina guþs. þatei giban ïst mis [26. 1Kb] [I, 26. 1Kb] ïn ïzuis du usfullian uaurd guþs. runa sei gafulgina uas fram aiuam iah fram aldim ïþ nu gasuikunþida [27. 1Kb] [I, 27. 13Kb] uarþ þaim ueiham ïs. þaimei uilda guþ gakannian gabein uulþaus þizos runos ïn þiudom. þatei [28. 1Kb] [I, 28. 1Kb] ïst xristus ïn ïzuis uens uulþaus. þanei ueis gateiham talziandans all manne iah laisiandans all [29. 1Kb] [I, 29. 10Kb] manne ïn allai handugein ei atsatiaima all manne fullauitan ïn xristau ïesu. du þammei arbaidia usdaudiands [II, 11. 1Kb] [II, 11. 1Kb] bi uaurstua sei ïnna usuaurkeiþ ïn mis ïn mahtai.------frauaurhte leikis ïn bimaita xristaus. [12. 1Kb] miþganauistrodai ïmma ïn daupeinai. ïn þizaiei iah miþurrisuþ þairh galaubein uaurstuis [13. 1Kb] [II, 13. 7Kb] guþs. sei urraisida ïna us dauþaim. iah ïzuis dauþans uisandans missadedim iah unbimaita leikis [14. 1Kb] [II, 14. 23Kb] ïzuaris miþgaqiuida miþ ïmma fragibands uns allos missadedins. afsuairbands þos ana uns uadiabokos raginam seinaim. þatei uas andaneiþo uns iah þata usnam us midumai ganagliands ïta du galgin. [15. 1Kb] [II, 15. 32Kb] andhamonds sik leika reikia iah ualdufnia gatarhida balþaba gablauþiands þo bairhtaba ïn sis. [16. 1Kb] [II, 16. 23Kb] ni manna nu ïzuis bidomiai ïn mata aiþþau ïn dragka aiþþau ïn dailai dagis dulþais aiþþau fulliþe [17. 1Kb] [18. 1Kb] aiþþau sabbatum. þatei ïst skadus þize anauairþane ïþ leik xristaus. ni washun ïzuis gaiiukai uiliands ïn hauneinai iah blotinassau aggile. þatei ni saw ushafiands sik suare ufblesans fram fraþia leikis [19. 1Kb] seinis iah ni habands haubiþ. us þammei all leik þairh gauissins iah gabindos auknando iah þeihando [20. 1Kb] [II, 20. 1Kb] uahseiþ du uahstau guþs. iabai gasuultuþ miþ xristau af stabim þis fairwaus. wa þanaseiþs [21. 1Kb] [II, 21. 1Kb] [22. 1Kb] [II, 22. 1Kb] sue qiuai ïn þamma fairwau urrediþ. ni teikais ni atsnarpiais ni kausiais. þatei ïst all du riurein. [23. 1Kb] [II, 23. 19Kb] þairh þatei ïs brukiaidau bi anabusnim iah laiseinim manne. þei sind sueþauh uaurd habandona handugeins þuhtaus ïn fastubnia iah hauneinai hairtins iah unfreideinai leikis ni ïn sueriþo wizai du  [III, 1. 1Kb] [III, 1. 1Kb] soþa leikis. iabai nu miþurrisuþ xristau. þei ïupa sind sokeiþ. þarei xristus ïst ïn taihsuai guþs sitands. [2. 1Kb] [3. 1Kb] þaimei ïupa sind fraþiaiþ ni þaim þei ana airþai sind. unte gadauþnodeduþ iah libains ïzuara [4. 1Kb] [III, 4. 5Kb] gafulgina ïst miþ xristau in guþa. þan xristus suikunþs uairþiþ libains ïzuara. þanuh iah ius bairhtai [5. 1Kb] [III, 5. 1Kb] uairþiþ miþ ïmma ïn uulþau. dauþeiþ nu liþuns ïzuarans þans þaiei sind ana airþai horinassu [6. 1Kb] unhrainein uinnon lustu ubilana iah faihugeironi. sei ïst galiugagude skalkinassus. þairh þei qimiþ [7. 1Kb] [8. 1Kb] [III, 8. 1Kb] hatis guþs ana sunum ungalaubeinais. ïn þaimei iah ius ïddieduþ simle. þan libaideduþ ïn þaim. ïþ nu aflageiþ iah ius þo alla hatis þuairhein unselein anaqiss aglaitiuaurdein. us munþa ïzuaramma ni [9. 1Kb] [10. 1Kb] [III, 10. 11Kb] usgaggai. ni liugaiþ ïzuis misso afslaupiandans ïzuis þana fairnian mannan miþ toiam ïs iah gahamoþ [11. 1Kb] [III, 11. 1Kb] niuiamma þamma ananiuidin du ufkunþia bi frisahtai þis sei gaskof ïna. þarei nist kreks iah ïudaius. bimait iah faurafilli. barbarus iah skyþus. skalks iah freis. ak alla iah ïn allaim xristus. [12. 1Kb] [III, 12. 37Kb] gahamoþ ïzuis nu sue gaualisai guþs ueihans iah ualisans brusts bleiþein armahairtein selein haunein [13. 1Kb] [III, 13. 1Kb] a . . . qairrein usbeisnein. þulandans ïzuis misso iah fragibandans silbans. iabai was uiþra wana habai [14. 1Kb] [III, 14. 8Kb] fairina suasue iah xristus fragaf ïzuis sua iah ius tauiaiþ. aþþan ufar alla friaþua. sei ïst gabindi [15. 1Kb] [III, 15. 8Kb] ustauhtais. iah gauairþi guþs suigniaiþ ïn hairtam ïzuaraim. ïn þammei iah laþodai uesuþ ïn ainamma [16. 1Kb] [III, 16. 17Kb] leika iah auiliudondans uairþaiþ. uaurd xristaus bauai ïn ïzuis gabigaba. ïn allai handugein iah frodein ahmeinai laisiandans iah talziandans ïzuis silbans psalmom hazeinim sagguim [17. 1Kb] [III, 17. 4Kb] ahmeinaim ïn anstai sigguandans ïn hairtam ïzuaraim frauiin. all þiswah þatei tauiaiþ ïn uaurda aiþþau ïn uaurstua. all ïn namin frauiins ïesuis auiliudondans guþa attin þairh [18. 1Kb] [III, 18. 1Kb] [19. 1Kb] [III, 19. 1Kb] ïna. ius qinons ufhausiaiþ uairam ïzuaraim sue gaqimiþ ïn frauiin. uairos friioþ qenins  [20. 1Kb] [III, 20. 1Kb] ïzuaros iah ni siiaiþ baitrai uiþra þos. barna ufhausiaiþ fadreinam bi all. unte þata uaila [21. 1Kb] [III, 21. 27Kb] galekaiþ ïst ïn frauiin. ius attans ni gramiaiþ barna ïzuara du þuairhein ei ni uairþaina [22. 1Kb] [III, 22. 15Kb] ïn unlustau. þeuisa ufhausiaiþ bi all leika frauiam ni ïn augam skalkinondans sue mannam samiandans [23. 1Kb] [III, 23. 9Kb] ak ïn ainfalþein hairtins ogandans guþ. þiswah þatei tauiaiþ us saiualai uaurkiaiþ sue frauiin [24. 1Kb] [25. 1Kb] [III, 25. 3Kb] ni mannam uitandans þatei af frauiin nimiþ andalauni arbiis. unte frauiin xristau skalkinoþ. sa auk [Iu, 1. 1Kb] [Iu, 1. 1Kb] skaþula andnimiþ þatei skoþ iah nist uiliahalþei at guþa. ius frauians garaiht iah ïbnassu þeuisam [2. 1Kb] [Iu, 2. 23Kb] atkunnaiþ uitandans þatei aihuþ iah ius frauian ïn himinam. bidai haftiandans ïzuis uakandans ïn [3. 1Kb] ïzai ïn auiliudam. bidiandans samana iah bi uns ei guþ uslukai unsis haurd uaurdis du rodian runa [4. 1Kb] [Iu, 4. 1Kb] [5. 1Kb] [Iu, 5. 1Kb] xristaus ïn pizozei iah gabundans ïm. ei gabairhtiau þo suasue skuliau rodian. ïn handugein gaggaiþ [6. 1Kb] [Iu, 6. 8Kb] du þaim uta þata mel usbugiandans. uaurd ïzuar sinteino ïn anstai salta gasuqoþ siai ei uiteiþ waiua [7. 1Kb] [Iu, 7. 1Kb] skuleiþ ainwariammeh andhafian. þatei bi mik ïst all gakanneiþ ïzuis tykekus sa liuba broþar iah [8. 1Kb] triggua andbahts iah gaskalki ïn frauiin. þanei ïnsandida du ïzuis duþþe ei kunniai wa bi ïzuis ïst [9. 1Kb] [Iu, 9. 3Kb] iah gaþrafstiai hairtona ïzuara miþ aunisimau þamma liubin iah trigguin broþr. sei ïst us ïzuis. [10. 1Kb] [Iu, 10. 1Kb] þaiei all ïzuis gakanniand þatei her ïst. goleiþ ïzuis areistarkus sa miþfrahunþana mis iah markus [11. 1Kb] [Iu, 11. 15Kb] gadiliggs barnabins. du þanei nemuþ anabusnins. iabai qimai at ïzuis. andnimaiþ ïna. iah ïesus sei haitada iustus þaiei sind us bimaita. þai ainai gauaurstuans sind þiudangardios guþs. þaiei uesun mis [12. 1Kb] [Iu, 12. 26Kb] du gaþrafsteinai. goleiþ ïzuis aipafras sa us izuis skalks xristaus sa sinteino usdaudiands bi ïzuis ïn [13. 1Kb] [Iu, 13. 15Kb] bidom ei standaiþ allauaurstuans iah fullauitans ïn allamma uiliin guþs. ueituodia auk ïmma þatei [14. 1Kb] [Iu, 14. 9Kb] habaiþ manag alian bi ïzuis iah du þans þaiei sind ïn laudeikaia iah ïairaupaulein. goleiþ ïzuis lukas [15. 1Kb] leikeis sa liuba. goleiþ þans ïn laudeikaia broþruns iah nymfan iah þo ïngardion ïs aikklesion.  [16. 1Kb] [Iu, 16. 7Kb] iah þan ussigguaidau at ïzuis so aipistaule. tauiaiþ ei iah ïn laudekaion aikklesion ussigguaidau iah [17. 1Kb] þei ïst us laudeikaion ius ussigguaid. iah qiþaiþ arkippau saiw þata andbahti þatei andnamt ïn [18. 1Kb] [19. 1Kb] [Iu, 19. 7Kb] frauiin ei ïta usfulliais. goleins meinai handau paulaus. gamuneiþ meinaizos bandios. ants miþ ïzuis amen.


du kaulaussaim ustauh



DU þAISSALAUNEIKIM. ·A· [1Kb]


[II, 10. 1Kb] [II, 10. 23Kb] ---iah guþ waiua ueihaba iah garaihtaba iah unfairinodaba ïzuis þaim galaubiandam uesum. [11. 1Kb] [II, 11. 6Kb] [12. 1Kb] suasue uituþ ainwarianoh ïzuara sue atta barna seina bidiandans ïzuis iah gaþlaihandans iah ueituodiandans [13. 1Kb] [II, 13. 1Kb] du gaggan ïzuis uairþaba guþs. sei laþoda ïzuis du seinai þiudangardiai iah uulþau. duþe iah ueis auiliudom guþa unsueibandans. unte nimandans at uns uaurd hauseinais guþs andnemuþ ni suasue uaurd manne ak suasue ïst suniaba uaurd guþs. þatei iah uaurkheiþ ïn izuis iuzei galaubeiþ. [14. 1Kb] [II, 14. 6Kb] ius auk galeikondans uaurþuþ broþrius aikklesiom guþs þaim uisandeim ïn ïudaia ïn xristau ïesu. [15. 1Kb] [II, 15. 5Kb] unte þata samo uunnuþ iah ius fram ïzuaraim ïnkuniam suasue iah ueis fram ïudaium. þaiei iah frauiin usqemun ïesua iah suesaim praufetum iah uns fraurekun iah guþa ni galeikandans iah allaim [16. 1Kb] [II, 16. 1Kb] mannam andaneiþans sind. uariandans uns du þiudom rodian ei ganisaina du usfullian seinos frauaurhtins [17. 1Kb] [II, 17. 1Kb] sinteino. aþþan snauh ana ïns hatis guþs und andi. aþþan ueis broþrius gaainanaidai af ïzuis du mela weilos anduairþia ni hairtin ufarassau sniumidedum andaugi ïzuara gasaiwan ïn managamma [18. 1Kb] [II, 18. 4Kb] lustau. unte uildedum qimam at ïzuis ïk raihtis paulus iah ainamma sinþa iah tuaim iah analatida uns [19. 1Kb] [II, 19. 9Kb] satana. wa auk ist unsara uens aiþþau faheþs aiþþau uaips woftulios. niu ius ïn anduairþia frauiins  [20. 1Kb] [III, 1. 1Kb] [III, 1. 7Kb] unsaris ïesuis xristaus ïn ïs quma. ius auk siuþ uulþus unsar iah faheþs. ïn þizei iu ni usþulandans [2. 1Kb] [III, 2. 12Kb] þanamais galeikaida uns ei biliþanai ueseima ïn aþeinim ainai. iah ïnsandidedum teimauþaiu broþar unsarana iah andbaht guþs ïn aiuaggelion xristaus ei ïzuis gatulgiai iah bidiai bi galaubein ïzuara. [3. 1Kb] [III, 3. 7Kb] [4. 1Kb] [III, 4. 1Kb] ei ni ainshun afagiaidau ïn þaim agguiþom. silbans auk. uituþ þatei du þamma ratidai siium. iah auk þan uesum at ïzuis. fauraqeþum ïzuis þatei anauairþ uas uns du uinnan agliþos suasue iah uarþ [5. 1Kb] [III, 5. 1Kb] iah uituþ. duþþe iah ïk iu ni usþulands ïnsandida du ufkunnan galaubein ïzuara ïbai aufto usfaifraisi [6. 1Kb] [III, 6. 4Kb] ïzuis sa fraisands iah suare uairþai arbaiþs unsara. aþþan nu at quimandin teimauþaiu at unsis fram ïzuis iah gateihandin uns galaubein friaþua ïzuara iah þatei gaminþi unsar habaiþ god sinteino gairniandans [7. 1Kb] [III, 7. 4Kb] unsis gasaiwan suasue iah ueis ïzuis. ïnuh þis gaþrafstidai siium broþrius fram ïzuis ana [8. 1Kb] allai nauþai iah aglon unsarai ïn ïzuaraizos galaubeinais. unte sai libam. iabai ius gastandiþ ïn [9. 1Kb] [III, 9. 10Kb] frauiin. wa auk auiliude magum usgildan frauiin guþa bi ïzuis ana allai fahedai. þizaiei faginom ïn [10. 1Kb] [III, 10. 14Kb] ïzuara faura guþa unsaramma. naht iah daga ufarassau bidiandans ei gasaiwaima anduairþia ïzuara [11. 1Kb] iah ustiuhaima uaninassu galaubeinais ïzuaraizos. aþþan silba guþ iah atta unsar iah frauia unsar [12. 1Kb] [III, 12. 4Kb] ïesus xristus garaihtiai uig unsarana du ïzuis. aþþan ïzuis frauia managiai iah ganohnan gatauiai [13. 1Kb] [III, 13. 1Kb] friaþuai ïn ïzuis misso iah allans suasue iah ueis ïn ïzuis du tulgian hairtona ïzuara unfairinona ïn ueihiþai faura guþa iah attin unsaramma ïn quma frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus miþ allaim þaim [Iu, 1. 1Kb] [Iu, 1. 28Kb] ueiham seinaim. þannu nu broþrius anahaitam bidai ïzuis iah bidiam ïn frauiin ïesua ei suasue andnemuþ [2. 1Kb] [Iu, 2. 1Kb] at uns waiua skuluþ gaggan iah galeikan guþa suasue iah gaggiþ iah gaaukaiþ mais. uituþ [3. 1Kb] [Iu, 3. 16Kb] auk waizos anabusnins atgebum ïzuis þairh frauian ïesu xristu. þata auk ïst uilia guþs ueihiþai ïzuara [4. 1Kb] [Iu, 4. 1Kb] ei gahabaiþ ïzuis af kalkinassau. ei uiti wariizuh ïzuara gastaldan sein kas ïn ueihiþai iah sueriþai. [5. 1Kb] [6. 1Kb] [Iu, 6. 23Kb] ni ïn gairunia lustaus suasue iah þiudos. þozei ni kunnun guþ. ei was ni ufargaggai nih bifaih..---broþar  [7. 1Kb] seinana. unte fraueitands frauia ïst allaize suasue iah fauraqeþum ïzuis iah ueituodidedum. ni [8. 1Kb] [Iu, 8. 10Kb] auk laþoda uns guþ du unhrainiþai ak du ueihiþai. ïnuh þis nu sei ufbrikiþ. ni mann ufbrikiþ ak [9. 1Kb] [Iu, 9. 11Kb] guþa sei gaf ahman seinana ueihana ïzuis. aþþan bi broþrulubon ni þaurbum melian ïzuis. unte [10. 1Kb] silbans ius at guþa uslaisidai siiuþ du friion ïzuis misso. iah auk tauiiþ þata ïn allans broþruns ïn [11. 1Kb] [Iu, 11. 8Kb] allai makidonai. aþþan bidiam ïzuis broþrius biauknan mais iah biarbaidian anaqal iah tauian suesa [12. 1Kb] [Iu, 12. 8Kb] iah uaurkian handum ïzuaraim suasue iah ïzuis anabudum. ei gaggaiþ gafehaba du þaim þaiei uta [13. 1Kb] [Iu, 13. 4Kb] sind iah ni ainishun wis þaurbeiþ. aþþan ni uileima ïzuis unueisans broþrius bi þans anaslepandans [14. 1Kb] [Iu, 14. 1Kb] ei ni saurgaiþ sue þai anþarai þaiei ni haband uen. unte iabai galaubiam þatei ïesus gasualt iah usstoþ. [15. 1Kb] sua iah guþ þans þaiei anasaislepun þairh ïesu tiuhaiþ miþ ïmma. þatuþ---þan ïzuis qiþam ïn uaurda frauiins þatei ueis þai libandans þai bilaibidans ïn quma frauiins ni bisniuam faur þans [16. 1Kb] [Iu, 16. 1Kb] anaslepandans. unte silba frauia ïn haitiai ïn stibnai arkaggilaus iah ïn þuthaurna guþs dalaþ atsteigiþ [17. 1Kb] [Iu, 17. 10Kb] af himina iah dauþans þai ïn xristau usstandand faurþis. þaþro þan ueis þai libandans þai aflifnandans suns miþ ïmma frauiluanda ïn milhmam du gamotian frauiin ïn luftau iah framuigis miþ [18. 1Kb] [Iu, 18. 1Kb] ; [u, 1. 1Kb] [u, 1. 20Kb] frauiin uairþam. suei nu þrafsteiþ ïzuis misso ïn þaim uaurdam. aþþan bi þo þeihsa iah mela [2. 1Kb] broþrius ni þaurbum ei ïizuis meliaima. unte silbans gaagguo uituþ þatei dags frauiins sue þiubs [3. 1Kb] [u, 3. 9Kb] ïn naht sua qimiþ. þan qiþand gauairþi iah tulgiþa. þanuh unueniggo ïns biqimith fralusts suasue [4. 1Kb] sair qiþuhaftons iah unþaþliuhand. aþþan ius broþrius ni siiuþ ïn riqiza ei sa dags ïzuis sue þiubs [5. 1Kb] [u, 5. 6Kb] [6. 1Kb] [u, 6. 4Kb] gafahai. unte allai ius sunius liuhadis siiuþ iah sunius dagis ni siuþ nahts ni riqizis. þann nu ni [7. 1Kb] [u, 7. 1Kb] slepaima sue þai anparai ak uakaima iah uarai siiaima. unte þaiei slepand. naht slepand iah [8. 1Kb] [u, 8. 1Kb] þaiei drugkanai uairþand. nahts drugkanai uairþand. ïp ueis dagis uisandans unskauai siiaima gahamodai  [9. 1Kb] brunion galaubeinais iah friaþuos iah hilma uenai nasseinais. unte ni satida uns guþ ïn hatis [10. 1Kb] [u, 10. 1Kb] ak du gafreideinai ganistais þairh frauian unsarana ïesu xristu. sei gasualt faur uns ei iaþþe [11. 1Kb] slepaima iaþþe uakaima samana miþ ïmma libaima. ïnuh þis þrafsteiþ ïzuis misso iah timriaiþ [12. 1Kb] [u, 12, 13. 41Kb] ainwariizuh anþar anþarana suasue iah tauiiþ. aþþan bidiam ïzuis broþrius kunnan þans [13. 1Kb] arbaidiandans ïn ïzuis iah faurstassians ïzuarans ïn frauiin. sueraiþ ïns ufarassau ïn friaþuai ïn [14. 1Kb] [u, 14. 16Kb] uaurstuis ïze iah gauairþi habaiþ ïn ïzuis. bidiamuþ-þan ïzuis broþrius talziaiþ þans ungatassans [15. 1Kb] [u, 15. 8Kb] þrafstiaiþ þans grindafraþians usþulaiþ þans siukans usbeisneigai siiaiþ uiþra allans. saiwiþ ïbai was ubil ana ubilamma wamma usgildai ak sinteino þiuþ laistiaiþ miþ ïzuis misso iah uiþra allans. [16. 1Kb] [u, 16. 1Kb] [17. 1Kb] [18. 1Kb] [u, 18. 1Kb] sinteino faginoþ ïn frauiin. unsueibandans bidiaiþ. ïn allamma auiliudoþ. þata auk ïst uilia guþs ïn [19. 1Kb] [20. 1Kb] [21. 1Kb] xristau ïesu ïn ïzuis. ahman ni afwapiaiþ. praufetiam ni frakunneiþ. aþþan all uskiusaiþ. þatei goþ [22. 1Kb] [u, 22. 1Kb] [23. 1Kb] [u, 23. 43Kb] siiai gahabaiþ. af allamma uaihte ubilaizo afhabaiþ ïzuis. aþþan silba guþ gauairþiis gaueihai ïzuis allandio iah gahailana ïzuarana ahman iah saiuala iah leik unfairinona ïn quma frauiins unsaris ïesuis [24. 1Kb] [25. 1Kb] [u, 25. 4Kb] xristaus gafastaidau. triggus sei laþoda ïzuis. sei iah tauiiþ. broþrius bidiaiþuþ-pan iah bi uns. [26. 1Kb] [27. 1Kb] [u, 27. 5Kb] goliaiþ broþruns allans ïn gafriionai ueihai. bisuara ïzuis ïn frauiin ei ussigguaidau so aipistaule [28. 1Kb] [u, 28. 1Kb] þaim ueiham broþrum. ansts frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus miþ ïzuis. amen.



DU þAISSALAUNEKAIUM ANþARA ANASTODEIþ. [1Kb]


[I, 1. 1Kb] Paulus iah silbanus iah teimauþaius aikklesion þaissalauneikaie ïn guþa attin unsaramma iah frauiin [2. 1Kb] [3. 1Kb] ïesu xristau. ansts ïzuis iah gauairþi fram guþa attin unsaramma iah frauiin ïesu xristau. auiliudon  skulum guþa sinteino ïn ïzuara broþrius suasue uairþ ïst. unte ufaruahseiþ galaubeins ïzuara iah [4. 1Kb] [I, 4. 9Kb] managniþ friaþua ainwariizuh allaize. ïzuara ïn ïzuis misso. suei ueis silbans ïn ïzuis wopam ïn aikklesiom guþs ïn stiuitiis ïzuaris iah galaubeinais ïn allaim urakiom ïzuaraim iah aglom þozei [5. 1Kb] [I, 5. 1Kb] usþulaiþ. taikn garaihtaizos stauos guþs du uairþans briggan ïzuis þiudangardios guþs ïn þizozei iah [6. 1Kb] [I, 6. 12Kb] [7. 1Kb] [I, 7. 17Kb] uinniþ. sueþauh iabai garaiht ïst at guþa usgildan þaim gaþreihandam uns agguiþa. ïþ izuïs gaþraihanaim ïusila miþ uns ïn andhuleinai frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus af himinam miþ aggilum mahtais [8. 1Kb] [I, 8. 19Kb] ïs. ïn funins lauhmonai gibandins fraueit ni kunnandam guþ iah ni ufhausiandam aiuaggelion frauiins [9. 1Kb] [I, 9. 34Kb] unsaris ïesuis xristaus. þaiei . . . . . . . fralust aiueinon fram anduairþia frauiins iah fram uulþau [10. 1Kb] [I, 10. 36Kb] mahtais ïs. þan qimiþ ushauhian ïn þaim ueiham ïs iah . . . . . le . . . . . . ba . . . . . . ïn allaim þaim [11. 1Kb] [I, 11. 1Kb] galaubiandam unte galaubida ïst ueituodei unsara ïzuis in iainamma daga. du þammei iah bidiam sinteino bi ïzuis ei ïzuis uairþans briggai þizos laþonais guþ unsar iah fulliai alla leikain þiuþeinais [12. 1Kb] [I, 12. 8Kb] seinaizos iah uaurstu galaubeinais ïn mahtai. ei ushauhnai namo frauiins unsaris ïesuis ïn ïzuis iah  [II, 1. 1Kb] [II, 1. 11Kb] ius ïn ïmma bi anstai guþs unsaris iah frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus. aþþan bidiam ïzuis broþruns [2. 1Kb] [II, 2. 29Kb] ïn qumis frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus iah . . gaqumþais unsaraizos du ïmma. du ni sprauto uagian ïzuis ahin nih drobnan nih þairh ahman nih þairh uaurda nih þairh aipistaulein sue þairh uns [3. 1Kb] [II, 3. 29Kb] þatei ïnstandai dags xristaus. ni washun ïzuis usluto wamma haidau unte niba qimiþ afstass faurþis [4. 1Kb] [II, 4. 10Kb] iah andhulids uairþai manna frauaurhtais sunus fralustais. sa andstandands iah ufarhafiands sik [15. 1Kb] [II, 15. 36Kb] [16. 1Kb] ufar all qiþana guþ aiþþau allata blotinassu suei ïn guþs al sitan s . . .------unsaros. aþþan silba frauia unsar ïesus xristus iah guþ iah atta unsar sei friioda uns iah atgaf gaþlaiht aiueina iah [17. 1Kb] [II, 17. 5Kb] uen goda ïn anstai. gaþrafstiai hairtona ïzuara iah gatulgiai ïn allaim uaurstuam iah uaurdam godaim. [III, 1. 1Kb] [III, 1. 46Kb] þata anþar ei bidiaiþ iah bi unsis broþrius ei uaurd frauiins þragiai iah mikiliaidau suasue [2. 1Kb] [III, 2. 50Kb] iah at ïzuis. iah ei uslausiaindau af gastoianaim iah ubilaim mannam. ni auk ïst allaim galaubeins. [3. 1Kb] [III, 3. 6Kb] [4. 1Kb] [III, 4. 13Kb] aþþan triggus frauia sei gatulgeiþ ïzuis iah galausiai ïzuis af þamma ubilin. aþþan gatrauam ïn [5. 1Kb] [III, 5. 3Kb] frauiin ei þatei anabudum ïzuis iah tauiip iah tauian habaiþ. frauia garaihtiai hairtona izuara ïn [6. 1Kb] [III, 6. 19Kb] friaþuai guþs iah ïn usþulainai xristaus. aþþan anabiudam ïzuis broþrius ïn namin frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus ei gaskaidaiþ ïzuis af allamma broþre wairbandane ungatassaba iah ni bi anafilham [7. 1Kb] [III, 7. 1Kb] [8. 1Kb] [III, 8. 16Kb] þei andnemuþ at uns. silbans auk kunnuþ waiua skuld ïst galeikon unsis. unte ni ungateuidai uesum ïn ïzuis nï aruio hlaib matidedum at wamma ak uinnandans arbaidai naht iah daga uaurkiandans [9. 1Kb] [III, 9. 5Kb] ei ni kauridedeima wana ïzuara. ni þatei ni habaidedeima ualdufni ak ei uns silbans du  [10. 1Kb] [III, 10. 1Kb] frisahtai gebeima du galeikon unsis. iah auk þan uesum at ïzuis pata ïzuis anabudum ei iabai [11. 1Kb] was ni uili uaurkian ni matiai. hausiam auk sumans wairbandans ïn ïzuis ungatassaba ni uaiht [12. 1Kb] [III, 12. 23Kb] uaurkiandans ak fairueitiandans. þaimuh sualeikaim anabiudam iah bidiam ïn frauiin ïesua xristau [13. 1Kb] ei miþ rimisa uaurkiandans seinana hlaib matiaina. aþþan ius broþrius ni uairþaiþ usgrudians uaila [14. 1Kb] [III, 14. 6Kb] tauiandans. ïþ iabai was ni ufhausiai uaurda unsaramma þairh þos bokos þana gatarhiaiþ. ni blandaiþ [15. 1Kb] [III, 15. 1Kb] ïzuis miþ ïmma ei gaskamai sik. iah ni suasue fiiand ïna rahniaiþ ak talziaiþ sue broþar. [16. 1Kb] [III, 16. 7Kb] aþþan silba frauia gauairþeis gibai ïzuis gauairþi sinteino ïn allaim stadim. frauia miþ allaim [17. 1Kb] [III, 17. 2Kb] ïzuis. so goleins meinai handau paulaus þatei ïst banduo ana allaim aipistaulem meinaim. sua [18. 1Kb] melia. ansts frauiins unsaris ïesuis xristaus miþ allaim ïzuis. amen.


du þaissalauneikaium anþara ustauh.



DU þAIMAUþAIAU FRUMEI DUSTODEIþ. [1Kb]


[I, 1. 1Kb] [I, 1. 9Kb] Paulus apaustaulus xristaus ïesuis bi anabusnim guþs nasiandis unsaris iah xristaus ïesuis uenais [2. 1Kb] [I, 2. 5Kb] unsaraizos. þeimauþaiu ualisin barna ïn galaubeinai ansts armaio gauairþi fram guþa attin iah xristau [3. 1Kb] [I, 3. 1Kb] ïesu frauiin unsaramma. suasue baþ þuk salian ïn aifaison galeiþands makidonais ei faurbiudais [4. 1Kb] [I, 4. 10Kb] sumaim ei anþarleiko ni laisiaina. niþ-þan atsaiwaina spille iah gabaurþiuaurde andilausaize þei [5. 1Kb] [I, 5. 1Kb] soknim andstaldand mais þau timreinai guþs þizai uisandein ïn galaubeinai. aþþan andeis ïst anabusnais [6. 1Kb] friaþua us hrainiamma hairtin iah miþuissein godai iah galaubeinai unhindarueisai. af þaimei [7. 1Kb] [I, 7. 1Kb] sumai afairzidai usuandidedun du lausauaurdein. uiliandans uisan uitodalaisarios ni fraþiandans nih [8. 1Kb] [I, 8. 21Kb] [9. 1Kb] [I, 9. 31Kb] wa rodiand nih bi wa stiuriand. aþþan uitum þatei god ïst uitoþ iabai was ïs uitodeigo brukeiþ. uitands þatei garaihtamma uitoþ nist satiþ ak uitodalausaim iah untalaim iah unsibiaim iah frauaurhtaim iah unairknaim iah usueihaim attans bligguandam iah aiþeins bligguandam mannans maurþriandam [10. 1Kb] [I, 10. 45Kb] horam mannans gaþiuandam liugniam ufarsuaram iah iabai wa alia þizai hailon laiseinai [11. 1Kb] [I, 11. 1Kb] [12. 1Kb] andstandand. sei ïst bi aiuaggeli uulþaus þis audagins guþs þatei gatrauaiþ ïst mis, iah auiliudo þamma ïnsuinþiandin mik xristau ïesu frauiin unsaramma unte galaubiandan mik gahugida gasatiands [13. 1Kb] ïn andbahtia. ïkei faura uas uaiameriands iah uraks iah ufbrikands akei gaarmaiþs uas unte [14. 1Kb] [I, 14. 21Kb] unuitands gatauida ïn ungalaubeinai. ïþ ufarassiþ ansts frauiins miþ galaubeinai iah friaþuai þizai ïn [15. 1Kb] xristau. triggu þata uaurd iah allaizos andanumtais uairþ þatei xristus ïesus qam ïn þamma fairwau  [16. 1Kb] [I, 16. 1Kb] frauaurhtans nasian þizeei frumists ïm ïk. akei dupe gaarmaiþs uarþ ei ïn mis frumistamma ataugidedi xristaus ïesus alla usbeisnein du frisahtai þaim ïze anauairþai uesun du galaubian ïmma du [17. 1Kb] [I, 17. 23Kb] libainai aiueinon. aþþan þiudana aiue undiuaniamma ungasaiwanamma ainamma frodamma guþa [18. 1Kb] [I, 18. 1Kb] sueriþa iah uulþus ïn aldins aiue amen. þo anabusn anafilha þus barnilo teimauþaiu bi þaim faura [19. 1Kb] faursniuandam ana þuk praufetiam ei driugais ïn þaim þata godo drauhtiuitoþ. habands galaubein iah goda miþuissein þizaiei sumai afskiubandans bi galaubein naqadai uaurpun. þizeei ïst hymainaius [II, 1. 1Kb] [II, 1. 1Kb] iah alaiksandrus þanzei anafalh satanin ei gatalziaindan ni uaiamerian. bidia nu frumist allis tauian [2. 1Kb] [II, 2. 1Kb] bidos aihtronins liteinins auiliuda fram allaim mannam. fram þiudanam iah fram allaim þaim ïn [3. 1Kb] [II, 3. 1Kb] ufarassau uisandam ei slauandein iah sutia los bauaima ïn allai gagudein iah gariudia. þatuþ-þan ïst [4. 1Kb] [II, 4. 1Kb] god iah andanem ïn anduairpia nasiandis unsaris guþs. sei allans mans uili ganisan iah ïn ufkunþia [5. 1Kb] [6. 1Kb] [II, 6. 1Kb] sunios qiman. ains allis guþ ains iah midumonds guþs iah manne manna xristus ïesus. sa gibands [7. 1Kb] [II, 7. 1Kb] sik silban andabaht faur allans ueituodein melam suesaim. du þammei gasatiþs ïm ïk meriands iah [8. 1Kb] [II, 8. 1Kb] apaustaulus sunia qiþa ïn xristau ni liuga laisareis þiudo ïn galaubeinai iah suniai. uiliau nu uairans [9. 1Kb] [II, 9. 27Kb] bidian ïn allaim stadim ushafiandans suiknos handuns ïnuh þuairhein iah tueiflein. samaleiko iah qinons ïn gafeteinai hrainiai miþ gariudion iah mahein fetiandeins sik ni ïn flahtom aiþþau gulþa [10. 1Kb] [II, 10. 1Kb] aiþþau markreitum aiþþau uastiom galubaim. ak þatei gadob ïst qinom gaha tandeim guþ blotan  [11. 1Kb] [II, 11. 1Kb] [12. 1Kb] [II, 12. 20Kb] þairh uaurstua goda. qino ïn hauïþa galaisiai sik ïn allai ufhauseinai. ïþ galaisian qinon ni uslaubia [13. 1Kb] [II, 13. 1Kb] [14. 1Kb] ni frauginon faura uaira ak uisan ïn þahainai. adam auk fruma gadigans uarþ þaþroh aiuua. iah adam [15. 1Kb] [II, 15. 1Kb] ni uarþ uslutoþs ïþ qino uslutoda ïn missadedai uarþ. ïþ ganisiþ þairh barne gabaurþ iabai gastandand [III, 1. 1Kb] ïn galaubeinai iah friaþuai iah ueihiþai miþ gafraþiein. triggu þata uaurd iabai was aipiskaupeins [2. 1Kb] [III, 2. 8Kb] gairneiþ godis uaurstuis gairneiþ. skal nu aipiskaupus ungafairinonds uisan ainaizos qenais aba [3. 1Kb] [III, 3. 1Kb] andaþahts gariuds froþs gafaurs gastigods laiseigs nih ueinnas ni slahals ak sutis airknis ni sakiis ni [4. 1Kb] [III, 4. 1Kb] [5. 1Kb] faihufriks seinamma garda uaila fauragaggands barna habands ufhausiandona miþ allai anauiliein. ïþ [6. 1Kb] [III, 6. 9Kb] iabai was seinamma garda fauragaggan ni mag waiua aikklesion guþs gakarai. nih niuian satidana [7. 1Kb] [III, 7. 1Kb] ïbai aufto ufarhauhiþs ïn staua atdriusai unhulþins. skal auk ïs ueituodiþa goda haban fram þaim [8. 1Kb] [III, 8. 47Kb] uta ei ni atdriusai ïn ïdueit iah hlamma unhulpins. iah sua diakaununs gariudans nih faihufrikans [9. 1Kb] [III, 9. 1Kb] ni ueina filu haftiandans nih aglaitgastaldans. habandans runa galaubeinais ïn hrainiai gahugdai. [10. 1Kb] [III, 10. 5Kb] [11. 1Kb] [III, 11. 1Kb] iah þai þan gakiusaindau frumist ias-sua andbahtiaina ungafairinodai uisandans. qinons samaleiko [12. 1Kb] gariudos ni diabulos gafaurios trigguos ïn allamma. diakaunius siiaina ainaizos qenais abans barnam [13. 1Kb] [III, 13. 16Kb] uaila fauragaggandans iah seinaim gardim. þai auk uaila andbahtiandans grid goda fairuaurkiand iah  [14. 1Kb] [15. 1Kb] [III, 15. 1Kb] managa balþein galaubeinai þizai ïn xristau ïesu. þata þus melia ueniands qiman at þus sprauto. aþþan iabai sainiau ei uitais waiua skuld ïst ïn garda guþs usmitan sei ïst aikklesio guþs libandins [16. 1Kb] [III, 16. 19Kb] sauls iah tulgiþa sunios. iah unsahtaba mikils ïst gagudeins runa sei gabairhtiþs uarþ ïn leika garaihts gadomiþs uarþ ïn ahmin ataugids uarþ þaim aggilum merids uarþ ïn [Iu, 1. 1Kb] [Iu, 1. 32Kb] þiudom galaubiþs uarþ ïn fairwau andnumans uarþ ïn uluþau. aþþan ahma suikunþaba qiþiþ þatei ïn spidistaim dagam afstandand sumai galaubeinai atsaiwandans ahmane airziþos [2. 1Kb] [Iu, 2. 1Kb] iah laiseino unhulþono. ïn liutein liugnauaurde iah gatandida habandane suesa miþuissein. [5. 1Kb] [6. 1Kb] [Iu, 6. 12Kb] gaueihada auk þairh uaurd guþs iah bida. þata ïnsakands broþrum goþs uairþis andbahts xristaus ïesuis [7. 1Kb] [Iu, 7. 17Kb] alands uaurdam galaubeinais iah godaizos laiseinais þei galaistides. ïþ þo usueihona sue usalþanaizo [8. 1Kb] [Iu, 8. 10Kb] spilla biuandei ïþ þroþei þuk silban du gagudein. aþþan leikeina usþroþeins du fauamma ïst bruks ïþ gagudei du allamma ïst bruks gahaita habandei libainais þizos nu iah þizos anauairþons. [9. 1Kb] [10. 1Kb] [Iu, 10. 4Kb] triggu þata uaurd iah allaizos andanumtais uairþ. duþþe allis arbaidiam iah ïdueitianda unte [11. 1Kb] uenidedum du guþa libandin sei ïst nasiands allaize manne þishun galaubiandane. anabiud þata [12. 1Kb] [Iu, 12. 1Kb] iah laisei. ni manna þeinai iundai frakunni ak frisahts siiais þaim galaubiandam ïn uaurda ïn usmeta  [13. 1Kb] [14. 1Kb] [Iu, 14. 44Kb] ïn friaþuai ïn galaubeinai ïn suikniþai. unte qima gaumei saggua boko gaþlaihtai laiseinai. ni siiais unkaria þizos ïu þus anstais sei gibana uarþ þns þairh praufetians afar analageinai handiue praizbytaireis. [15. 1Kb] [Iu, 15. 3Kb] [16. 1Kb] [Iu, 16. 1Kb] þo sido  ïnuþ-þaim siiais ei þatei þeihais þu suikunþ siiai allaim. atsaiw du þus silbin iah du laiseinai usdaudo þairhuis ïn þaim. þatuh auk tauiands iah þuk silban ganasiis iah [u, 1. 1Kb] [u, 1. 1Kb] hausiandans þus. seneigana ni andbeitais ak gaþlaih sue attin iuggans sue broþruns seneigos sue aiþeins [2. 1Kb] [u, 2. 1Kb] [3. 1Kb] iuggos sue suistruns ïn allai suiknein. uiduuons suerai þozei bi suniai siiaina uiduuons. ïþ [4. 1Kb] [u, 4. 24Kb] iabai wo uiduuono barna aiþþau barne barna habai galaisiaina sik faurþis suesana gard barusnian iah andalauni usgiban fadreinam þata auk ïst god iah andanem ïn anduairþia guþs. [5. 1Kb] [u, 5. 16Kb] aþþan sei bi suniai uiduuo ïst iah ainakla uenida du guþa iah þairhuisiþ ïn bidom nahtam iah [6. 1Kb] [u, 6. 1Kb] [7. 1Kb] [u, 7. 1Kb] dagam. ïþ so uizondei ïn azetiam iah libandei dauþa ïst. iah þata inabiud ei ungafairinodos siiaina. qaþ auk gameleins [19. 1Kb] [u, 19. 1Kb] auhsau þriskandin munþ ni fauruaipiais iah uairþs sa uaurstua mizdons ïs. bi praizbyterein [20. 1Kb] [u, 20. 1Kb] uroh ni andnimais niba ïn anduairþia tuadie þize gaualidane aggile ei þata fastais ïnu faurdomein ni uaiht tauiands [22. 1Kb] [u, 22. 1Kb] bi uiliahalþein. handuns sprauto ni mannhun lagiais ni gamainia siais frauaurhtim framaþiaim [23. 1Kb] [u, 23. 1Kb] þuk silban suiknana fastais. iu ni drigkais þanamais uato ak ueinis leitil brukiais ïn qiþaus [24. 1Kb] [u, 24. 9Kb] þeinis iah þizo ufta sauhte þeinaizo. sumaize manne frauaurhteis [2. 1Kb] aþþan þaiei galaubiandans haband frauians ni frakunneina unte broþrius sind ak mais skalkinona unte galaubiandans sind iah liubai þaiei uailadedais gadailans sind. þata laisei iah [3. 1Kb] [uI, 3. 1Kb] gaþlaih. iabai was alialeikos laisiai iah ni atgaggai du hailaim uaurdam þaim frauiins unsaris [4. 1Kb] [uI, 4. 19Kb] ïesuis xristaus iah þizai bi gagudein laiseinai. ïþ hauhþuhts ni uaiht uitands ak siukands bi soknins  [5. 1Kb] [uI, 5. 23Kb] iah uaurdaiiukos us þaimei uairþand neiþa maurþra haifsteis anaqisseis anamindeis ubilos ushalþeins frauardidaize manne ahin at þaimei gatarniþ ïst sunia hugiandane faihugauaurki uisan gagudein. DU TEIMAUþAIU ANþARA. [1Kb]


[I, 1. 1Kb] [I, 1. 10Kb] Paulus apaustaulus ïesuis xristaus þairh uilian guþs bi gahaitam libainais þizos ïn xristau ïesu. [2. 1Kb] teimauþaiau liubin barna ansts armaio gauairþi fram guþa attin iah xristau ïesu frauiin unsaramma. [3. 1Kb] [I, 3. 27Kb] auiliudo guþa meinamma þammei skalkino fram fadreinam ïn hrainiai gahugdai waiua unsueibando [4. 1Kb] [I, 4. 1Kb] haba bi þuk gaminþi ïn bidom meinaim naht iah daga. gairniands puk gasaiwan gamunands tagre [5. 1Kb] [I, 5. 56Kb] þeinaize ei fahedais usfullnau. gamaudein andnimands þizos sei ïst ïn þus unliutons galaubeinais sei [6. 1Kb] [I, 6. 16Kb] bauaida faurþis ïn auon þeinai lauïdia iah aiþein þeinai aiuneika. aþþan traua þatei iah ïn þus. ïn þizozei uaihtais gamaudia þuk anaqiuian anst guþs sei ïst ïn þus þairh analagein handiue meinaizo. [7. 1Kb] [I, 7. 1Kb] [8. 1Kb] [I, 8. 8Kb] unte ni gaf unsis guþ ahman faurhteins ak mahtais iah friaþuos iah ïnaheins. ni nunu skamai þuk ueituodiþos frauiins unsaris ïesuis nih meina bandiins ïs ak miþarbaidei aiuaggelion bi mahtai guþs [9. 1Kb] [I, 9. 1Kb] þis nasiandins uns iah laþondins laþonai ueihai ni bi uaurstuam unsaraim ak bi seinai leikainai iah [10. 1Kb] [I, 10. 1Kb] anstai sei gibana ïst unsis ïn xristau ïesu faur mela aiueina. ïp gasuikunþida nu þairh gabairhtein nasiandis unsaris ïesuis xristaus gatairandins raihtis dauþau ïþ galiuhtiandins libain iah unriurein [11. 1Kb] [12. 1Kb] [I, 12. 58Kb] þairh aiuaggelion. ïn þei gasatiþs ïm ïk meriands iah apaustaulus iah laisareis þiudo. ïn þizozei fairinos iah þata uinna. akei nih skama mik unte uait wamma galaubida iah gatraua þammei mahteigs  [13. 1Kb] [I, 13. 7Kb] ïst þata anafilh mein fastan ïn iainana dag. frisaht habands hailaize uaurde þei at mis hausides [14. 1Kb] [I, 14. 1Kb] ïn galaubeinai iah friaþuai ïn xristau ïesu. þata godo anafilh fastai þairh ahman ueihana sei bauïþ [15. 1Kb] [I, 15. 24Kb] ïn uns. uaist þatei afuandidedun sik af mis allai þaiei sind ïn asiai. þizei ïst fygailus iah airmogaineis. [16. 1Kb] [I, 16. 1Kb] gibai armaion frauia auneiseifauraus garda unte ufta mik anaþrafstida iah naudibandio [17. 1Kb] [I, 17. 13Kb] [18. 1Kb] [I, 18. 8Kb] meinaizo ni skamaida sik. ak qimands ïn rumai usdaudo sokida mik iah bigat. gibai frauia ïmma bigitan armahairtein at frauiin ïn iainamma daga iah wan filu mais ïn aifaison andbahtida mis uaila [II, 1. 1Kb] [II, 1. 1Kb] [2. 1Kb] [II, 2. 16Kb] þu kant. þu nu barn mein ualiso ïnsuinþei þuk ïn anstai þizai ïn xristau ïesu iah þei hausides at mis þairh managa ueituodia uaurda guþs þo anafilh trigguaim mannam þaiei uairþai siiaina iah anþarans [3. 1Kb] [II, 3. 1Kb] [4. 1Kb] [II, 4. 37Kb] laisian. þu nu arbaidei sue gods gadrauhts xristaus ïesuis. ni ainshun drauhtinonds frauiin [5. 1Kb] dugauindiþ sik gauaurkiam þizos aldais ei galeikai þammei drauhtinoþ. iah þan iabai haifsteiþ was [6. 1Kb] [II, 6. 14Kb] [7. 1Kb] [II, 7. 16Kb] ni ueipada niba uitodeigo brikiþ. arbaidiands airþos uaurstuia skal frumist akrane andniman. fraþei [8. 1Kb] [II, 8. 1Kb] þatei qiþa. gibiþ auk þus frauia fraþi us allaim. gamuneis xristu ïesu urrisanana us dauþaim us [9. 1Kb] fraiua dauidis bi aiuaggelion meinai. ïn þizaiei arbaidia und bandios sue ubiltoiis. akei uaurd [10. 1Kb] guþs nist gabundan. ïnuh þis all gaþula bi þans gaualidans ei iah þai ganist gatilona sei [11. 1Kb] [II, 11. 4Kb] ïst ïn xristau ïesu miþ uulþau aiueinamma. triggu þata uaurd iabai miþgadauþnodedum iah [12. 1Kb] [13. 1Kb] [II, 13. 4Kb] miþlibam. iabai gaþulam iah miþþiudanom. iabai afaikam iah ïs afaikiþ uns. iabai ni galaubiam [14. 1Kb] [II, 14. 36Kb] iains triggus uisiþ afaikan sik silban ni mag. þizei gamaudei ueituodiands ïn anduairþia frauiins.  [15. 1Kb] [II, 15. 1Kb] uaurdam ueihan du ni uaihtai daug niba usualteinai þaim hausiondam. usdaudei puk silban gakusanana [16. 1Kb] [II, 16. 12Kb] usgiban guþa uaurstuian unaiuiskana raihtaba raidiandan uaurd sunios. ïþ þo dualona usueihona [17. 1Kb] [II, 17. 22Kb] lausauaurdia biuandei unte filu gaggand du afgudein. iah uaurd ïze sue gund uuliþ. þizeei uesun ymainaius [18. 1Kb] [II, 18. 29Kb] iah filetus. þaiei bi sunia usuissai usmetun qiþandans usstass iu uaurþana iah galaubein [19. 1Kb] sumaize usualtidedun. aþþan tulgus grunduuaddius guþs standiþ habands siglio þata. kunþa [20. 1Kb] [II, 20. 1Kb] frauia þans þaiei sind ïs iah afstandai af unselein wazuh sei namniai namo frauiins. aþþan ïn mikilamma garda ni sind þatainei kasa gulþeina iah silubreina ak iah triueina iah digana [21. 1Kb] [II, 21. 4Kb] iah suma du suerain sumuþ-þan du unsuerain. aþþan iabai was gahrainiai sik þizei uairþiþ [22. 1Kb] [II, 22. 13Kb] kas du sueriþai gaueihaiþ bruk frauiin du allamma uaurstue godaize gamanuiþ. aþþan iuggans lustuns þliuh ïþ laistei garaihtein galaubein friaþua gauairþi miþ þaim bidai anahaitandam [23. 1Kb] frauian us hrainiamma hairtin. ïþ þos dualons iah untalons soknins biuandei uitands þatei [24. 1Kb] gabairand sakions. ïþ skalks frauiins ni skal sakan ak qairrus uisan uiþra allans laiseigs usþulands [25. 1Kb] [II, 25. 28Kb] ïn qairrein talziands þans andstandandans niu wan gibai ïm guþ ïdreiga du ufkunþia sunios. [26. 1Kb] [II, 26. 35Kb] iah usskauiaindau us unhulþins uruggon fram þammei gafahanai tiuhanda afar ïs uiliin.
